pwe_ability_activate_maiden_02: By the gods of star and shadow!
pwe_ability_still_cooldown_shade_02: The shadows are not yet gathered.
pwe_ability_still_cooldown_shade_03: Soon, I shall walk in shadow.
pwe_ability_still_cooldown_shade_04: Not yet. I must have patience.
pwe_activate_ability_shade_09: Pale Queen, shield me from sight.
pwe_amber_weave_conversation_one_01: Ulric? Your so-called god of Wolves and Winter? Such a milksop. Anath Raema would feed him his own lungs.
pwe_amber_weave_conversation_two_01: This is a hunting ground. Try not to be prey, lumberfoots.
pwe_amethyst_weave_conversation_one_01: Does anyone else hear whispering voices?
pwe_amethyst_weave_conversation_two_01: Ach, don't be so judgemental. Life has ever risen out of death. It's the way of things.
pwe_bastion_conversation_eight_01: These stones are cold... as if evil were embedded deep in their very being.
pwe_bastion_conversation_eleven_01: Hah! She never seems anything but. I think the Weaves trouble her. As they trouble us all.
pwe_bastion_conversation_four_01: Castle Drachenfels has its foundations in good stone. Have the dwarfs never tried to claim it?
pwe_bastion_conversation_seven_01: Aye. I was born free, and I will die the same way.
pwe_bastion_conversation_six_01: Have you ever been held captive yourself, Kruber - other than by you know the ratmen?
pwe_bastion_conversation_six_02: Ah, I see. Say no more.
pwe_bastion_conversation_six_03: Enough! Please just leave me with my illusions.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_a_01: We can't fly over those walls. We'll need a way through.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_a_02: We've reached an outer bastion, it seems. One we'll have to breach to continue.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_b_01: I've got little hope for finding captives, but we should free any we do find.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_b_02: If there are captives still alive, this is as good a place as any to hold them.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_c_01: I cannot abide cages, or slavers. This will be... rewarding.
pwe_bastion_intro_line_c_02: Freedom for the chained, and death to their captors. A good day's work beckons.
pwe_bastion_vo_caves_01: It'll take a mayfly's lifetime to search this place.
pwe_bastion_vo_caves_02: Desolate... and smelly. I hate it.
pwe_bastion_vo_caves_03: Where now? Pick a direction - there's a lot of ground to cover.
pwe_bastion_vo_caves_04: Well, it looks like we've a search ahead of us.
pwe_bastion_vo_courtyard_done_01: A ritual? It will portend nothing good.
pwe_bastion_vo_courtyard_done_02: Northlander rituals are not to be ignored.
pwe_bastion_vo_courtyard_done_03: Do the scunners have a ritual in mind? Let's bring it to an end.
pwe_bastion_vo_courtyard_done_04: Are we to allow this ritual to conclude? I don't think so.
pwe_bastion_vo_courtyard_first_villager_: Never fear. We'll see them freed.
You hear, lumberfoots? There are more.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_darkness_01: There's something cruel lurking in the dark.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_darkness_02: I feel the shudder of the Weave with every step.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_darkness_03: Do you not feel it? There's hatred in the darkness.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_darkness_04: This is no ordinary darkness, mayflies. It is born of the Dark Gods.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_finale_01: Poor souls. It seems the ritual is complete. Advance with care.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_finale_02: Such vileness. No one deserves to die thus... apart from the ritual's master. Let's find him.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_finale_03: The ritual is complete. Do you not feel it? Tread with care.
pwe_bastion_vo_entering_finale_04: This... isn't good. Be on your guard, the ritual is done.
pwe_bastion_vo_entrance_01: Ugh. Must we? It looks like the lair of some vile beast.
pwe_bastion_vo_entrance_02: Are you certain this is safe, mayflies? It looks like something's burrowed in.
pwe_bastion_vo_entrance_03: If we find something hungry at the end of the tunnel, I am blaming you.
pwe_bastion_vo_entrance_04: I know, I know, I know! Let's charge blindly into that confined, underground space!
pwe_bastion_vo_exiting_pwe_bastion_01: The sorcerer will have fled to the castle. We'll follow.
pwe_bastion_vo_exiting_pwe_bastion_02: The castle won't save the sorcerer. We'll find him, and end his misery.
pwe_bastion_vo_exiting_pwe_bastion_03: The sorcerer cowers in yon castle. We'll dig him out, inch by disgusting inch.
pwe_bastion_vo_exiting_pwe_bastion_04: The castle is no respite, not from the likes of us, mayflies.
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_done_04: So much for the sorcerer's boasts!
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_missile_01: Ach! Leave me alone, vile conjuring!
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_sorcerer_03: Crow all you wish, I've no fear of you!
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_sorcerer_04: You will fall to us, sorcerer!
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_tiring_02: We just need to hold out a little longer!
pwe_bastion_vo_finale_tiring_04: We will not be vanquished by your like, scunner!
pwe_bastion_vo_head_to_surface_01: If I'm to die, it will not be belowground.
pwe_bastion_vo_head_to_surface_02: Up towards the light, such as it is.
pwe_bastion_vo_head_to_surface_03: I'd see the sky again, if that's not too much to ask?
pwe_bastion_vo_head_to_surface_04: Up, mayflies. The air grows foul down here.
pwe_bastion_vo_inside_cellblock_01: There's no one here, mayflies. Can we go?
pwe_bastion_vo_inside_cellblock_02: The prisoners are long dead, mayflies.
pwe_bastion_vo_inside_cellblock_03: If the prisoners yet live, they're elsewhere.
pwe_bastion_vo_inside_cellblock_04: There are no prisoners here. Only emptiness.
pwe_bastion_vo_no_prisoners_01: We'll keep moving. Maybe we'll find something.
pwe_bastion_vo_no_prisoners_02: We can't stay here. It's a trap, and we're the rats.
pwe_bastion_vo_no_prisoners_03: Get going, lumberfoots. Lingering changes nothing.
pwe_bastion_vo_no_prisoners_04: We gain nothing by staying here.
pwe_bastion_vo_search_cells_01: They're likely all empty, but we should make sure.
pwe_bastion_vo_search_cells_02: Can you imagine being chained in one of those?
pwe_bastion_vo_search_cells_03: I'll die before letting the Pactsworn lock me up so.
pwe_bell_intro_a_01: Why be surprised that skaven worship a bell? Mayflies will bend a knee to anything.
pwe_bell_intro_a_02: I tire of keeping your precious empire clean of Skaven trinkets, mayflies.
pwe_bell_intro_b_01: Well, half of you lot worship a bearded corpse. Personally I think a bell is preferable.
pwe_bell_intro_b_02: Mayflies, skaven only appear cunning. We shouldn't read too much method into their madness.
pwe_bell_intro_c_01: Now, either all of you shut your snaggletooth-holes and get going, or I'm leaving you behind. Again.
pwe_bell_intro_c_02: All your yammer, lumberfoots. It's enough to make me long for someone's death. Could be yours or could be mine.
pwe_bless_conversation_eight_01: I know. I curse the day we set foot in the Citadel of Eternity.
pwe_bless_conversation_five_01: As it should be. A genuine smile from One-Eye? It is surely a sign that the End Times are upon us.
pwe_bless_conversation_four_01: That by you is might? We have gods who can crack the world apart, drown cities with the seas or exhort whole populations to exquisite savagery. I think your little storm god might be a wee bit outnumbered.
pwe_bless_conversation_four_02: Some will make a stand, have no doubt. Alas, the others are likely waiting to see which side to take.
pwe_bless_conversation_nine_01: I think we all know the answer to that one.
pwe_bless_conversation_one_01: Oh, One-Eye. Such poetry. Next you'll be telling me you've learned the value of mercy.
pwe_bless_conversation_one_02: Glad to hear it. I'd hate to think you've gone soft.
pwe_bless_conversation_seven_01: That's because he likes you, Kruber. He's back to looking strangely at Sienna and I.
pwe_bless_conversation_six_01: He always had a purpose, Bardin. That was the problem.
pwe_bless_conversation_three_01: That magic you manifest, Saltzpyre ... It looks like it tingles. Does it tingle?
pwe_bless_conversation_three_02: Aye, very impressive. But you didn't answer the question.
pwe_bless_conversation_two_01: I confess, One-Eye, I never really believed Sigmar was a god, but you're making me reconsider.
pwe_bright_weave_conversation_three_01: Loathsome though it is, something about this place calls to me.
pwe_bright_weave_conversation_three_02: I know, I know... but wouldn't it be fun?
pwe_bright_weave_conversation_two_01: Is it hot in here, or is it just me?
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_01: Monster's caught Sienna! It will devour her to regain its strength!
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_02: Spawn's taken Sienna! I will ruin that thing like it ruined my mood!
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_03: Sienna's caught by the Spawn! I expect you to do something, lumberfoots!
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_04: That unspeakable monstrosity cannot be allowed to live... and much less to gnaw on our Wizard.
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_05: Spawn's on Sienna! Get the things attention, or she'll lose some part dear to her!
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_06: Chaos Spawn got Sienna! It shan't do it again!
pwe_bright_wizard_eaten_07: Tentacle beast's all over our wizard! Doubt she can use her magic while being devoured.
pwe_castle_conversation_eleven_01: Saltzpyre always hears voices. Mad ones.
pwe_castle_conversation_eleven_02: Nothing at all. Leave me be.
pwe_castle_conversation_five_01: So, One-Eye. If Constant Drachenfels is a myth, why does speaking of him bother you so?
pwe_castle_conversation_five_02: Aye, that makes a good excuse. It might even stop people believing and following his example. For a time. Until he returns.
pwe_castle_conversation_ten_01: Then be of good cheer. Your tally increases today.
pwe_castle_conversation_three_02: Really? Me too. We should compare notes.
pwe_castle_conversation_two_01: It couldn't have been anyone else. You don't mistake that manner of evil.
pwe_castle_conversation_two_02: This was different. It was Old. I pray you never see for yourself.
pwe_castle_intro_line_a_01: The sorcerer cannot hide. I have an arrow ready just for him
pwe_castle_intro_line_a_02: Just like a lesser evil to hide in the shadow of a much larger one.
pwe_castle_intro_line_b_01: No hunt performed in this bleak place can ever be simple.
pwe_castle_intro_line_b_02: Our quarry has gone to ground in an ill-fated lair. We need to be careful.
pwe_castle_intro_line_c_01: If you say so. I don't intend to fail.
pwe_castle_intro_line_c_02: You're a cauldron full of cheer today, aren't you?
pwe_castle_vo_approaching_throne_room_01: Ugh, that smell. I think the sorcerer's inside.
pwe_castle_vo_approaching_throne_room_02: That's a vile stench. I'd say we've found the sorcerer.
pwe_castle_vo_approaching_throne_room_03: The sorcerer's nearby. The foul stench confirms it.
pwe_castle_vo_approaching_throne_room_04: The sorcerer's close. Can you not smell him?
pwe_castle_vo_blockage_01: Blocked? Can we go around? Can we go through?
pwe_castle_vo_blockage_02: Another obstacle. I'm in no mood to be thwarted.
pwe_castle_vo_blockage_03: Can we go around? Over? Through?
pwe_castle_vo_blockage_04: What now, mayflies? Surely we'll not let this obstacle thwart us?
pwe_castle_vo_blood_pool_01: That fountain almost resembles something my cousins would create.
pwe_castle_vo_blood_pool_02: Look at that! Like Naggarothi art, but not quite as pointy.
pwe_castle_vo_blood_pool_03: At least blood adds a splash of colour to the room.
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_discovered_01: We're not finished, mayflies. Not until Nurgloth's daemonic master is slain.
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_discovered_02: This isn't over. Nurgloth's daemon must be... attended to.
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_discovered_03: We have to find and banish Nurgloth's daemon. Only then will this be over.
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_discovered_04: We're not done here until the daemon's dealt with. Nurgloth was but a servant.
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_not_discovered_01: Gah! Something's missing, and I don't know what!
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_not_discovered_02: What have we missed, mayflies? It's annoying me!
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_not_discovered_03: I have the sense that we've seen something and not fully understood...
pwe_castle_vo_crypt_not_discovered_04: We've missed something, mayflies. The question is, what?
pwe_castle_vo_door_open_01: An open door? What can possibly go wrong?
pwe_castle_vo_door_open_02: Oh, we're clearly taking them by surprise.
pwe_castle_vo_door_open_03: So, they know we're here? So much for a stealthy approach.
pwe_castle_vo_door_open_04: Oh, well done, mayflies. They heard you coming.
pwe_castle_vo_do_not_recognize_01: I'm sure this is different to last time.
pwe_castle_vo_do_not_recognize_02: Wretched castle, shuffling its chambers like a deck of cards.
pwe_castle_vo_do_not_recognize_03: None of this looks like it did before. The details are wrong.
pwe_castle_vo_do_not_recognize_04: Oh... It's enchanted. The rooms are always in motion.
pwe_castle_vo_drop_down_02: What is it with this castle and ominous descents?
pwe_castle_vo_drop_down_03: Down there? Well, if I must, I must.
pwe_castle_vo_drop_down_04: Into the castle's bowels again, I suppose.
pwe_castle_vo_enter_01: That door's our only way onwards.
pwe_castle_vo_enter_02: I don't think we've any choice but that door.
pwe_castle_vo_enter_03: That door blocks the only route through.
pwe_castle_vo_enter_04: I don't see any other path. It'll have to be that door.
pwe_castle_vo_find_a_way_up_01: Right. Time to head back upstairs.
pwe_castle_vo_find_a_way_up_02: I don't know about you lot, but I'm going back upstairs.
pwe_castle_vo_find_a_way_up_03: So... Are we heading back upstairs, or giving up?
pwe_castle_vo_find_a_way_up_04: Off we go, mayflies. Back up to the castle. We'll try again.
pwe_castle_vo_halls_01: I think we're back in the castle, mayflies.
pwe_castle_vo_halls_02: This looks like the castle, lumberfoots.
pwe_castle_vo_halls_04: Is this the castle? Thank Lileath.
pwe_castle_vo_hello_02: Don't be deceived by the quiet, mayflies.
pwe_castle_vo_hello_03: Silence means nothing. Death is often without clamour.
pwe_castle_vo_hello_04: This is off to an... unexpected start.
pwe_castle_vo_landed_02: No. That did not happen. Anyone who speaks of it, gets an arrow. Are we clear?
pwe_castle_vo_landed_03: What have you led me into now, mayflies?
pwe_castle_vo_landed_04: I knew that was going to happen. I thought you'd worked it out.
pwe_castle_vo_meet_sorcerer_01: Another mayfly wants to rule the world. Hah!
pwe_castle_vo_meet_sorcerer_02: Such a high opinion of yourself, mayfly.
pwe_castle_vo_meet_sorcerer_03: The Weave will consume you, as it does all!
pwe_castle_vo_meet_sorcerer_04: Oh please. Spare us. I'm shaking.
pwe_castle_vo_recognize_01: This isn't our first time in this room.
pwe_castle_vo_recognize_02: Do you remember when we were here before. Wasn't it fun?
pwe_castle_vo_recognize_03: It seems we were only here yesterday, doesn't it, mayflies?
pwe_castle_vo_recognize_04: I imagine you've all forgotten this room. Your memories are so... fragile.
pwe_castle_vo_search_again_01: Now - maybe - we can find that sorcerer.
pwe_castle_vo_search_again_02: Escape successful. Now we can find that sorcerer.
pwe_castle_vo_search_again_03: Which way now? That sorcerer must be somewhere.
pwe_castle_vo_search_again_04: That sorcerer must be laughing at us something fierce.
pwe_castle_vo_secret_door_02: Well, that's a pleasant surprise... I think.
pwe_castle_vo_secret_door_03: Oh, a secret door. How nice.
pwe_castle_vo_secret_door_04: Let's hope that door leads us where we want to go.
pwe_castle_vo_sorcerer_slain_01: He ends like the others. No one will remember... I'm sorry, what was his name?
pwe_castle_vo_sorcerer_slain_02: Boasts mean nothing if you've not the skill to back them up.
pwe_castle_vo_sorcerer_slain_03: So proud. Yet so pathetic in death.
pwe_castle_vo_sorcerer_slain_04: The sorcerer is dead, but his odour lingers. It will have to do.
pwe_castle_vo_this_way_01: Mayflies? What are you waiting for?
pwe_castle_vo_this_way_03: Are we gonna do this, or what?
pwe_castle_vo_throne_room_approach_01: Isn't this near the throne room? A good place to check.
pwe_castle_vo_throne_room_approach_02: We're near the throne room, mayflies. We should take a look.
pwe_castle_vo_throne_room_approach_03: The throne room's close, and if I were a preening sorcerer, it's where I'd be.
pwe_castle_vo_throne_room_approach_04: Isn't the throne room around here somewhere? We should look for him there.
pwe_castle_vo_traces_one_01: Well, if nothing else, we can track the sorcerer by his slimy trail.
pwe_castle_vo_traces_one_02: How considerate of the sorcerer to leave us a trail of pus.
pwe_castle_vo_traces_one_03: The smell will lead us to him, if nothing else.
pwe_castle_vo_traces_one_04: Revolting. Are we sure we want to find him, mayflies?
pwe_castle_vo_trap_switch_01: Haven't we learned not to play with strange switches?
pwe_castle_vo_trap_switch_02: Be careful with that switch, mayflies.
pwe_castle_vo_trap_switch_04: Is that switch yet another trap?
pwe_castle_vo_vista_01: How peaceful... Little aware of the evil on high.
pwe_castle_vo_vista_02: The beauty of moonlight. There's nothing to compare.
pwe_castle_vo_vista_03: Moonlight renders all beautiful. Even you lot.
pwe_castle_vo_vista_04: The grace of the moon. A gift we seldom deserve.
pwe_catacombs_intro_a_01: This has the look of a healer's temple well enough, but it stinks of death.
pwe_catacombs_intro_a_02: Lohner was right. There's something amiss here. I can feel it.
pwe_catacombs_intro_b_01: War marches on all lands, and pities not the weak. This is no time for pacifism.
pwe_catacombs_intro_b_02: We'll have our answers soon enough, mayflies.
pwe_catacombs_intro_c_01: This house of healing conceals the truth. Stat alert Mayflies!
pwe_catacombs_intro_c_02: A healer's hall should be sacrosanct. If we've need, we'll ink that lesson in blood.
pwe_celestial_weave_conversation_one_01: My cousins believe that the future can be read in the heavens...
pwe_celestial_weave_conversation_one_02: I doubt it. They think white's a practical colour, so what do they know?
pwe_cemetary_intro_a_01: Plague surrounds us. This field of death yet breeds vile life.
pwe_cemetary_intro_a_02: The plague is here. We'll root it out, and then some.
pwe_cemetary_intro_b_01: Be on guard. There'll be more rat-men than headstones.
pwe_cemetary_intro_b_02: How will we find anything in this maze of stone?
pwe_cemetary_intro_c_01: It looks crowded. Let's not be penned.
pwe_cemetary_intro_c_02: We should take care not to get separated. This place is a warren of death.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_a_01: (laugh) The scunner wants to die. Who are we to deny him?
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_a_02: Well, mayflies? It'd be rude to turn down such a fine gentleman.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_b_01: The quicker, the better. MAKE YOUR PEACE, SCUNNER! YOU HAVE BUT SECONDS LEFT TO LIVE!
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_b_02: We shall oblige. THERE ARE NO WORDS FOR WHAT I'LL DO TO YOU, NORTHLANDER!
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_01: (sigh) If we must. MAKE YOUR PEACE, SCUNNER! YOU HAVE BUT SECONDS LEFT TO LIVE!
pwe_chaos_war_camp_challenge_reply_c_02: Your idea has merit, assuming we survive. THERE ARE NO WORDS FOR WHAT I'LL DO TO YOU, NORTHLANDER!
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_a_01: I'm not dying in a marsh.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_a_02: A score of kin by my side, and the Champion's already dead. With you? (sigh) A bit more effort.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_b_01: I don't see the problem. Or do the worshippers of Chaos not bleed as other men?
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_b_02: Toughen up, mayflies. Your lives are almost over at any rate.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_c_01: Indeed, why worry? Your life's so short you'll hardly miss it anyway.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_intro_c_02: My ears tire, lumberfoots, and the pact-sworn haven't even started caterwauling. Let's go.
pwe_chaos_war_camp_taunt_payback_reply_0: A mere taste of our aims but you'll not live to see them realised.
A mere taste, lummox, of our aims.
Did we do all that? We're just getting started.
A mere taste, lummox, of our aims.
Aye, we did it all. Think more about that as you die.
Did we do all that? We're just getting started.
pwe_cog_conversation_five_01: So, you've other family still in this grey world of ours?
pwe_cog_conversation_five_02: So suspicious, Master Dwarf. And yes, Lohner told me. You've a daughter, I understand?
pwe_cog_conversation_four_01: And your uncle took the blame?
pwe_cog_conversation_four_02: You're asking me if I understand pride, and shame? Hah.
pwe_cog_conversation_one_01: I hear your family's a mite... complicated.
pwe_cog_conversation_six_01: Your wife's made a name for herself I hear, Goreksson?
pwe_cog_conversation_six_02: One. And I'll not ask about that.
pwe_cog_conversation_six_03: But she doesn't care for you any longer?
pwe_cog_conversation_three_01: That your father died in a mining accident. He implied your Uncle Drakki was responsible.
pwe_cog_conversation_two_02: I was just going to say that it's hard to be alone among these mayflies.
pwe_cog_trailer_01: Door’s still locked. D’you think he’s dead?
pwe_comet_conversation_eight_01: Oh really? I'll be the one standing over here, holding my breath. Giddy with excitement.
pwe_comet_conversation_eight_02: I already am, One-Eye. Didn't you know?
pwe_comet_conversation_four_01: I could scarcely add anything One-Eye does not. The man won't shut up about it.
pwe_comet_conversation_four_02: Well, this elf's perspective is that if we're seeking aid from glowing lights in the sky, we're all doomed.
pwe_comet_conversation_three_01: Might be it's about to get worse.
pwe_crater_ambush_done_01: I would have warned you about that ambush, mayflies, but there's something to be said for direct experience.
pwe_crater_ambush_done_02: You need to hone your senses, lumberfoots. The next ambush might be your last.
pwe_crater_ambush_done_03: Children. I'm out in the woods with children.
pwe_crater_ambush_done_04: Forget the ratmen, the northlanders. There are other things to fear in these wild places.
pwe_crater_ambush_interactable_01: We are watched, mayflies. We are seen. Be ready.
pwe_crater_ambush_interactable_02: Here? Now? Is there no cessation?
pwe_crater_ambush_interactable_03: Together! Now! This is no time to wander off!
pwe_crater_ambush_interactable_04: Ignore the corpse, mayflies. Stay close, and have your weapons ready!
pwe_crater_arena_end_01: We've averted disaster, but the Weave is still keening.
pwe_crater_arena_end_02: Alive? Aye. My penance goes on.
pwe_crater_arena_end_03: This isn't over, mayflies. The Weave is fractured... I can almost see it.
pwe_crater_arena_end_04: I'm still alive. So are you. Can't have everything.
pwe_crater_arena_standard_02_01: Another? We'll destroy that one too!
pwe_crater_arena_standard_02_02: A second standard! Destroy it, mayflies!
pwe_crater_arena_standard_02_03: They've planted another standard! Hack it apart!
pwe_crater_arena_standard_03: The standard channels the ritual's power! Destroy it!
pwe_crater_arena_standard_04: Destroy the standard, and we can win this!
pwe_crater_arena_waystone_01: Our work isn't done. We should consult the others.
pwe_crater_arena_waystone_02: This was no victory, mayflies. Only postponement.
pwe_crater_arena_waystone_03: Don't celebrate, lumberfoots. We've won little.
pwe_crater_arena_waystone_04: We didn't win today. Only survived.
pwe_crater_bridge_sighted_01: That tree will serve as means of passage.
pwe_crater_bridge_sighted_02: The chasm is deep, but the tree offers hope.
pwe_crater_bridge_sighted_03: The chasm can be crossed, mayflies. See that tree?
pwe_crater_bridge_sighted_04: There's a way across, lumberfoots. Head for the tree.
pwe_crater_climb_top_01: Crude voices. The Dark Tongue. The corruptors attempt a ritual! We must hurry!
pwe_crater_climb_top_02: Pick up your feet, mayflies! I hear a ritual chant! We've no time for your dawdling!
pwe_crater_climb_top_03: I hear them chanting... The Weave pulses with every word. We may already be too late.
pwe_crater_climb_top_04: Hurry, mayflies! Hurry! Don't you hear their chant? We're running out of time!
pwe_crater_conversation_five_01: Aye we do. They seek to corrupt and despoil the weave. As humans don't seem interested in stopping them, someone must.
pwe_crater_conversation_five_02: And whose fault is that? And to whom will you look for fairness when the Weave collapses beneath their foulness?
pwe_crater_conversation_four_01: Believe me when I say that any caravan attacked by Asrai wouldn't have chance to speak of it.
pwe_crater_conversation_one_01: You talk as if they're rare, Kruber. The corruptors lurk everywhere.
pwe_crater_conversation_one_02: This 'blasted wilderness' is a thing of beauty. We cannot allow them to despoil it.
pwe_crater_conversation_seven_01: Whatever happens here today is only the start. Once the corruptors find foothold, they spread like a plague.
pwe_crater_conversation_seven_02: You've heard whispers, nothing more. The truth is worse. Withered groves. Sickness in the hearts of new-borns. The living world recoiling and growing bitter.
pwe_crater_conversation_three_01: On this, if nothing else, we agree, One-Eye.
pwe_crater_conversation_three_02: Oh, they're much worse than that. They're the rot in the very soul of the world.
pwe_crater_devastation_01: The cytharai laugh to see this destruction.
pwe_crater_devastation_02: Ellinill and his children have been at work in this place, mayflies. Let us hope they don't linger.
pwe_crater_devastation_03: There was a mighty forest here once, mayflies. Let us hope it returns, in time.
pwe_crater_devastation_04: The Weave weeps to see what happened here.
pwe_crater_forest_ascent_top_01: Faster! We must know what the corruptors are doing! We must find that meteor.
pwe_crater_forest_ascent_top_02: Lohner was right to worry... a meteor, and now the corruptors? We must find a way through.
pwe_crater_forest_ascent_top_03: The beastmen shall be stopped. We need to get through the mountain!
pwe_crater_forest_ascent_top_04: That cave. It might be a way through!
pwe_crater_intro_banter_a_01: It's good to walk a while - that portal gives me nightmares. I think the old woman does it on purpose.
pwe_crater_intro_banter_a_02: I hate Olesya's magic. Hours later, and it's still clinging to me.
pwe_crater_intro_banter_b_01: Take notice, for I shall not say it again, but Lohner isn't often worried without reason.
pwe_crater_intro_banter_c_01: I don't like this, mayflies. The Weave is weeping.
pwe_crater_intro_banter_c_02: There's something wrong here, mayflies. Badly wrong.
pwe_crater_plan_banter_a_01: No! I will not let this be. We'll use the corruptors' sorcery against them. If the ritual is disrupted...
pwe_crater_plan_banter_a_02: Brave heart, Kerillian. There's always a way... Aye! If we disrupt that ritual...
pwe_crater_plan_banter_b_01: ...the warpstone will feed on itself. It might even implode. That's actually a good idea, though the cost to us...
pwe_crater_plan_banter_b_02: ...the sorcery will run out of control, and the warpstone will consume itself. It's a bold plan, mayflies. And it carries a risk...
pwe_crater_plan_banter_c_01: ...So? Death in the service of the Weave is the highest calling! Let us be off!
pwe_crater_plan_banter_c_02: ...It matters not. We owe all to the Weave. Our lives, and our deaths. Come!
pwe_crater_rim_vista_01: Lileath! What can we do about so much warpstone? The first of us to lay hand on it will unravel.
pwe_crater_rim_vista_02: Ach! The meteor's too vast. We can kill all the corruptors we wish, and still it will change nothing.
pwe_crater_rim_vista_03: There's more warpstone than we can hope to destroy, but we can still drown it in corruptor blood!
pwe_crater_rim_vista_04: Lileath forgive me, but we can do nothing to that much warpstone, and there's no time to seek help...
pwe_crater_tracking_camp_01: This isn't a skaven camp... or skaven work.
pwe_crater_tracking_camp_02: Tread lightly, lumberfoots. This is more than it seems...
pwe_crater_tracking_camp_03: Don't be fooled by the skaven... This is something else.
pwe_crater_tracking_camp_04: This isn't the ratmen. The signs tell a different story.
pwe_crater_vista_reveal_01: The sky weeps. The Weave trembles. What has become of this place?
pwe_crater_vista_reveal_02: I hear the Weave hissing its pain. This is unnatural, mayflies. It must not stand.
pwe_crater_vista_reveal_03: The sky should not be thus. The Weave shudders. It is our duty to bring this to an end.
pwe_crater_vista_reveal_04: Lileath! What happened here? The veil of dreams is torn asunder.
pwe_crater_wasteland_intro_01: The trees, the buildings... Was this a warpstone meteor? It must be taken, or destroyed.
pwe_crater_wasteland_intro_02: This forest deserved better, mayflies. We must find the warpstone meteor at the crater's heart and put it beyond use.
pwe_crater_wasteland_intro_03: Warpstone fell from the sky and did all... this. We must find it, before it is put to evil purpose.
pwe_crater_wasteland_intro_04: The Weave recoils. There is warpstone at the crater's heart. We must find it, and destroy it.
pwe_crater_wasteland_tree_push_01: That tree is already dead. Let it serve our crossing.
pwe_crater_wasteland_tree_push_02: Fell the dead timber. It may serve us yet.
pwe_crater_wasteland_tree_push_03: That dead tree can find purpose yet.
pwe_crater_wasteland_tree_push_04: I permit you to fell the tree, so we may proceed.
pwe_crawl_cheers_01: I want to go home! It's not fair!
pwe_crawl_cheers_03: You may stink like rotting pigs, but I'll miss you all when you're dead!
pwe_crawl_cheers_04: Ach, this bound to be awful!
pwe_crawl_conversation_four_01: This? This is nothing. I'm perfectly... thing... You know. Sober.
pwe_crawl_conversation_nine_01: I miss my horse. He was so beautiful... And wise...
pwe_crawl_conversation_nine_02: Aye, and a good thing too. If the skaven hadn't eaten him, Bardin would have.
pwe_crawl_conversation_seven_01: I hate to say this Saltzpyre, but we've much in common. No one likes us, for starters.
pwe_crawl_conversation_ten_01: And you're a tolerable dwarf, despite the smell, the singing and that excruciating accent. Did I mention the smell?
pwe_crawl_conversation_ten_02: True enough. Look at the humans!
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_begins_02: That's fiery! Is there any more?
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_begins_05: Kneel before your Queen of Ales!
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_begins_from_sick_01: Oh the pain, the terrible pain... is gone?
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_begins_from_sick_03: That was horrible... But I feel better!
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_begins_from_sick_04: Queen Kerillian feels better, and calls for more!
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_wears_off_01: I'm tired. Won't someone carry me?
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_wears_off_02: Bored now. Need drink to make it fun again.
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_wears_off_05: I want a drink. At least one!
pwe_crawl_drunk_buff_wears_off_08: You, lackey! Bring Queen Kerillian her royal ale!
pwe_crawl_drunk_incoming_threat_01: I heard that! I did. You all saw me hearing it!
pwe_crawl_drunk_incoming_threat_02: Who goes? Approach your queen and be recognised!
pwe_crawl_drunk_incoming_threat_03: Stop making that noise! My head hurts!
pwe_crawl_drunk_knocked_down_01: Something about this doesn't feel right...
pwe_crawl_drunk_knocked_down_02: Why... Why are you all upside down?
pwe_crawl_drunk_knocked_down_03: Aid! Queen Kerillian calls for aid!
pwe_crawl_drunk_spotted_liquid_01: All drinks are Queen Kerillian's, by royal decree!
pwe_crawl_drunk_spotted_liquid_02: That looks like something to drink.
pwe_crawl_drunk_spotted_liquid_04: Come not between the queen and her drink, mayflies!
pwe_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_01: A cask of Bugman's? I hereby declare it property of Queen Kerillian the First!
pwe_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_02: We can't leave that cask here unattended, mayflies. It'll get lonely.
pwe_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_03: A whole cask of Bugman's? One of you servant-y types bring it along.
pwe_crawl_end_event_find_good_beer_04: Is that a cask of Bugman's? Blessed Lileath, we're taking that with us!
pwe_crawl_end_event_keep_quiet_01: Queen Kerillian calls for silence. Silence, I tell you!
pwe_crawl_end_event_keep_quiet_02: Hush, mayflies, hush! We're here for a drink, remember?
pwe_crawl_end_event_keep_running_03: Keep going. You don't want to be caught!
pwe_crawl_end_event_tunnel_02: Queen Kerillian tires of this tunnel!
pwe_crawl_end_event_tunnel_03: Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet?
pwe_crawl_end_event_tunnel_04: Ach, the tunnel ends at last.
pwe_crawl_end_event_waystone_01: Don't leave me behind! I don't want to be alone!
pwe_crawl_end_event_waystone_02: You may stay if you wish, but your queen is leaving!
pwe_crawl_end_event_waystone_03: I had a <hic> nice time, mayflies. But we should leave.
pwe_crawl_end_event_waystone_04: Into the portal. It's time to go home.
pwe_crawl_end_event_way_open_02: Down, down, down, into the cellar.
pwe_crawl_end_event_way_open_03: Maybe the cellar will give us a way out?
pwe_crawl_get_into_third_pub_01: Oh, sweep the obstacle aside, someone.
pwe_crawl_get_into_third_pub_03: Now, if I were a door - I'd be the best door, obviously - but where would I be?
pwe_crawl_get_into_third_pub_04: I want to get inside. Please. I just want a drink. Is that so much to ask?
pwe_crawl_get_out_soon_01: Pretty flames. Can't you see them smiling, mayflies?
pwe_crawl_get_out_soon_02: We don't need to run, mayflies. The flames only want to give us a nice, warm hug.
pwe_crawl_have_a_drink_01: Looks like this wasn't a complete waste of time after all - there's some left.
pwe_crawl_have_a_drink_02: Hands off that ale, lumberfoots. Age and beauty before... you lot.
pwe_crawl_have_a_drink_03: There we go, a nice drop for a deserving daughter.
pwe_crawl_have_a_drink_04: It'll be warm, but tolerable. I've learnt a lot of tolerance, these last few years.
pwe_crawl_head_for_first_pub_01: I'm bored already... Is there not another tavern nearby?
pwe_crawl_head_for_first_pub_02: You're stalling, mayflies - afraid I'll win our little contest? Look, I'll find another tavern.
pwe_crawl_head_for_first_pub_03: Sleepy already, lumberfoots? Can't take your drink? No? Then prove it at another tavern.
pwe_crawl_head_for_first_pub_04: We can't stop now! Where's the next tavern?
pwe_crawl_head_for_second_pub_01: I've never known a town with only one tavern, mayflies. Let's find another!
pwe_crawl_head_for_second_pub_02: We need another tavern. Oh pact-sworn? Is there another tavern nearby?
pwe_crawl_head_for_second_pub_03: Oh no. I'm sobering up. You don't want that, lumberfoots. Let's find another inn.
pwe_crawl_head_for_second_pub_04: If we don't find another tavern soon, I'm leaving.
pwe_crawl_head_for_third_pub_01: Right. We need another tavern. I, as your queen, demand nothing less!
pwe_crawl_head_for_third_pub_02: Find me another tavern, lumberfoots, and I might even favour you with a smile.
pwe_crawl_head_for_third_pub_03: I warn you, mayflies... If I don't get another drink, I might turn less pleasant...
pwe_crawl_head_for_third_pub_04: More ale, lumberfoots! Find me more ale!
pwe_crawl_heard_us_01: Leave us alone, pact-sworn! Why won't they leave us alone?
pwe_crawl_heard_us_02: You're making too much noise, lumberfoots.
pwe_crawl_heard_us_03: Again? Still, they might be bringing us drinks...
pwe_crawl_heard_us_04: Here they come again. I might make a fingerbone necklace. Oooh. Or wind chimes.
pwe_crawl_loud_crash_03: Now they'll be coming, and they'll want our Bugman's!
pwe_crawl_loud_crash_04: You don't think they'll have heard that, do you?
pwe_crawl_loud_crash_end_reply_01: Now they'll be coming, and they'll want our Bugman's!
pwe_crawl_loud_crash_end_reply_02: You don't think they'll have heard that, do you?
pwe_crawl_mid_level_banter_01: Of course, I'm only doing this to stop you all getting lonely without me.
pwe_crawl_mid_level_banter_02: A shared drink doesn't make us friends, mayflies. But keep them coming, and who knows...?
pwe_crawl_mid_level_banter_03: Please, kind lumberfoots, help this defenceless elf maid find a decent wee drink...
pwe_crawl_mid_level_banter_04: Let's do this more often, mayflies. It's almost fun.
pwe_crawl_old_path_blocked_01: Well, that's that. I'm going to have a nice sit down.
pwe_crawl_old_path_blocked_02: (sigh) I'm taking a nap. Wake me when you've cleared a path, mayflies.
pwe_crawl_old_path_blocked_03: Don't look a me. I'm not moving all that mess. That's why I have you as my servants.
pwe_crawl_old_path_blocked_04: Oh, who put all that there?
pwe_crawl_pub_brazers_01: How nice: the fires are burning in welcome.
pwe_crawl_pub_brazers_02: Nearly there, mayflies. Then we'll see who can really hold their drink.
pwe_crawl_pub_brazers_03: Can't you smell the dwarfen ale? Like old boots left out in the rain. I can't wait!
pwe_crawl_pub_brazers_04: This had better be worth it, lumberfoots.
pwe_crawl_pub_destroyed_01: Well, that's not something you see every day. Unless you're us.
pwe_crawl_pub_destroyed_03: Who did that? Show yourselves! You can't come between an elf and her drink like that!
pwe_crawl_pub_destroyed_04: And now we have to fight. Ah, it's like Araloth's Birth-Feast all over again...
pwe_crawl_pub_district_sign_01: Tavern district? We're in the right place, mayflies!
pwe_crawl_pub_district_sign_02: A whole section of the town given over to drinking? Degenerates! I like them more already!
pwe_crawl_pub_district_sign_03: So this is the tavern district? My prayers, answered!
pwe_crawl_pub_district_sign_04: A tavern 'district'? Oh, my stars what a delight!
pwe_crawl_pub_door_02: *beckoning whistle* Little door... Where are you?
pwe_crawl_pub_door_03: Oh, it's no use. Let's just have a little sleep and try again in the morning.
pwe_crawl_pub_door_04: I want to get inside. Please. I just want a drink, just one. Is that so much to ask?
pwe_crawl_pub_horde_end_01: That's not fair! Now I'm thirstier than ever!
pwe_crawl_pub_horde_end_02: So many bodies. So much death. More please!
pwe_crawl_pub_horde_end_03: They look so much smaller when they're dead, don't they? Like little dolls. Can we stuff one and keep it as a souvenir?
pwe_crawl_pub_horde_end_04: I don't know about you, mayflies, but I really need that drink now.
pwe_crawl_shortcut_01: Yes. Yes. Yes! We'll go through the park.
pwe_crawl_shortcut_02: We'll go around - through the park. You may applaud my genius later.
pwe_crawl_shortcut_03: We could always go through the park, mayflies. Last one through buys my drinks!
pwe_crawl_shortcut_04: We can go through the park.
pwe_crawl_slaughter_01: They've spilt all their ale! Serves them right.
pwe_crawl_slaughter_02: Quick! Check the bottles for dregs. They've no need of them!
pwe_crawl_slaughter_03: Don't they look pretty? Like wilted flowers all covered in red wine. Oooh. Red wine. Is there any?
pwe_crawl_slaughter_04: Like so many broken dolls. I had a doll once. I had to keep it tied up. Otherwise it stabbed all the other children.
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_01: Ach! A dwarf tavern? Their ale is nothing but grit and mould. Still, I'll outdrink you all!
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_02: The Hungry Troll? What kind of name is that?
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_03: A dwarf tavern. Ale on the floors, on the walls and in every beard. Lead on!
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_04: Dwarfs are filthy brewers, but it just so happens I like filthy brew.
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_closer_01: Must you go so slow, Mayflies? I'm thirsty.
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_closer_02: A tavern! Make way for Queen Kerillian the First!
pwe_crawl_spot_first_pub_closer_04: Are we going in circles, mayflies? Hah! Mayflies going in circles. Flitter, flitter, flitter.
pwe_crawl_spot_second_pub_02: So unfair. Especially after we've travelled all this way.
pwe_crawl_spot_second_pub_03: So unfair. I'll bet it burned down out of spite!
pwe_crawl_spot_second_pub_04: The tavern's gone? Oh, that's heart-breaking. I really wanted that drink.
pwe_crawl_spot_third_pub_01: The Obese Megalalalaladon. Am I pronouncing it right?
pwe_crawl_spot_third_pub_02: The Obese Megalodon. Let's drink it dry!
pwe_crawl_spot_third_pub_03: Now that's a sturdy looking tavern. Let's try inside!
pwe_crawl_spot_third_pub_04: The Obese Megalodon? I hereby proclaim it, and everything within, the property of Queen Kerillian the First!
pwe_crawl_tunnel_passage_01: I can't say I like what they've done to the place.
pwe_crawl_tunnel_passage_02: I like the tunnel. Very artisanal.
pwe_crawl_tunnel_passage_03: This way, mayflies! Stop dragging your big, flapping feet.
pwe_crawl_tunnel_passage_04: (laugh) It's all fallen down. Helmgart's drunk!
pwe_crawl_upstairs_02: Up, up, up the stairs, mayflies. There might be more drink...
pwe_curse_08: Let the ravens of Modryn gorge upon you!
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_01: The Spawn's having the dwarf for lunch. I'll save the jest for later...
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_02: The Spawn mauling the dwarf! It will feed to regain strength!
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_03: The Thrasher's feeding on the Dwarf! None here deserve that fate.
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_04: The Thrasher's chewing on Bardin! Hope it breaks its teeth on that thick skull of his.
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_05: Bardin's caught by the Spawn! This won't end well, lest someone lifts a finger..
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_06: I thought even dwarfs found chaos spawn repulsive, but here we are, Bardin hell-bent on getting as close as possible.
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_07: Gods! The Spawn prefers dwarf meat now? I'm not sure if that's more or less reason for it to die.
pwe_dwarf_ranger_eaten_08: Spawn's devouring the Dwarf! Kill it quick! Bardin's just an appetizer.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_a_01: The temple is close. The trees tell me so.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_a_02: Lohner wasn't wrong. There is a temple, hidden somewhere near.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_b_01: This place hails from happier times, before kinstrife and malice soured my people.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_b_02: Tread with reverence. This is no mayfly hovel we seek.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_c_01: Don't stand there gawking, lumberfoots. The temple's this way.
pwe_elven_ruins_intro_c_02: The temple's not far. It stands out like a dwarf at a formal dance.
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_01: Thrasher's devouring Kruber. Twisted thing will only get stronger, the more it eats.
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_02: The Spawn's consuming Kruber. The weave contorts in anguish.
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_03: Kruber? Do you enjoy being Spawn food? I guess we should lend a hand.
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_04: The Spawn's feeling peckish. It's feeding on Kruber, in case you missed it.
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_05: Stop that Spawn from munching on Kruber! It regains its strength by eating!
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_06: Ach, Kruber's giving the Spawn new strength by letting it devour him! Stupid mayfly!
pwe_empire_soldier_eaten_07: The Thrasher's on Kruber, Mayflies. Or what's left of him.
pwe_farmlands_intro_a_01: What's a few mayflies worth anyway? We're wasting time here, lumberfoots.
pwe_farmlands_intro_a_02: Running around after mayflies foolish enough to get caught? What has my life come to?
pwe_farmlands_intro_b_01: This is a waste of time. If the scunners have come through here, we'll find no survivors.
pwe_farmlands_intro_b_02: Mark my words. We'll find only corpses on these farms, mayflies.
pwe_farmlands_intro_c_01: Remember not to kill the survivors by mistake. That manner of thing upsets folk.
pwe_farmlands_intro_c_02: I give fair warning: if any of the survivors swing for me, they'll regret it.
pwe_fleur_conversation_eighteen_01: A castle out near Parravon's a pretty big secret.
pwe_fleur_conversation_four_01: Getting closer. Just promise me something, would you?
pwe_fleur_conversation_four_02: When you try that out in a Parravon tavern, I want to be there.
pwe_fleur_conversation_four_03: Oh, there'll definitely be a beating.
pwe_fleur_conversation_one_02: I confess, it's hard putting my feelings into words.
pwe_fleur_conversation_three_01: I swear I'm not... As Lileath is my witness ... and probably yours...
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyeight_01: Of course not. He's so happy in his ignorance. What's the harm?
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyeight_02: That, Bardin, is Sigmarite propaganda. Honestly, I'm ashamed for you.
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyfive_02: Well, every now and then Athel Loren and Bretonnia find common cause.
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyfive_03: Giving the Empire a good kicking. It's fun.
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyfour_01: So... Kruber's a Grail Knight now. Apparently. How do we feel about that?
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyfour_02: He's the same man, Sienna. The armour's a bit cleaner, that's all.
pwe_fleur_conversation_twentyfour_03: He still picks his nose with a dagger, so no.
pwe_fleur_conversation_two_01: Another attempt at a Bretonnian accent?
pwe_fleur_conversation_two_02: No... No... It's wonderful. Very authentic.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_a_01: We need to find the skaven camp.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_a_02: If we find the camp, we'll find the machines.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_b_01: It's good to walk among trees once again.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_b_02: Lileath, my heart lightens to walk in woodland again.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_c_01: The forest is screaming. She knows she is invaded.
pwe_forest_ambush_intro_c_02: The forest suffers just as much as the city.
pwe_fort_intro_a_01: Must you dally? If I miss out on any killing, I'll blame you.
pwe_fort_intro_a_02: Faster, lumberfoots, or we'll be greeted only by ruins and corpses.
pwe_fort_intro_b_01: I don't see why you won't let me lead you over the hills. It'd be quicker.
pwe_fort_intro_b_02: I could lead you faster and surer if we left the road, but I doubt you'll let me.
pwe_fort_intro_c_01: Whatever happens, we've a fight ahead, mayflies.
pwe_fort_intro_c_02: It'll be hard fighting before we're done.
pwe_gameplay_activating_magic_weapon_def: The strength of the Ancients is mine!
You cannot stop of a daughter of Loren!
I am as eternal as the ice of Atylwyth!
You cannot harm me, Lileath walks with me.
pwe_gameplay_activating_magic_weapon_off: By the gods of star and shadow!
My wrath is the fury of the world.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_02: I should have recognised this was a trap.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_03: Another wave of filth, about to crash against me.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_04: A trap! They're cleverer than I thought.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_07: They're crafty, but it'll do them no good.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_09: We'll be surrounded, but hardly helpless.
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_10: Come, feeble ones! I will end you!
pwe_gameplay_ambush_horde_spawned_13: A poor ambush, even for them.
pwe_gameplay_another_is_bunnyjumping_01: Must I put an arrow through your leg? You look ridiculous.
pwe_gameplay_another_is_bunnyjumping_02: Must you caper like an addled goblin?
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_bright_wizar: Wizard, the head is their weak point!
Aim for the head, Wizard, that should do it.
Focus on its head, Wizard, its armour is strong.
Hit it in the face, Sienna!
The head, wizard! That's the weak point!
The armour's weaker on the head, Sienna.
They're weak in the head, Sienna!
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_04: Surely you can reach its head, Bardin?
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_05: The head's the weak point, Goreksson.
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_06: Strike it in the head, Bardin!
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_07: The head, Bardin! Not the body!
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_dwarf_ranger: Dwarf, you should try to reach their heads.
Stopped by the armour, Dwarf? Aim for the head!
You lack precision Dwarf, try for its head.
Can you manage precision, Goreksson? The head!
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_empire_soldi: You should know to go for the head, Sergeant!
No effect, Sergeant, aim for the head!
Sergeant, aim for the head to avoid the armour!
It's weak in the head, Kruber!
The head! How many times do I have to say, Kruber?
Must I do everything, Kruber? Aim for the head!
pwe_gameplay_armoured_enemy_witch_hunter: Not getting through, Saltzpyre? Go for the head.
Your attacks bounce off their armour, Saltzpyre.
It's weak in the head, One-Eye - just like you!
Go for its eyes, Hunter. Maybe you'll get lucky!
Its body is armoured, Hunter, but its head is not.
Show some sense, Hunter. Hit it in the head!
You're wasting effort on armour, One-Eye.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_before_puke_02: That's not a belch it's readying!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_before_puke_05: The Troll! It's about to vomit!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_before_puke_06: Lileath! That thing's about to vomit!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_before_puke_08: Urgh! Such a vile thing. It's going to heave!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_incapacitaded_03: Ah, poor Troll. All worn out. Let me ease your burdens.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_incapacitaded_04: It's weakening. Time to take advantage.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_incapacitaded_05: Awww. Do you need a moment, Troll? You'll not get it.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_incapacitaded_06: The Troll's more your measure now, lumberfoots.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_incapacitaded_07: The Troll's vulnerable. Enjoy this moment, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_02: Stay clear! Even Goreksson wouldn't drink that!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_04: Isha! It stinks like a cesspit full of rotten hounds!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_06: Make for dry ground, before it eats your boots!
pwe_gameplay_bile_troll_vomit_pool_07: Ugh. Vile beast. And no manners.
pwe_gameplay_block_broken_by_heavy_hit_c: Don't let him hit you, wizard!
A good parry, wizard, but you'll not manage another!
Don't let him hit you, Goreksson!
There's no shame in dodging, Bardin!
No! Don't let him hit you, Bardin!
I know your skull's thick, Goreksson, but dodge!
When he strikes again, get clear!
Don't let him hit you again, Kruber!
Can you not see his blows, One-Eye? Dodge!
Evade his next blow, Hunter, or you're dead!
Not that I mind seeing you hit, but you might want to dodge the next one.
Watch his eyes! One-Eye. Move when he strikes!
One-Eye? You'll be done if the next one lands.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_being_helped_: Up, wizard! We need your flames.
I can't fight them alone, wizard.
Stand up, and I'll stand by you. Agreed?
We have many foes to burn, and little time.
Rise, wizard. Let your fires kindle.
Have you strength for another bout, Sienna?
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_01: Go in triumph, wizard. Blaze a path.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_02: Perhaps her fire burned too bright.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_04: I must press on. She would want that.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_05: Don't let her sacrifice be in vain.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_07: We've lost the wizard. Make them pay!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_dead_08: I shall miss your warmth, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_01: Kill that hook-rat! Free our pyromancer!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_02: Useless lumberfoots! Get her off that hook.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_03: Hold fast, wizard! I'll free you.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_04: Kill that Moulder-kin - it has the wizard!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_08: Free Sienna, or deal with me, lumberfoots!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_09: The hook-rat got Sienna! Move, mayflies!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_10: Pack-rat! Give me back my wizard and your death will be quick!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_11: Rat's got Sienna, and you do nothing? Argh!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_12: Kill the Packmaster! He's got our wizard!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_13: Hold fast, wizard! We'll flay that hook-rat.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_14: The hook-rat got Sienna! He'll pay for this insolence.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_grabbed_by_te: Someone help our wizard! Tentacles are bad, see?
Sienna's caught by scunner-magic! Fight it!
Cut Sienna loose! Then we'll find that Warpcaller...
Hush your noise, wizard. Help's coming.
That tentacle's taken a liking to our wizard. End that romance now.
Someone reach the wizard! She's been tentacled.
Sienna's caught! Hack her free, lumberfoots!
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_low_on_health: And I thought your blood turned to fire!
I believed you tougher than the others, wizard.
I see your fire. It wanes, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_bright_wizard_on_a_frenzy_0: The spirit of Addaioth flows through you!
Burn them! Hah! Burn them all!
You missed one. I had to kill it.
Careful your fury doesn't make you sloppy, Sienna.
Let Addaioth lend you flame, wizard!
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_01: We'll know no peace whilst the false moon waxes.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_02: We are heroes, are we not, forging a bold tale for those who follow us? Such is the tradition of my people.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_03: Lileath is my shield, and Kurnous guides my aim. But my soul? That belongs to another.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_04: Such destruction. Maybe Naieth is right: the loop of Astrian closes, and the Rhana Dandra is upon us.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_05: I'd like to walk the groves of Talsyn once more before I die, to ride on one last hunt with my brother.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_06: There is no escape from these vermin. Travel to the ends of the Weave, and you will find them, gnawing on the roots of civilisation.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_07: Yes, I count every kill. Does it matter?
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_08: The world has a soul of its own. We call it the Weave. It suffers more than you can know.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_09: There is nothing to be gained in understanding the vermin. We must exterminate them, if we can, but I fear it is already too late.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_10: I don't HATE dwarfs. I'm just not sure what purpose they serve.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_11: There are none more dangerous than the servants of Chaos. And none more deluded.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_12: Mayflies, the power these scunners worship is deeper and more dangerous than anything you can imagine.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_13: There is strength in the north, but it is birthed from a cruel womb.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_14: They are a mirror. They are what the Empire will one day become.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_15: You cannot reason with such hate. You can only oppose it while your strength lasts.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_16: For once, One-Eye is correct. These are lost souls. Only death can cure them.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_17: Mayflies, there is a void beyond this world and it is filled with the most terrible things. Pray you never see them.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_18: They say that the gods ignore our struggles. How I wish it were truly so.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_19: There is a mansion, rotten-timbered and filled with mirth. The Rotbloods' power spills from the cauldron at its heart.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_20: The Rotbloods' patron is vile, but he is not the worst of the four brothers.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_21: The seasons pass. We should be careful lest we pass with them.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_22: I do believe I'm almost growing... well, not fond of you, but I certainly hate you less.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_23: I wonder how Athel Loren fares? It has been too long.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_24: The Reikland still fails to impress. But who knows, perhaps it just needs another millennium or two?
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_25: My dreams grow worse, night by night. Something terrible is coming...
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_26: Should it matter to me, what happens to any of you? Lileath! I can't decide.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_28: Something has change of late. I can almost feel Lileath's presence.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_29: Perhaps the gods have not abandoned us. But it hardly matters if they're too powerless to act.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_30: Blessed Isha, there's corruption on the breeze. Has the world slid so far?
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_31: The tally of dead is always important.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_32: We must defend the Weave, or all is lost.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_33: If only I could return home. I care nothing for this place.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_34: The Rhana Dandra creeps closer, and we are in its path.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_35: The gods cannot save us, not if we lose hope.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_36: There is no heroism. Only necessity.
pwe_gameplay_casual_quotes_37: The sky paints a tale of unfolding doom.
pwe_gameplay_chaos_champion_charge_reply: You're not catching me with that, scunner.
He'll keep charging 'til we make him stop, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_chaos_champion_summon_reply: So much for a fair fight, scunner?
Like a rat, he talks brave but hides behind minions.
Can't face us alone after all, lummox?
Reinforcements? I have death for all.
pwe_gameplay_chaos_champion_throwing_axe: Try not catching that axe with your head!
Move yourselves - that axe'll split you!
pwe_gameplay_chaos_wizard_leech_leeching: Leech is on Bardin! Proves it'll feed on anything.
Scunner leech caught the dwarf! Kill that weave-twister.
Bardin's caught! We have a leeching to end, mayflies!
Leech on Bardin! Now, who's drinking who?
Lifeleech on the dwarf!
Leech caught Bardin!
Bardin's offering his life to the leech, mayflies. Stop that.
Bardin's about to be a lifeless husk unless we kill that leech, mayflies.
Leech is on Kruber! It better not drain what little wit he has!
Kruber's being leeched! Who's killing the scunner?
Leech is gorging on Kruber! Kill that scunner!
The Leech got Kruber, mayflies. Don't allow it to feed!
Lifeleech on Kruber!
Leech caught Kruber!
Leech found himself a Kruber, lumberfoots. It won't end well.
Kruber's being drained. End that leech, the sooner the better.
The leech got One-eye... Just sharing information here.
Lifeleech caught One-eye. Someone stop it from feeding!
One-eye's being drained by a leech! Suggestions?
Scunner's leeching off One-eye! It's drawing life!
Scunner leech on One-eye!
Leech caught One-eye!
Leech on One-eye! Spare the weave, kill it quick!
One-eye and the Scunner Leech. Romantic, isn't it?
Scunner leech on Sienna!
The leech caught Sienna! Move, mayflies!
Sienna's being drained! That leech must die a thousand deaths.
Swollen leech trying to swell up more, using Sienna! Stop it, mayflies!
Lifeleech on Sienna!
Leech caught Sienna!
We've a leech quaffing down Sienna's life, so for once, mayflies, be efficient!
Scunner obesity on Sienna! Stick a hole in it, maybe it'll deflate.
pwe_gameplay_cursed_chest_02: I see a Chest of Trials!
pwe_gameplay_cursed_chest_activated_02: Oh we always have so many nice things...
pwe_gameplay_cursed_chest_activated_03: Leave the next one alone, mayflies!
pwe_gameplay_cursed_chest_complete_02: Well, that's the brute done with.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_01: This town has paid a heavy price. By Mayfly standards, of course.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_02: Mayfly corpses smell no better than other lesser races.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_03: The corpses are lucky. The ones who were dragged of to the slave pits are not.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_04: Don't step on the bodies, lumberfoots.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_06: Suffering wherever I tread, and none of it at my hand.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_07: We'll be fine, so long as the dead stay dead.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_08: Corpses everywhere. The smell of them turns my stomach.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_09: Dead is dead. We can do nothing for them.
pwe_gameplay_dead_body_10: So many dead. And more to follow.
pwe_gameplay_dead_end_03: This must be a dead end.
pwe_gameplay_dead_end_04: Seems to be no way around here.
pwe_gameplay_dead_end_05: Who thought this way would be best?
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_killing_stormfiend_me: Stormfiend's dead. The dwarf scores another lucky strike...
Oh, we have a soothsayer dwarf. Just hit the thing on its back. Less effort.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_killing_stormfiend_ra: Aye, just hit them where it hurts. Aim for that wee bugger fused to its back.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_picks_up_a_bomb_01: Look at him. He's much happier now that he has a toy to play with.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_being_helped_u: Get up, Dwarf. It's not such a long way.
Is that axe too heavy? No? Then rise.
Quick, hold-seeker - before they come again.
Try to stop falling down, Bardin.
Come on, Goreksson. Shame to stop now, surely?
Next time, I'll leave you down there.
I don't help you lightly, dwarf.
Up, dwarf. You have foes to kill.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_02: Go proudly, son of Karak Norn.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_03: The dwarf is dead. I may yet join him.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_04: Just like a dwarf - leaving when there's work to do.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_dead_06: Don't tell ANYONE, but I might just miss the dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_01: Hah! The hook-rat could only catch the dwarf!
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_02: Keep wriggling, ranger, get off that hook.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_06: Kill the strangler, free the dwarf!
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_07: Someone free our fragrant genius dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_09: Hook-rat has the dwarf. Good or bad news?
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_10: That's our dwarf, hook-rat. Not yours.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_11: Bardin, you need help? No, sorry, can't understand any of that gargling.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_13: Hook-rat went for Bardin. I wonder why?
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_14: Bardin's making funny noises. Anyone planning to end that?
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_grabbed_by_ten: Dwarf? What's your business with that tentacle?
Bardin's walked into the Warpcaller's trap. Again.
Someone free the dwarf! I can't stand the stench of those tentacles.
Caught by a tendril? Honestly, Bardin, I'm embarrassed for you.
I'm amazed that tentacle found enough to wind around you, Dwarf!
Bardin's caught again. Summoner's tentacle. Wonder what will snare him next?
We better slice that tentacle, or we'll lose our dear dwarf!
The Dwarfs been grabbed! And yes, it's a slimy, slithery tentacle.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_low_on_health_: If you need help, dwarf, just ask.
Just die then, Dwarf. Prove I'm your better.
Rest up, dwarf. That wound needs tending.
Even your wounds have wounds, dwarf.
Our dwarf's in a bad way.
Mind those wounds, dwarf. Heal up.
Heal Dwarf, or you'll soon be dead.
You're bleeding all over Dwarf. Do something about it.
Time to heal, Dwarf. Or not.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_01: You start slow, dwarf, like an avalanche!
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_03: I told you, dwarf. Leave - some - for me.
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_04: That's it - show them your mettle, dwarf!
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_05: Go Bardin! More of that comedy combat!
pwe_gameplay_dwarf_ranger_on_a_frenzy_08: Impressive, Goreksson, but wipe that spittle from your mouth.
pwe_gameplay_elf_3_special_kills_in_a_ro: Oh, this is nothing. You should have seen me at Hoggar's Bridge. Dozens, I claimed.
Allies? Adults and children are not 'allies'. One guides the other.
I take out my frustrations where I can, wizard. And since there'll be uproar if I shoot one of you...
Next one comes, I'll be sure to let him kill you before I end him.
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_03_reply: The elf is in a lot of pain! Help her!
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_04_reply: Can I help it if they find me a challenge?
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_06_reply: Will someone please help me up?
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_07_reply: Will you stop asking foolish questions?
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_08_reply: And you'd know all about that, wouldn't you?
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_11_reply: Maybe I like it on the ground? Leave me be.
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_12_reply: Some of us aren't so near to the ground all the time, dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_elf_downed_3_times_13_reply: And when I get up, Bardin, you'd better be out of reach...
pwe_gameplay_elf_killing_rat_ogre_melee_: I'd like to see the brute crush me!
And my wits - and my looks as well, I'm sure.
pwe_gameplay_elf_killing_rat_ogre_ranged: Of course it is. Did you have any doubts in the matter?
It wasn't a strike, it was a shot.
We've spoken about this before. You'd wither before you even learn to grip a bow.
Like you'd know a good shot, or a real god if he offered to forge your sword.
pwe_gameplay_elf_killing_stormfiend_mele: Thank you for the commentary, mayfly. 'Tis of great importance to hear you recite what I just did.
Oh, there are far greater numbers involved.
pwe_gameplay_elf_potions_above_half_heal: What's the matter? Jealous 'cause your stamina's fading with age?
If you'd wanted it, Kruber, you should have taken it first, shouldn't you?
I was hurting. Besides, when did the likes of you care about proof?
Why not? No one else will.
If you have a point to make, Kruber, just make it.
My arms were tired and my leg was bloody. It seemed apt.
Our healing? I was carrying it.
How many times must I say it? I don't take orders from you.
I'm so sorry. Next time I'll suffer the excruciating pain, as you asked so nicely.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_being_helped: Some aid, Sergeant, or will you just fall again?
I thought you were a soldier?
Downed by a little scratch like that, Kruber?
You'll fight another battle yet, Kruber.
Rise up, Kruber. One last effort.
Are all imperials so eager to give up?
Up, lumberfoot. Or should I leave you?
Such a delicate flower, aren't you?
Shall we face them together, Kruber?
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_01: His life is the coin that pays for our survival.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_02: I think I might miss him. A little.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_03: He is with Sigmar now - if he be more than mere myth.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_04: How does the Empire stand with such defenders?
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_05: No more Kruber. It's just how it is.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_dead_06: For Kruber's sake, I do hope that Sigmar is real.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_04: Get that hook off the sergeant.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_05: Kill the hook-rat before we lose Kruber!
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_06: Hook-rat got Kruber! Are we content with that?
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_09: Hook-rat has Kruber! Or is it the other way around?
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_10: Fight the hook, Kruber! Show some spirit!
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_11: Strangler! It has Kruber! And it likes to strangle.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_12: Hook-rat hooked Kruber. With his hook.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_grabbed_by_t: Kruber's being dragged into another realm. Unless he suffocates first.
Is that Kruber behind that writhing mass? Aye, it is.
The summoner's tentacle's on Kruber. Now you know.
Lumberfoots? We're about to lose Kruber to that foul tendril.
Kruber and the tentacle. A never-ending story.
Hold on, Kruber, we'll dismember that tentacle for you.
Kruber? Stop wooing that tentacle. It'll make a poor mate.
Someone help Kruber. He's having a tentacle problem.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_low_on_healt: Is it bravery or stupidity that pushes you on, sergeant?
It's a wonder you're still standing, Kruber.
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_on_a_frenzy_: I've seen worse displays of valour, Sergeant. But I've seen better, too.
So you do know which end of that weapon to use, Kruber.
Don't be greedy with all the kills, Sergeant!
Kruber, your lack of finesse makes your rampage somewhat more... endearing.
So many kills, Kruber. Is that valour, or desperation?
Hah, Kruber, it's not pretty, but you get the job done!
pwe_gameplay_empire_soldier_use_shield_1: Raise your shield, Kruber. Keep them away!
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_01: Every step brings us closer to our goal.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_04: Destiny waits not for the slow.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_05: Our story is not yet finished.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_06: I remember this from my dreams.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_07: Come, I cannot kill them all alone.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_09: Must you hesitate at every turn?
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_11: Are you sleepy, mayflies? We've work to do.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_12: The gods are returning. We should not be found wanting.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_14: Mine is a tale of heroism, mayflies. You merely share it.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_15: Seize the moment, mayflies. You have so few left.
pwe_gameplay_encouraging_words_16: Keep moving, mayflies. We are not destined to fall here.
pwe_gameplay_friendly_fire_bright_wizard: Burn the rats! The rats! Not me.
Wizard? Why is my skin scorched?
Sienna? Why is my skin scorched?
Why am I on fire? Sienna?
Really, wizard? You think setting me on fire is a good idea?
pwe_gameplay_friendly_fire_dwarf_ranger_: Can't you see properly from down there, dwarf?
Should I shoot at YOU, dwarf?
Do I look like a rat, boulderbrain?
Have you rocks in your eyes, Bardin?
Dwarf, you aim like a goblin!
Do that again dwarf, and I'll skewer you.
Do you want war, Dwarf? Keep shooting me, and you'll start one.
pwe_gameplay_friendly_fire_empire_soldie: Shoot slower, mercenary. You might hit THEM.
If I take one more of your shots, sergeant...
Isha! Will someone take the Sergeants weapon from him!
You keep hitting me, Kruber! You don't want that.
Stop shooting me Kruber! Lumberfoot with a lumber-aim!
pwe_gameplay_friendly_fire_witch_hunter_: Does your good eye fail you?
Want that I should take your other eye?
Shoot at the rats, not me!
Some hunter are you, with sight so bad!
Can you not contain yourself, One-eye? Stop shooting me!
One-eye! Would you kindly refrain from shooting me!
If you cannot shoot straight, One-Eye, don't bother!
You do know you're shooting me, One-eye?
pwe_gameplay_generic_panic_in_combat_02: This life is one of many. This life is one of many...
pwe_gameplay_globadier_guck_05: Don't you feel it? The Weave rebels.
pwe_gameplay_hanging_help_01: Alright, I'll just keep hanging here, then
pwe_gameplay_hanging_help_03: I'm down here, pull me up!
pwe_gameplay_hanging_help_05: So, anyone care to pull me up?
pwe_gameplay_hanging_help_06: I am missing out, mayflies! Pull me up!
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_02: Be quicker on your feet, next time, wizard.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_03: Set another vermin alight as payment.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_05: This will hurt, but it will help.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_06: It's a wonder you're not a mass of scars.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_07: Hold still. These wounds are deep.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_08: A shame you haven't fire for blood.
pwe_gameplay_healing_bright_wizard_09: Can't have you bleed out, Sienna. You're the least annoying one.
pwe_gameplay_healing_draught_10: An elixir there, if you want to risk a mayfly alchemist's art.
pwe_gameplay_healing_draught_16: That looks like what you lot would call a healing draught.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_01: Your skin's as thick as your skull, dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_02: Hold still Dwarf, I won't salt your wound.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_04: When did you last bathe, Goreksson?
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_05: Dwarf, your 'fragrance' doesn't make this any easier.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_07: I don't relish being so close to you.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_08: You're tough, dwarf. I'll give you that.
pwe_gameplay_healing_dwarf_ranger_09: This isn't a delight for me either, and you know it.
pwe_gameplay_healing_empire_soldier_01: Duck next time, or lean into the blade.
pwe_gameplay_healing_empire_soldier_04: You were worried about this SCRATCH, mayfly?
pwe_gameplay_healing_empire_soldier_09: I'm tired of patching you up, Kruber. One day I won't.
pwe_gameplay_healing_witch_hunter_01: Not as tough as you claim, One-Eye?
pwe_gameplay_healing_witch_hunter_02: Hold still, Witch Hunter, lest you want one arm fewer.
pwe_gameplay_healing_witch_hunter_04: This wound... You should be dead, Saltzpyre.
pwe_gameplay_healing_witch_hunter_05: You should be dead. Hush your moaning.
pwe_gameplay_healing_witch_hunter_08: You're not looking so good, One-Eye.
pwe_gameplay_heard_bright_wizard_in_trou: Death shall not take you, wizard.
Your magic is strong, wizard, but your body?
Magery is fickle, wizard. Trust a sword.
pwe_gameplay_heard_dwarf_ranger_in_troub: I thought you were made of sterner stuff, ranger?
But you're already so close to the ground, dwarf.
I won't leave you behind, Goreksson.
Hush, dwarf. I'll not leave you.
So you can get closer to the ground, dwarf.
For every dwarf, an elf propping him up.
Someone help the dwarf. I think he's drunk.
You need to practice your bladework, Sienna.
If only you were as unstoppable as your flames.
pwe_gameplay_heard_empire_soldier_in_tro: I wonder that you ever earned a living, you fall down so often!
Don't pass out, mercenary, that's hardly a wound.
Kruber? Well, I suppose he should be saved.
Are you a soldier, or a jack-in-the-box?
pwe_gameplay_heard_witch_hunter_in_troub: Must you spend all night falling down, hunter?
Human gods are weak, One-Eye. They fail you.
Where is your god now, One-Eye?
Get up off the ground, One-Eye.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_spawn_01: Hear that? Not a natural beast, and not one we'd like to meet...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_spawn_02: Aye, that's a Spawn. It'll be a pleasure killing it.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_spawn_03: That Spawn's coming closer. I hope you're ready, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_spawn_04: So there's a Spawn? Don't worry lumberfoots, we'll see it soon enough.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_spawn_07: I doubt you hear it, but a Spawn's near.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_01: That clanking brute can't fool my ears...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_02: Are you deaf? There's a Chaos Warrior near...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_03: That heavy tread, arrogance in every step. It's a Chaos Warrior.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_04: Quit your yammering! There's a Chaos Warrior near.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_cha: That stench. Has to be a Chaos Champion.
That smell. A rot-helm, and one steeping in his master's favours.
The Dark Gods have sent a Champion. He's near.
Fine. Make all that noise. Only means the Champion finds us sooner.
Leech and loam! A Chaos Champion!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_warrior_com: Chaos Warrior, out to get you, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_wizard_leec: I hear a leech on the prowl.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_wizard_plag: Hush. I hear the belch and gurgle of a Plaguebrewer.
That stench can only be a Plaguebrewer. That or a pile of corpses reaching to the moons.
A stinking Sorcerer, and he's close.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_wizard_tent: The dark magics of a summoner distort the Weave.
That's not just a stench. Someone's breaching the barriers between worlds.
Sorcerer. I hear him whispering to something beyond this world.
The fleshy abundance of the Warpcaller.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_chaos_wizard_wind: I feel the winds writhing. Blightstormer.
Can you not sense it? Like dung-coated fingers dragging through the breeze.
That's the tread of a Blightstormer, mayflies. We'll see his fat face soon enough.
Well isn't that a delight. A Blightstormer, just for us and waiting nearby.
The winds! The Sorcerer torments them!
We have a Blightstormer, but not for long.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_globadier_05: It smells like Bretonnian wine gone sour.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_globadier_11: Can you not taste the poison on the wind?
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_06: Its scurrying would wake the deaf... and the dead.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_10: There's a runner in the shadows.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_11: Hush. I hear a Gutter Runner.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_12: Not as sneaky as you believe, runner.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_13: Its scurry is loud as a drumbeat.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_gutter_runner_com: That's a runner. Have a care!
Eyes that gleam in the dark... Assassin!
I hear a backstabber. They still haven't learned.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_01: That stench... Blood and fury... A minotaur.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_03: There's a minotaur's foul stench on the breeze...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_04: The ground shakes. A minotaur walks close.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_06: Hush, mayflies. A minotaur hunts us...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_minotaur_combat_0: Minotaur! I can't see it, but it's here!
Have a care, mayflies! There's a minotaur about.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_plague_monk_01: You hear that, lumberfoots? Rotting lungs and the buzzing of flies...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_plague_monk_02: I hear Plague Monks nearby. Tread with care.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_plague_monk_03: That is the sound of Plague vermin. We're about to have a fight, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_plague_monk_comba: I'll have your head, Plague Monk!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_pm_01: That putrid vile sound... Plague Vermin.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_pm_in_combat_02: Watch out for the pestilent ones!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_skaven_patrol_sto: Hush, lumberfoots. If I can hear you, so can that patrol.
Not a whisper, mayflies. Blackrat ears are sharp.
Don't draw those Stormvermin on us, mayflies.
A blackrat patrol. Evasion will serve us.
These blackrats are bold - let's not find out why.
Does the sound of these blackrats unman you?
Stormvermin! Still your tongues. Stay out of sight.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_skaven_ratling_gu: Hear that? A Ratling gun is close.
Stay quiet. Take the ratling gunners by surprise.
We're walking into a Skryre ambush...
They think we can't hear that clanking?
The breeze is acrid with warp-powder.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_Skaven_ratling_gu: A Ratling Gun, going by that scent.
Skaven gunner. Try not to get shot, mayflies.
There's warp powder on the wind. A gunner is close.
I hear the clank of a Ratling Gun.
I hear a Ratling Gunner. Close by.
I sense a gunner waiting in ambush.
Hush! We may yet surprise the gunner.
The rattle of a Skaven gunner...
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_skaven_ratling_gu: Hear that? A Ratling gun is close.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_skaven_rat_ogre_0: There's hunger in that voice, and madness besides.
A Rat Ogre is near. Make ready.
Wake up, or you'll be sleeping in a Rat Ogre's belly.
How large do these vermin grow?
Come out, Rat Ogre. Face me.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_Skaven_rat_ogre_0: It bellows, but it will fall before us!
Come, rat ogre! I'm not afraid.
A rat ogre is on us!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_Skaven_rat_ogre_c: It'll pummel you flat, and you know it!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_Skaven_warpfire_t: Ash, poison and a wisp of vermin... We've a Warpfire Thrower to deal with.
Tainted flame on the wind. Warpfire!
The unmistakable aroma of ratman artifice, and flame as well.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_standard_bearer_0: The chant of foul beasts... Look for a flag bearer...
That foul song... A flag bearer walks close...
A flag bearer... They call him to battle...
Eyes open, mayflies. There's a flag bearer near.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_standard_bearer_c: That foul chant! A flag bearer!
Foul praises! Sung to a bleak standard!
There's a flag bearer! Find it and kill it!
That chant! A flag bearer leads them!
Thin the mob! Kill the flag bearer!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_stormfiend_01: That's either a Stormfiend, or a whole pack of.. nope, Stormfiend.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_stormfiend_03: I hope you're in the mood to fight a Stormfiend, lumberfoots.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_stormfiend_06: Even you must hear that Stormfiend, mayflies?
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_stormfiend_combat: Stormfiend! Now can we kill it?
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_01: I hear a Troll. This day keeps getting better and better.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_02: That's definitely a Troll I hear. I wonder who it'll eat first?
