pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_04: Weapons ready, lumberfoots. There's something bigger and clumsier than you about.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_06: A Troll, mayflies. At least try to act competent.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_combat_05: A Troll! Kurnous bless my strike!
pwe_gameplay_hearing_a_troll_combat_08: See that Troll, mayflies? Of course not.
pwe_gameplay_hearing_marauder_berserker_: There's a Frother on the rampage.
Oh, that's not good. There's a Frother getting close.
I don't suppose that Frother might pass us by?
Frothers are about to join us, mayflies.
Be ready to welcome a Frother, lumberfoots.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_01: The question is: will there be enough for us all?
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_03: Hold your nerve. They can't match us.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_04: They think sheer numbers will prevail!
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_06: Don't look so frightened, lumberfoots. It's only a few rats.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_08: Come, vermin! My blade sings greetings.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_13: Come, wastelings! You find me ready!
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_14: It's to be numbers against skill again!
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_15: Hold fast. They may be repulsive, but they die easily enough.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_21: I'll not run from them, lumberfoots.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_22: You think that's a lot? Lumberfoots, this is nothing.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_23: Come, wretches! An Asrai is never cornered.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_24: Numbers seldom best skill. Let's prove it.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_25: Think you can match an asrai through sheer numbers? Hah, the arrogance!
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_26: We've more coming, mayflies. Pray if you must, but fight.
pwe_gameplay_hears_incoming_horde_27: There may be a lot of them, but they don't stand a chance...
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_bright_wizard_03: Don't sear me this time. Fire doesn't solve everything.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_bright_wizard_04: I'll return the favour before we're done, I'm sure.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_01: This was an aberration, dwarf, not the start of a friendship.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_02: Healed by a dwarf, Lileath have mercy.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_03: Do you even know what that's for, hold-seeker?
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_04: I owe you for this, Goreksson.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_05: This does not make us friends, dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_06: You're not doing it right, dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_07: What have I become? A dwarf's plaything?
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_08: Get your paws off me, dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_09: You are kinder than you seem.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_10: I'm fine. I only need a moment.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_dwarf_ranger_11: Getting soft in your old age, Sienna?
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_empire_soldier_02: If you must, Kruber, but be swift.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_empire_soldier_03: I was... better off before, mercenary.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_empire_soldier_04: More of your mercy, and the Pale Queen will take me.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_empire_soldier_05: Not like that, Kruber. You're making it worse.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_empire_soldier_06: Leave me be, Kruber. You're making it worse.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_01: So you are good for more than killing, One-Eye?
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_02: I suppose a torturer learns much about healing.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_04: I'll take my chances, next time.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_05: Get your paws off me, One-Eye.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_07: Your hands are filthy. Leave me be.
pwe_gameplay_helped_by_witch_hunter_08: And I thought you only knew of death.
pwe_gameplay_hit_by_goo_06: My eyes! It's in my eyes!
pwe_gameplay_hunter_3_special_kills_in_a: Not bad, One-Eye. You must truly hate them.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_caught_by_slaver_3_t: Be more careful, One-Eye. A cage would suit you ill.
Caught again. Seeking a new vocation as prey, One-eye?
Irony of ironies. The catcher caught.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_downed_3_times_01: One-Eye? Have you only one leg as well?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_downed_3_times_11: The Indefatigable Saltzpyre? I think not.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_downed_3_times_11_re: Save your breath, One-Eye. We shan't leave you.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_downed_3_times_12: Is that you down again, One-eye?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_downed_3_times_13: One-eye's down. I guess they're coming up your blind side again?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_excels_dodging_01: He missed! But how will you fare on your blind side?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_hit_by_goo_thrice_01: Always in search of the foulest air, One-Eye?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_hit_by_goo_thrice_03: Surely it's no fouler than your breath, One-Eye?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_is_bunnyjumping_01: Look at One-eye jump around. Lost what little wits he had.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_killing_a_second_rat: That's more Rat Ogre kills than you have eyes!
pwe_gameplay_hunter_killing_rat_ogre_mel: Rat Ogre's down! Nicely done, One-Eye.
Looks like meat on a butcher's slab. What were you doing, making a jigsaw?
pwe_gameplay_hunter_killing_rat_ogre_ran: A straight shot from One-Eye, and a dead Rat Ogre.
Oh my, this conversation has taken a turn for the intellectual.
Oh, the mind boggles, and the stomach heaves...
pwe_gameplay_hunter_killing_stormfiend_m: One Stormfiend down and One-eye's proud as a peacock.
The sentence fell long ago. This was the execution.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_killing_stormfiend_r: I hope that foul little thing on its back felt it.
Not sure, One-eye? Must be confusing for you.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_misses_bomb_01: Keep him away from the next one, mayflies. I've no desire to die from blackfire.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_misses_bomb_02: No. I'm not going to say anything. I'm going to rise above it.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_potions_above_half_h: Oh, the bold hunter. Wasting medicine on a cracked nail.
Was that... Did you just heal yourself? For that?
Well we'd be doomed of course! Doomed, I tell ye!
Body, maybe but your mind's a lost cause.
pwe_gameplay_hunter_tentacle_grabbed_3_t: Once more, and I'll let it drag you into the Dark Realms!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_bestigor_attack_06: I'm not afraid of you, bestigor!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_globadier_01: Move, lumberfoot! It's going to explode!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_globadier_02: Goddess! It means to kill us as it dies!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_globadier_04: Get out of the way, lumberfoot!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_globadier_05: Kallach! Get out of it's path!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_globadier_06: Stand back! It's going to explode!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_skaven_rat_ogre_04: Shoot the beast! Must I do everything?
pwe_gameplay_incoming_skaven_rat_ogre_06: So much muscle, so little mind. It must be dwarf spawn.
pwe_gameplay_incoming_skaven_rat_ogre_08: Let the beast roar all it likes, we'll fell it just the same!
pwe_gameplay_incoming_Skaven_rat_ogre_09: Roar, beast! You will not triumph!
pwe_gameplay_kiling_a_second_rat_ogre_01: A challenging kill, but I'd just as soon not fight another.
pwe_gameplay_kiling_a_second_rat_ogre_02: Lileath, but that beast ran me close.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_02: Have the dignity to die, Spawn.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_03: Death's too good for that thing.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_04: What a mess. That Spawn smells worse dead than alive.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_05: Not much of a reward, was it, Spawn?
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_06: One less aberration to soil the Weave.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_07: Addaioth, cleanse the fallen beast with fire.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_spawn_08: The Spawn is dead. Cause for revels if ever such existed!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_warrior_02: Dark Gods or not, the Chaos Warrior has fallen!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_warrior_05: Back to the soil, Chaos Warrior!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_warrior_07: What a shame. The Chaos Warrior's had enough.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_warrior_cha: The rot-helm Champion is no more!
Champion's down. We've done the world a service.
The Champion... Thank Lileath he's dead.
That scunner Champion will distort the weave no more!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_wizard_plag: Vile chanter, now go to your doom!
The Weave won't miss you, Sorcerer.
Death will cleanse your plagues, Bilechemist.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_wizard_tent: That's one summoner less we have to worry about.
No more tentacles, and that can only be a good thing.
That'll teach him to keep his tentacles to himself!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_chaos_wizard_wind: The winds die with their master!
Where are your winds now, Sorcerer?
One last gasp from the Sorcerer!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_minotaur_02: A thousand deaths would not be enough for that beast.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_minotaur_04: At last, the brute falls dead.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_minotaur_05: It's down. Thank Lileath, but it's down.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_minotaur_06: There. One less minotaur in the world.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_minotaur_08: The minotaur will trouble us no more, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_second_rat_ogre_0: The beast falls, and the Weave rejoices!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_Skaven_warpfire_t: I think we broke the Warpfire Thrower.
See, mayflies? That Warpcaster wasn't so bad.
Is that all? I was hoping for an explosion. Maybe next time.
I'm a child of Athel Loren! I'm not bested by warped contraptions!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_standard_bearer_0: The flag bearer falls! He died easy!
The flag bearer is gone to the soil!
Fall to the endless dark, flag bearer!
So much for the flag bearer!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_stormfiend_01: Killing rats never loses its entertainment. Even with the large ones!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_stormfiend_04: Roar all you like, beast. You're done for!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_stormfiend_06: Another dead Rat Ogre. You'd think it'd get dull, but I already want another to kill!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_stormfiend_07: Dead rat-beast! That's what you wanted, right?
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_stormfiend_08: Someone save a bit for the dwarf. We all know he'll eat anything.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_troll_01: If anything, the brute's marginally cleverer dead than alive.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_troll_03: Fall, Troll. And please, crush a few of your friends.
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_troll_04: The Troll's coming down. Don't get crushed!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_troll_05: Stupid creature doesn't realise it's dead!
pwe_gameplay_killing_a_troll_06: Watch it fall! That Troll won't bother us again, mayflies!
pwe_gameplay_killing_globadier_07: Foul gas-rat. Death is too good for you.
pwe_gameplay_killing_gutterrunner_05: Not so good in a fair fight, assassin?
pwe_gameplay_killing_gutterrunner_06: Go softly into your failure, assassin.
pwe_gameplay_killing_gutterrunner_07: No more kills for you, assassin!
pwe_gameplay_killing_gutterrunner_08: Dead assassin, and not before time.
pwe_gameplay_killing_lootrat_01: We got the Sack-rat! Any elven item he carried is mine, alright?
pwe_gameplay_killing_lootrat_02: No more running for the Sack-Rat!
pwe_gameplay_killing_lootrat_03: The Sack-Rat's dead! Wonder what we got?
pwe_gameplay_killing_lootrat_07: No more running for you, sack-rat.
pwe_gameplay_killing_marauder_berserker_: At last, the Berserker's shut up!
Berserker's no longer a problem. If he ever was.
One mayfly dies much like another - even the loud ones.
One madman down, an army of the same yet to vanquish.
That stopped him! Madness carries you only so far.
I hope that Berserker realised he was overmatched before he died.
pwe_gameplay_killing_packmaster_03: The Packmaster got what he deserved.
pwe_gameplay_killing_packmaster_05: No sorrow for a dead Packmaster.
pwe_gameplay_killing_packmaster_06: A dead Packmaster is a sight for song.
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_02: No, no, I'm fine down here. Don't slip in my blood.
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_05: Lileath aid me, because these fools won't.
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_06: I can't fight if the Pale Queen takes me.
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_07: Save me from the Pale Queen! Save me!
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_08: How dare you strike me down!
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_11: No, of course I don't need help. Idiots.
pwe_gameplay_knocked_down_14: How dare they strike me down...
pwe_gameplay_low_on_health_01: The Pale Queen - she calls me...

That shot... well, I suppose it did its job.
I doubt your choice of infant-god matters, mayfly.
pwe_gameplay_soldier_killing_troll_melee: All that flailing and stumbling for one troll. Is that really necessary?
pwe_gameplay_soldier_killing_troll_range: Troll's dead. Kruber CAN hit a barn door.
pwe_gameplay_soldier_misses_bomb_01: You missed! Do you earn much money as a professional soldier?
pwe_gameplay_soldier_misses_bomb_02: It takes special skill to miss so gloriously, Kruber.
pwe_gameplay_soldier_potions_above_half_: Kruber? You sure you don't need a rest, too? Looked like a nasty scratch.
You're living proof that you can.
I thought you resilient when first we met, not a frail child.
That's right, I'm in the wrong here. You're wasting supplies!
Do you not think that healing should have been saved?
pwe_gameplay_soldier_tentacle_grabbed_3_: Kruber! How many times must we cut you free?
pwe_gameplay_solider_caught_by_slaver_3_: Are they paying you to get caught, Kruber?
Is Kruber's facial hair some kind of hook-rat bait? The mayfly got caught again.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_01: A worthy strike, but must you flail so?
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_03: A good kill. Guess I need to be faster.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_04: Your clumsiness has a certain... charm.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_05: I could have killed him quicker.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_06: Almost a hint of finesse, in that kill.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_07: Don't look so pleased. It was only a vermin.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_09: All that flailing. But you can't argue with results.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_11: A good strike! But can you repeat it?
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_12: Keep this up, and I might not find you contemptible!
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_13: The mayfly knows how to strike!
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_14: Dead, and good riddance. Nice work, mayfly.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_15: Almost precise enough for an elf. A drunk, blind elf.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_16: Look at that. You actually hit something.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_18: Take your time killing it, why don't you?
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_19: The foe falls, and not before time.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_20: Never have I seen such a display...
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_21: So you can hit a slow, lumbering target, after all.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_23: You were lucky to hit him at all, lumberfoot!
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_melee_24: An adequate kill. I keep hoping you'll improve.
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_ranged_0: Luck is nothing to be proud of.
Another century, and we might make a marksman of you!
Lucky their reactions are as slow as yours.
One less abomination in the world.
Admit it! You hit him by mistake!
pwe_gameplay_special_enemy_kill_ranged_1: He walked right into it! No cause to celebrate.
Not bad, mayfly. I thought you'd miss.
Well, I suppose you had to hit sometime.
Not too bad. For a lumberfoot.
Another kill. You see, mayflies? That's how it's done.
You've mastered a trick known to an elf-child of three seasons.
pwe_gameplay_spots_ammo_05: They call these arrows? Hah! They'll have to do.
pwe_gameplay_spots_ammo_11: Crude shot, but crude shot is better than none.
pwe_gameplay_spots_ammo_13: I'm glad Araloth ain't here to see me use these worthless arrows.
pwe_gameplay_spots_ammo_15: Take whatever ammunition you can carry!
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_02: Ah, a bomb. Needs must, I suppose.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_05: It's small, filthy and noisy. Just like a dwarf.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_07: If you use that bomb, mind where you throw it!
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_11: Hello little bomb. We could do great things together.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_12: I loathe bombs. But I loathe the enemy more.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_13: What a reek that bomb has.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_15: Are we reduced to bombs now?
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_19: Has Goreksson's brain come loose or is that a bomb?
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_20: That bomb stinks of ash and tears.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_21: I loathe bombs. But I loathe losing more.
pwe_gameplay_spots_bomb_23: A bomb, for those who need it.
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_03: I'd rather some nokra-leaf, but this will do.
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_04: Healer's tools, and not before time.
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_07: Dirty Mayflies, who'd use such rags on the wounded?
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_08: Bandages, or the filthy human equivalent.
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_14: Filthy bandages. Can we do no better?
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_15: Bandages, tinctures. We have need of such.
pwe_gameplay_spots_health_16: Ugh. Mayfly healing tools. Gods help me.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_02: May this potion cure more than it causes.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_03: Some lumberfoot's brew. For desperate times only.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_05: Ugh! That potion smells of ignorance.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_07: Try not to waste this potion.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_12: A crude brew. But times are desperate.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_13: That potion may serve. If you can stomach it.
pwe_gameplay_spots_potion_16: There's a potion. Probably poisoned, but there it is.
pwe_gameplay_standard_bearer_buff_active: They draw strength from their totem!
You want to die? No? Then destroy the banner!
We can't win while the banner flies!
The banner! It's making them stronger!
We need to cut down the banner, mayflies!
pwe_gameplay_standard_bearer_buff_deacti: The banner's gone. Let's end this.
The banner's down. The fight goes out of the beasts.
No more banner. Now we win.
The banner can't save them now!
They stand alone, no gods to save them!
pwe_gameplay_standard_bearer_has_planted: Break that standard! Tear it apart!
Destroy that standard, one of you!
pwe_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_04: I'll take you with me, rat-kin!
pwe_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_06: I can't take another like that.
pwe_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_07: There are too many of them.
pwe_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_10: So many. Even I cannot... ah!... prevail.
pwe_gameplay_taking_heavy_damage_12: I'll not die here... It would be embarrassing.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_01: I hear their claws skittering on stone.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_02: The vermin hide well. Their stench does not.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_03: They've not given up. Not yet.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_07: The false moon gives them courage.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_08: Watch for stranglers. I'll not suffer a cage.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_09: These quiet moments bore me. Bring on the foe.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_10: We are watched. Do you not feel the eyes upon you?
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_12: Steady, lumberfoots. We're not out of this yet.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_14: You cannot hide your stench. I'll find you.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_15: They're still near. I hear them breathing.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_16: I don't trust this quiet. Not with scunners and ratmen everywhere.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_17: There's little chance of this peace lasting. The rats will return. The rats, or the Northlanders.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_18: A silent spell is welcome reprieve, but our battle's not yet done.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_19: Hah! Ratmen, northlanders! The one deserves the other. Let them stew together.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_20: Rats and Scunners. This Empire is rotten to its very heart. Some things don't deserve rescue.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_21: Come on, tainted ones! I'm getting bored!
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_22: Surely we've not killed them all? Seems a little... anticlimactic.
pwe_gameplay_tension_no_enemies_23: Ah, looks almost peaceful, doesn't it? Enjoy it while you can, mayflies.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_01: Stop wasting your time. He'll tire soon.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_02: Why are you still hitting him? It's plain he can't feel it.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_03: Well, that didn't work. Maybe wait until he flags?
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_04: Mayfly, you flail and you wail with no hope of success.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_05: That scunner can't feel your blows. Bide and strike!
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_06: He doesn't feel that. Stop wasting your strength!
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_02: What a shame. The raging scunner grows weak.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_05: No more stamina, Frother? What a shame.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_06: Time to dispose of this raging scunner!
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_07: Oh, Frother You've worn yourself out. And not before time.
pwe_gameplay_tips_berserker_tire_08: Can we at least kill that Frother before he recovers?
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_01: No use slashing at the Plague Vermin while they attack with fervour!
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_02: The Plague Monks will not go down while they're attacking!
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_03: Parry the Plague Vermin's flurry of blows, wait to counterattack!
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_04: They feel no pain when they attack!
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_05: We see plague vermin, we shoot on sight!
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_06: This Northlander's mad with battle. Can't feel a thing.
pwe_gameplay_tips_pm_07: He doesn't feel it! Save your strength!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_01: Eviscerate the Plaguebrewer, but get out of the way if you value breathing!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_02: This plague boils forth from the Sorcerer!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_03: Slaughter that vile Sorcerer and the flow will stop!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_04: You might like this brew, mayflies. I don't, so kill that Bilechemist!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_05: Must I do everything? Kill that Bilechemist so I can breathe again!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_06: Revolting. Kill the Sorcerer so this ends.
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_07: I'm surprised you're not filling a tankard. Why not surprise me again by killing the Sorcerer.
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_plague_08: Can we please kill that Sorcerer?
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_01: Kill the Sorcerer! Rid us of his slimy pet!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_02: Kill the summoner. That'll close the portal.
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_03: Must I do all your thinking? Kill the Sorcerer!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_04: No, mayflies, you can't harm the portal. Kill the summoner!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_05: Lumberfoots! Ignore the portal! Kill the Sorcerer!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_06: It's magic, mayflies. You can't kill it with steel. So how about Sorcerer!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_07: The portal closes with the Sorcerer's death. Is that not obvious?
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_tentacle_08: Won't someone slay that summoner? That tentacle has no manners.
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_01: The Sorcerer controls the vortex! Strike him down!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_02: See yon Sorcerer? Kill him, and the vortex is done.
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_03: No, not the storm! Kill its master!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_04: Sometimes I do wonder how you're still alive, mayflies. Kill the Sorcerer, kill the storm!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_05: The storm cannot live without its master!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_06: That Sorcerer must die if the storm is to cease!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_07: That Blightstormer is the source of this!
pwe_gameplay_tips_wizard_wind_08: This little spell won't stop me killing you, Blightstormer!
pwe_gameplay_use_shield_dwarf_ranger_02: You carry that shield as a plate to eat your swill off? Block!
pwe_gameplay_use_shield_dwarf_ranger_04: By the heavens, block with your shield, dwarf!
pwe_gameplay_use_shield_empire_soldier_0: Block with that shield of yours, Sergeant
Your shield just hangs there, use it Kruber!
pwe_gameplay_using_a_weapon_shrine_02: I like this one. I'll keep it.
pwe_gameplay_using_a_weapon_shrine_03: It's not perfect, but nor is life.
pwe_gameplay_using_a_weapon_shrine_04: Huh. It's better balanced than I expected.
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_03: I hope this heals better than it tastes.
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_06: Revolting, but it could be worse.
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_07: The taste is worse than the smell.
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_10: Hold on, mayflies. I'm going to drink.
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_13: What in Drakira's name is in this bottle?
pwe_gameplay_using_potion_14: A vile brew, make no mistake.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_banter_reply_01: Oh, that's new. Fresh and inspiring, even.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_banter_reply_02: I'm just about to tire of your voice.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_banter_reply_03: Aye, I appreciate it might look like that in your tiny mind, rat.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_banter_reply_04: So much prattle, so little else.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_banter_reply_raskni: Yes, of course! I'm ordered around by that rat in particular. Wise beyond words, this one.
The weave sent us. But fine... Rasknitt, a Sartosan pirate and the Lady of the lake also sent us. Happy?
Doesn't matter who sent us. You die just the same.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_charge_attack_taunt: Another rat out his tiny mind!
pwe_gameplay_warlord_cleave_attack_taunt: Hah, he makes Kruber look refined!
Ach, the most dull witted of dull-witted brutes!
pwe_gameplay_warlord_summoning_reply_01: More rats on their way, if you failed to notice.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_summoning_reply_03: Aye, summon your arrow-fodder. I don't mind.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_tips_01: Back off, or do something, lumberfoot.
pwe_gameplay_warlord_tips_02: Stop being such a target, lumberfoot!
pwe_gameplay_warlord_tips_04: Since when is simply standing there a viable tactic, lumberfoot?
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_being_helped_u: Would you lose the other eye, mayfly?
Up, Saltzpyre. I can't even see any blood.
Honestly. Such a fuss over a wee scratch.
Up, One-Eye. Think of all those heretics left to burn.
No. You're not dead. More's the pity.
That's another one you owe me, One-eye.
Where is your god now, One-Eye?
Here. But you owe me now.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_dead_02: There is no peace in death for Saltzpyre.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_dead_03: Shed no tears. Saltzpyre was dead inside.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_dead_04: I shall miss One-Eye's swordplay, but not his tongue.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_dead_07: One-eye is gone. He'll find no solace.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_03: One-Eye's being dragged off. I can't allow the hook-rat the pleasure.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_05: The hook-rat went for One-Eye! Now we go for the hook-rat?
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_07: I suppose someone should get One-Eye off that hook?
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_10: Personally I'd say the strangler's welcome to One-Eye.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_grabbed_by_ten: The tentacle has One-Eye. I guess it has no taste.
Stop struggling, One-Eye. It likes you.
Tentacle has One-Eye A match made in heaven.
One-Eye? Hold on, we'll get you out of that.
No. I suppose we can't let the tentacle have One-Eye.
One-Eye? We can free him, if we're quick!
Oh look. The tentacle has One-Eye. That's a shame.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_low_on_health_: Don't you think blood is better on the inside, One-Eye?
Those wounds won't close by themselves.
Your willpower is failing you, Saltzpyre.
You should tend your wounds, One-Eye.
You're more bloodless than usual, One-Eye.
Just an observation but One-Eye's about to perish.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_04: You've proved your worth this day, Saltzpyre.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_06: Not bad, for a one-eyed mayfly.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_07: Calm yourself down, One-Eye. Lest you strain something.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_08: Well, One-Eye's gone mad, in case anyone missed it.
pwe_gameplay_witch_hunter_on_a_frenzy_09: Hah, One-eye has a taste for mindless slaughter, who'd have thought?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_3_special_kills_in_a: You've talent, wizard. My sisters could teach you a thing or two, assuming they didn't kill you first.
Careful, Kruber. You'll have old One-Eye jealous.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_caught_by_slaver_3_t: Can you not see them coming, Sienna?
No, wizard, this isn't good. Too much being dragged and hung, not enough charred corpses.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_01: Wizard? Do we need to slow our pace?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_11: Sienna's down again! Someone help her!
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_11_re: We're not counting your failures, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_12: That's Sienna down again? Not your lucky day, wizard.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_13: Sienna, have you lost a leg perhaps? You're down all the time.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_downed_3_times_13_re: A Fire Wizard with a wooden leg! That could be fun.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_hit_by_goo_thrice_01: Stay out of the gas, wizard! How many times?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_is_bunnyjumping_01: Hopping around? I thought you had more dignity, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_a_second_rat: A second Rat Ogre falls before the flames!
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_rat_ogre_mel: That was a fine hit, Sienna. Who taught you?
If that was flirting hitting my ears, then Ereth Khiall, take me away.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_rat_ogre_ran: Rat Ogre's down. My thanks, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_spawn_ranged: Spawn's down. I don't think it liked your flames, Sienna.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_m: Close quarters with a Stormfiend. You're far from an ordinary wizard, Sienna.
Further proof I simply cannot relate to the mayfly experience.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_stormfiend_r: Flames for the flame-beast. Well done, wizard.
Put it like that, mayfly, and Bardin's bound to start eating them,
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_troll_melee_: Poor old troll never stood a chance.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_killing_troll_ranged: A charred troll is such a fine sight.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_misses_bomb_02: That bomb missed by a wide margin. I expected better.
pwe_gameplay_wizard_potions_above_half_h: You're so stoic. I could have sworn that was just a scratch.
It's just that I can't believe you wasted our supplies on that little bruise.
Healing, now? I expected better from you.
Oh, delicate little flower. Did a breeze sway you?
pwe_gameplay_wizard_tentacle_grabbed_3_t: Stay AWAY from those tentacles, pyromancer.
pwe_generic_cold_inside_01: Stop shivering. You're making me feel cold.
pwe_generic_cold_inside_02: Oh, is it cold in here?
pwe_generic_cold_inside_03: Is it really that cold? Stop chattering your teeth.
pwe_generic_cold_inside_04: The cold will keep us focused, mayflies.
pwe_generic_cold_outside_01: Is it cold? I hadn't noticed.
pwe_generic_cold_outside_02: Call this cold? You've no idea what cold is.
pwe_generic_cold_outside_03: I like it. Clear. Fresh. Bracing.
pwe_generic_cold_outside_04: Feel the cold crackle against your skin, mayflies.
pwe_generic_dark_02: There could be anything in here with us...
pwe_generic_getting_dark_outside_04: Is it me, or is it getting darker?
pwe_generic_objective_complete_04: We could hardly have been slower.
pwe_generic_path_blocked_02: We're on the wrong side? Typical.
pwe_generic_rain_04: A little rain makes everything better!
pwe_generic_search_complete_02: At last. I thought we'd never find it.
pwe_generic_search_start_01: Can you see what we're after?
pwe_generic_success_01: We got there in the end.
pwe_generic_unexpected_event_04: What a surprise... It's a surprise.
pwe_gold_weave_conversation_one_01: There is little natural here, only artifice.
pwe_gold_weave_conversation_one_02: What a pretty sentiment. Are you trying to turn my head?
pwe_gold_weave_conversation_three_01: Just how many wizards haven't you wanted to set aflame?
pwe_gold_weave_conversation_two_01: So suspicious, One-Eye. I thought you loved everyone.
pwe_grey_weave_conversation_one_01: Trust nothing? Does that include you, Saltzpyre?
pwe_grey_weave_conversation_two_01: Caught between light and dark. I feel almost at home.
pwe_ground_zero_intro_a_01: Does it not worry you that we've come so close without interference?
pwe_ground_zero_intro_b_01: Step lightly, or suffer the consequences. It's always the way.
pwe_ground_zero_intro_b_02: No need to delay. Death will find us, or it will not.
pwe_ground_zero_intro_c_01: Halescourge is a blight. His life ends by our hands!
pwe_ground_zero_intro_c_02: Enough! The sorcerer must die! The Weave reviles his presence!
pwe_helmgart_military_intro_a_01: Make some noise, Lohner said. Has he not heard you glaikit lot clomping around? Noise is what you're good at.
pwe_helmgart_military_intro_a_02: If a distraction is required, then we shall of course provide.
pwe_helmgart_military_intro_b_01: I understand we're approaching along the city wall. What can go wrong with that?
pwe_helmgart_military_intro_b_02: Another mayfly town. I'd much rather fight for something important.
pwe_helmgart_military_intro_c_02: No point putting it off, I suppose.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_a_01: Lohner could at least have explained why this was necessary.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_a_02: Did Lohner give any explanation at all for this scheme of his?
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_b_01: The old mother is investigating the Skittergate. Necessary work, and worth protecting.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_b_02: Olesya is investigating the Skittergate. I hope she's faring well.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_c_01: Good for her. She has the wit and the way for such work.
pwe_helmgart_military_mid_c_02: A good choice. She'll perform the task well.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_city_blocked_01: Do not despair at the blocked path. Isha will guide us.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_city_dead_priest: A faithful servant and an untimely end. Seek your reward, priest.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_city_found_artef: Steeped in corruption. Isha preserve us all from its malice.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_city_keep_moving: Hold true your course. I'll not abandon you.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_city_raining_01: Do you feel the rain? Isha blesses us.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_burn_food_0: This tainted mulch is abomination. It must be burned!
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_01: Hold! Isha is with us! We will prevail!
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_foul_air_01: Corruption is near. We shall cleanse this place.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_river_01: Where a river flows, there is hope of renewal.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_search_01: With Isha's guidance, we will find the source.
pwe_hm_level_bogenhafen_slum_too_quiet_0: An ambush awaits. Stay close to me. Shelter beneath my boughs.
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_01: The Spawn's on Sienna! Send it back to hell!
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_02: Stare into the abyss of madness, witch! Remember this lesson in corruption after we've cut down the Spawn!
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_03: Our witch is the Spawn's target! Stop the ravenous thing from feeding!
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_04: A walking corruption and an affront to all that is sane and wholesome! Apparently, it also eats witches.
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_05: The Thrasher caught the witch! Provoke it's imbecile mind with pain!
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_06: The Spawn engorges itself on the witch! Run it through! My prisoner is not for eating!
pwe_hright_wizard_eaten_07: Sienna's caught by the Thrasher! Stay away from its maw, witch!
pwe_hub_grudgemark_a_01: Grudgemarks? Do I look like some hired assassin?
pwe_hub_grudgemark_a_02: I say that if a dwarf wants grudges settling, he can settle them himself.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_b_01: Undertaking tasks for an imaginary friend? It's a nonsense.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_b_02: I don't mind the killing, but doing so at the behest of an imaginary dwarf ... ?
pwe_hub_grudgemark_c_01: Well, I suppose we should get it over with.
pwe_hub_grudgemark_c_02: If Okri had any pride, he'd not send us to do his dirty work.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_eigthteen_01: There's no need. My kin know exactly where I am, and why.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_one_02: Those things l still need, more than you can ever fathom. But here I am, to the disappointment of many, including myself. And before you ask,. it is none of your business why and where I went.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_three_02: The Old Mother could have asked. I am not pleased with her, nor you, but her motives were... fair, I suppose. Send your underlings to clean up and restore the shrine as recompense, and then... I might forgive you.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_hm_two_02: You were spying on me! You made Olesya use her talents so you could magically peep and pry! Thank your mayfly god it doesn't serve my interest to see your gut sliced open.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_nineteen_01: I doubt it. Take my advice: tell your agents to steer well clear.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_seventeen_01: I'm giving them dodging practice. Something they desperately need.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_one_02: You imply that I should know in detail about this insignificant event, simply because I'm an elf? Very well, take my advice and tell your agents to steer well clear of the area.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_three_02: I strongly suggest you stop right there Lohner. Meddling in affairs that are none of your concern, or even beyond your faculties to understand, could have... significant consequences on your wellbeing.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sh_two_02: You keep talking more about an insignificant event, and now adding the wellspring of insignificance that occurred after the first event. of no significance whatsoever. Your mind is addled from the dwarf 'food' you've been cooking, Lohner.
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_sixteen_01: For now. Perhaps you'd like to kiss my feet, while you have the chance?
pwe_hub_lohner_conversation_twenty_01: No. You may delight in the role of trained monkey, Lohner. I do not.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_eigthteen_01: When this is done, I will take you, if I'm able. You will not see another wonder like it in your lifetime.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_nineteen_01: Only twice so far today, old mother.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_seventeen_01: Not I, old mother. Your ears are playing tricks again.
pwe_hub_olesya_conversation_twenty_01: Were I pretending anything, you'd never know.
pwe_jade_weave_conversation_one_01: This is how the world should be, mayflies. The bounty of the Weave unsullied.
pwe_jade_weave_conversation_three_02: Ach, leave it alone. Some things, you're not meant to control. Me, for instance.
pwe_last_hero_standing_01: The lumberfoots have fallen. I'm so surprised.
pwe_last_hero_standing_03: Let's see what I can do, now the mayflies aren't holding me back!
pwe_last_hero_standing_04: Down and out. Well, they are mayflies.
pwe_last_hero_standing_05: Time to grieve later. Well, for those who mattered.
pwe_last_hero_standing_07: Drakira! Guide my strikes. I've blood to repay.
pwe_last_hero_standing_08: Mayflies always fade, but I'll miss them, all the same.
pwe_level_bell_chime_02: The toll of doom. Curse the ratmen!
pwe_level_bell_chime_03: That cursed clamour! It's the bell!
pwe_level_bell_chime_04: The bell awakens! Cover your ears!
pwe_level_bell_destroyed_01: Hah! And the bell is no more!
pwe_level_bell_destroyed_02: That bell is certainly dealt with.
pwe_level_bell_destroyed_03: It is done. We have won, they have lost.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_01: There it is, foul thing. I hope you're ready, cause I'm in no mood for patience.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_02: Bell in sight. Commence mayhem and destruction, mates.
pwe_level_bell_destroy_bell_03: Chains, mayflies. Must I do all your thinking for you?
pwe_level_bell_distance_01: There it is, mayflies! If you can see that far.
pwe_level_bell_distance_02: I see the bell, lumberfoots. I hope you've your walking boots on.
pwe_level_bell_effect_01: Screech all you wish, rats! The bell's enchantment shall not save you!
pwe_level_bell_effect_02: The chime rouses their madness. We'll face frenzied hordes.
pwe_level_bell_effect_03: Screech all you wish, rats! The bell's enchantment shall not save you!
pwe_level_bell_effect_04: Madness with every chime. Slay them all!
pwe_level_bell_exit_01: Let's not hang around. We need to get going.
pwe_level_bell_exit_02: I hope we've a shorter walk to the portal.
pwe_level_bell_falling_01: Haha! We simply can't step out of our beds without causing something like that, can we?
pwe_level_bell_falling_02: I like that racket far more! Cursed thing got what it deserved.
pwe_level_bell_falling_04: Let the chimes ring out, one last time.
pwe_level_bell_horde_01: That sound! The bell calls them forth.
pwe_level_bell_horde_02: They'll keep coming, lured by the bell.
pwe_level_bell_horde_04: The bell rings, and they answer!
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_01: I've had billets like this, and hated every minute.
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_02: No fun, living down in the pauper's yards.
pwe_level_bell_poor_quarters_03: And you mayflies wonder why I hate cities?
pwe_level_bell_rain_01: More rain. Still, not as bad as Stromdorf.
pwe_level_bell_rain_02: Rain? Refreshing? Fine, I like being dry more.
pwe_level_bell_reaching_bell_01: We're at the bell. Make it worth the effort, mayflies.
pwe_level_bell_reaching_bell_02: Cheer up, mayflies! We're here and they don't like it.
pwe_level_bell_reaching_bell_03: Alright, We've come a long way and I'm not leaving without making a mark. We usually do though, so no worries.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_01: Just think, a month back they'd have shoo'd our kind out of these streets. Well, my kind at least.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_02: Now, this is more like it. Windows. Servants. Drains.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_03: Always wanted to afford a little abode like one of these. And only afford. Not a city-dweller, me.
pwe_level_bell_rich_quarters_knight_04: Just think, a month back they'd have shoo'd our kind out of these streets. Well, before the whole Knight thing, anyway.
pwe_level_bell_rooftops_01: Over the rooftops? Can't say I care for it. In fact, been a bit much.
pwe_level_bell_rooftops_02: The rooftops. Always with the bloody up and down.
pwe_level_bell_spotting_01: There's the bell. Getting closer all the time.
pwe_level_bell_spotting_03: A brisk walk, mayflies and we'll be there.
pwe_level_bell_vista_01: Can't see much through the rain.
pwe_level_bell_vista_02: Climbed a long way, haven't we?
pwe_level_bell_vista_03: This would be a fine view, if the buildings were not here.
pwe_level_bell_vista_04: Brooding skies, marred by ugly mayfly buildings.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_artefact_01: Find the Blightreaper. My head swims with the foulness of this place.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_artefact_02: Let us hope the sword's still here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_artefact_03: Seek the runesword, mayflies. It must be here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_artefact_04: So where did the priest hide the sword?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_blocked_01: The path is blocked. Let us hope there's another way around.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_blocked_03: Can you shrink to the size of an insect? If not, there's no way through.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_blocked_04: And our path is blocked. Why am I not surprised?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_01: Sigmar is a jealous god, but others thrive in his shadow.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_02: Another god? Is there no limit to mayfly invention?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_03: Another statue to worship. How to they find the time?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_bogenauer_04: Divine observance requires more than just raising statues...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_braziers_01: Wake the brazier. Let's see what we have.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_braziers_03: Set the torch to the brazier, mayflies.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_braziers_04: We'll need more light. Wake the brazier.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_dead_priest_01: Waste no tears for the mayfly. Does he have the key?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_dead_priest_02: We have the key, so the priest's death matters little.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_dead_priest_03: Dead and gone. But does he still have the key?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_dead_priest_04: So much for the protection of the mighty Sigmar.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_defiled_01: More proof that Sigmar is but a speck amongst the divine.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_defiled_02: How feckless must Sigmar be, to allow this in his temple?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_defiled_04: Lileath! Is there no end to this corruption?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_escape_01: I feel that sword gnawing at my spirit. Better we bring it to Lohner, and fast.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_escape_02: We're not out of this yet!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_escape_03: Seek the waystone, mayflies, before we're overrun.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_escape_04: We should be gone. Every moment we linger tempts fate.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_find_priest_ke: Of course the priest isn't where he promised.
Where is this wretched priest? I suppose we'll have to find him.
The gate's locked, and the priest is missing. Perfect.
Well, I see our priest is as reliable as the rest of his ilk.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_found_artefact: A revolting blade. Fit only for scunners.
Do we have the sword? About time.
So much desolation from so insignificant a sword. A lesson for us all.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_01: A three-legged skeleton? Sounds like the start of a bad joke...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_02: Who'd go to the trouble of putting a three-legged skeleton down here?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_03: A three-legged goblin? Admittedly, he's lost a little weight.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_goblin_04: Starved bones don't exactly inspire confidence...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_here_they_come: At least we'll not be bored!
The scunners return. Let's make them regret it!
Brave heart, lumberfoots. We'll not die here!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_infestation_01: The wealthy streets are thick with infestation.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_infestation_02: Proof, as if any were needed, that the rot began in wealthy streets.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_infestation_03: See there? The wealthy quarter seethes with the unnatural.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_infestation_04: Coin is no defence against the Dark Gods. And greed too often calls them forth.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_a_01: See? This is what happens when you let dwarfs play with magic.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_a_02: I hope removing the sword heals Bögenhafen's ills. But I am not sure.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_b_01: The Blightreaper once came to Athel Loren. That was a black day... Some of the glades never recovered.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_b_02: We know of the Blightreaper in Athel Loren. Scarloc once slew its bearer. If only he'd destroyed the sword as well.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_c_01: Can we trust this priest? Friend of Saltzpyre's or not, there's much that could go wrong.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_intro_c_02: Well, Bögenhafen's fate's in the hands of a priest now, mayflies. What could possibly go awry?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_keep_moving_01: Do you want to be left behind? Keep moving!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_keep_moving_02: Hurry, lumberfoots. We can't stay here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_keep_moving_04: We can't rest yet. We need to keep moving.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_01: Mayflies. Who else would find a series of loud bangs 'exciting'?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_02: Here's us, shedding blood in the town's defence. There's them, drinking heavily and deaf to it all.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_03: Oh, there's nothing I like more than risking my life while others celebrate...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_noisy_04: Drunk, blind and insensate. Just like all mayflies. We should let them rot.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_objective_find: Look for a lever. A switch. Anything.
Let's find that switch, while we are still able!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_objective_next: A glimpse of green does not guarantee spring.
There's little time. Pick up the pace.
We've more to do. Don't stop.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_raining_02: Thank Isha! The rain washes away the stench.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_raining_03: Stop scowling. It's only a little rain.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_raining_04: At least the rain is clean. Unlike much of this town.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_revelry_01: That cheer is born of ignorance.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_revelry_02: There are no eyes so blind as those who refuse to see.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_revelry_03: Our actions may yet save their bodies, but their souls are thick with hedonism's rot.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_revelry_04: Too much joy, and with too little cause. Mayflies ever celebrate too soon.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_01: There is a hidden room. It must be the sanctum we seek.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_02: The sanctum must be here, and so must its entrance.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_03: There will be a concealed entrance to the sanctum. Seek its release.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_04: Seek a mechanism, lumberfoots. The sanctum must be revealed.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sanctum_books_: No good will come of reading from these shelves, mayflies.
A collection of primitive daubings, and dark primal truths.
So many secrets in one place. So many timeless perils.
Can you not hear them? The books want to be freed. We must leave them be.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sewers_01: Oh, I see we came the pretty way, as usual.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sewers_02: We don't exactly see these places at their best, do we?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sewers_03: Crawling through muck, with death waiting all around...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_sewers_04: You do show me the prettiest places, mayflies.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_smoke_pillar_0: We ruined a perfectly good slum quarter, do you know that?
The fires still blaze. We may have overstepped.
That's some blaze. A warm night on the northern bank, for those who live.
That's our handiwork blazing still. So much water nearby, and no wit to use it.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_one_01: The next time Lohner sends us into a sewer, I've a mind to refuse.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_one_02: And how are your feet, Kruber?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_six_01: You wouldn't want this particular broth, Goreksson. It's got mayflies in it.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_ten_01: Is that a note of concern I hear, Saltzpyre?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_ten_02: We'll do what we can. But there are no guarantees.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_three_01: They don't. Not true dwarfs. Most of them live out east, in a land of spires and flame.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_story_twelve_0: And a heart of stone... But just this once, I agree with him.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_taking_too_lon: Faster! There's too much at stake to linger.
As usual, you set a turgid pace.
At this rate, there'll be nothing of the town left to save.
Come along, lumberfoots. Must you dawdle?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_temple_01: We must return to the temple.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_temple_03: Back to the temple. We've no time to lose.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_temple_04: To the temple. We've wasted enough time already.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_torch_01: Bring the torch. We'll need it.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_torch_03: Light is always welcome. If only the torch didn't stink so.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_torch_04: This will be easier with the torch than without it.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_way_out_01: Well, that solves our problem, doesn't it? The blockage is gone.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_way_out_02: The way is open, thanks to the foe.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_way_out_03: Our foes have set us free.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_city_way_out_04: The enemy has cleared the path. Hah!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_ambush_02: They come gladly to their deaths, do they not?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_ambush_04: Stay together, lumberfoots. They mustn't divide us!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_burn_food_01: Waste no more time! Burn it to ash!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_burn_food_03: What are we waiting for? Burn it all!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_burn_food_04: Set it all aflame! Fire cleanses all.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_cannon_01: We need a door, and that cannon stands idle.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_cannon_02: Well, if the powder's dry, that cannon can make our exit.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_cannon_03: We're out of options. The cannon, and quickly.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_cannon_04: We'll have to use the cannon. Morai-Heg curse me for saying so.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_end_01: I'm filthy and I'm sore, and yet I know we're coming back to this sullen town.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_end_02: No answers, and more questions. Lohner is sure to send us back.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_end_03: We have purged a portion of the evil, no more. This is not over.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_end_04: We're not finished here, mayflies. As much as I wish it otherwise...
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_escape_01: We'll have to run, or as close as you can manage.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_escape_02: Keep moving! There's no end to them!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_escape_03: Keep running, lumberfoots! We've come too far to fall now!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_escape_04: Faster! Nethu take you all for your slowness.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_find_hideout_0: At last. Let's get this over with.
I'd say this is the place, lumberfoots.
Would you say this warrants a closer look?
At last. Turn over enough leaves, and the roots reveal themselves.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_01: We need better ground. A room to fortify.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_02: We cannot face them out here. Can we barricade that room?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_03: We need to fight on stronger ground. Fortify that room!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_04: The battle turns, and not in our favour. We'll barricade that room!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_fortify_prep_0: Bar the windows! The fewer surprises, the better!
Must I think of everything? Seal the windows!
We can't leave those windows open, we'll have scunners everywhere.
Nail the windows, and nail them shut!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_foul_air_01: There is a foul smell in here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_foul_air_02: That stench... fouler than a dwarf.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_foul_air_03: Lileath! What is that unnatural odour?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_foul_air_04: That stench is no natural decay, mayflies.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_01: So, this lair... Do we even know where to start looking?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_02: You could hide a second town in this squalor, let alone a bandit lair.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_03: Let us hope these 'Black Hooks' are as witless in concealment as they are at choosing names.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_gang_04: We could search for an age in this mess and still not find the Black Hooks' lair.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_a_01: Lohner was right - there is plague in this place. I can smell it from here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_a_02: There's plague on the breeze. Have a care, lest it claim you too.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_b_01: Lohner claims the Black Hook gang are involved. They will answer to me, I promise you that.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_b_02: Hard to believe a mayfly rabble could be involved in their own destruction.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_c_01: They'll be hiding, but we'll find them. And then they'll talk.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_intro_c_02: Well, the sooner we find their hideout, the sooner we'll know for sure.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noble_food_01: On the crates - a noble crest, or one that deems itself so.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noble_food_02: This food has no place here. It was meant for richer climes.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noble_food_03: If the food was stolen, as the rest, our true problem lies elsewhere.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noble_food_04: These provisions were stolen from richer climes.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noisy_exit_01: They'll be coming now. Depend upon it.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noisy_exit_02: Well, that clamour should make departure... challenging.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noisy_exit_03: The scunners will have heard. We should be gone.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_noisy_exit_04: A little louder next time, mayflies. I think there are ogres in the Mountains of Mourn still sleeping.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_river_02: I pity the river, to be hemmed in so.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_river_03: The river is sluggish. This town has robbed it of vigour.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_river_04: The town improves little beyond the water.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_search_01: Let's make good use of the time we've bought. Search everywhere!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_search_02: What were they protecting, I wonder?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_search_04: There must be secrets to be found here. Why else fight to defend this nest?
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_slum_01: So this is the poor quarter? Well, I do not see the difference.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_slum_02: Such a fine sight, well worth leaving Athel Loren to see.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_slum_03: Those who live here would be better off dead.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_slum_04: You see a slum, I see mankind in its natural condition.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_squalor_01: No matter how low my opinion of mankind, it can always slide further.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_squalor_02: This town is a disgrace. Only humans could live here.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_squalor_03: Even beasts have more dignity than to live in such a place.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_squalor_04: I give this place a decade before it sinks into the mud, no more.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_stolen_goods_0: The Black Hooks seem to know their trade, do they not?
They could at least have the dignity to steal from outsiders.
Their thievery does not offend, only their brazen manner.
Quite the trove. And none of it fairly bartered.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_eleven_0: Are you happy now we've set light to something, Sienna?
I'm sure opportunities will present themselves.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_five_01: This is more than mere pestilence. The Dark Gods hang heavy over Bögenhafen.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_five_02: I have been scratching, it's true. But I thought that was Bardin's lice escaping his beard.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_one_02: About this place? I think not.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_seven_01: A few, but why prey on your own kind when there are so many mayflies close to hand.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_seven_02: Aye. They have to be good for something.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_six_01: Kruber? Know that I consider you amongst the least-annoying mayflies I have not yet slain.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_six_02: A compliment. Lohner said I should try to be more 'nice'.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_story_three_01: Better than Bretonnia' isn't the triumph you might think.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_tainted_food_0: There is black enchantment in that food.
The food is tainted by immortal hand.
Hands to yourselves, mayflies - there's a curse upon that food.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_58_01: Warehouses piled high, and not a watchman in sight.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_58_02: The river brings wealth to this town, but the mayflies treat it poorly in return.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_58_03: Without the river, this town would have died long ago.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_58_04: A town built on trade, and the remains of far older cities.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_wall_01: We'll find a way through. We must!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_wall_02: The wall. It's all that stands between us and safety.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_wall_03: The waystone's beyond the wall. Keep going!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_the_wall_04: Through the wall. It isn't over yet!
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_too_quiet_01: I hear voices. Breathing. Something waits.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_too_quiet_02: This place is not so empty as it appears.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_too_quiet_03: There is roughness amongst the silence. Breaths. The scrape of skin on leather.
pwe_level_bogenhafen_slum_too_quiet_04: We are watched. Watched by fools who think themselves silent.
pwe_level_catacombs_apothercary_room_01: An apothecary's lair. Take whatever you can use.
pwe_level_catacombs_apothercary_room_02: This apothecary's lair is not so primitive as I had supposed.
pwe_level_catacombs_apothercary_room_03: Search the room. The herbalist may be gone, but perhaps his creations remain.
pwe_level_catacombs_apothercary_room_04: A stockpile of potions and the like, mostly smashed.
pwe_level_catacombs_confinement_cells_01: These cells are suffused with sorrow. Little genuine madness was caged here.
pwe_level_catacombs_confinement_cells_02: Madness is too often a convenient label, rather than diagnosis.
pwe_level_catacombs_confinement_cells_03: The days are coming when lunacy will be the norm, rather than the exception.
pwe_level_catacombs_confinement_cells_04: Humans have always caged what they do not understand.
pwe_level_catacombs_correct_switch_01: That's better. The door is open!
pwe_level_catacombs_correct_switch_02: One door open, and another sealed gnomically shut.
pwe_level_catacombs_correct_switch_03: Well, that's a door open. Shame there's another one.
pwe_level_catacombs_correct_switch_04: Open one door, only to face another. Sounds like a bad prophecy.
pwe_level_catacombs_cultist_door_01: Rotblood scrawl. The marking must have significance.
pwe_level_catacombs_cultist_door_02: A crude sign for a crude people.
pwe_level_catacombs_cultist_door_03: The northlanders' marks are as lumpen as their bodies.
pwe_level_catacombs_healing_ward_01: There was a fight in this place. But where are the bodies?
pwe_level_catacombs_healing_ward_02: What a mess. Even for a lumberfoot hospice.
pwe_level_catacombs_healing_ward_04: Something doesn't add up here? Where's everyone gone?
pwe_level_catacombs_hear_chanting_01: A chant in the Dark Tongue. My fears were correct...
pwe_level_catacombs_hear_chanting_02: That, lumberfoots, is the sound of a ritual reaching its peak. We don't have long.
pwe_level_catacombs_hear_chanting_03: That chant. There's a ritual ahead. And answers too.
pwe_level_catacombs_hear_chanting_04: An ominous sound, even without the echo. Ready yourselves, mayflies.
pwe_level_catacombs_jump_into_intestine_: I will jump down there, but I'll remember this, mayflies.
Down there!? Gods I wish you were joking.
Yes, let's all jump into the suspicious-looking hole. What can go wrong?
I suppose there's no other choice. We'll have to keep going downwards.
pwe_level_catacombs_mausoleum_entrance_0: So much death. Ill-revered, despite the maker's intent.
How old is this place? Do the folk of Helmgart even know it exists?
A sanctum of death. This cannot be coincidence.
There are old ghosts here, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_catacombs_nurgle_water_01: Ugh! And I thought the sewers were bad.
pwe_level_catacombs_nurgle_water_02: The deeper we go, the worse it gets.
pwe_level_catacombs_nurgle_water_03: That water - if it is water - smells worse than it looks.
pwe_level_catacombs_nurgle_water_04: Try not to touch the water. You don't know what lives within.
pwe_level_catacombs_one_sorcerer_dead_01: See? There falls a sorcerer, eaten from within by his own ritual.
pwe_level_catacombs_one_sorcerer_dead_02: The ritual magic's feasting on its creators!
pwe_level_catacombs_one_sorcerer_dead_03: The scunner sorcerers are being consumed by their own magic!
pwe_level_catacombs_one_sorcerer_dead_04: (laugh) See, mayflies? The ritual's draining its creators.
pwe_level_catacombs_ritual_disrupted_rit: It is done! The energy dissipates!
Can you not feel it, mayflies? A baleful presence flees!
The ritual is broken! The Plaguefather is denied!
The way is closed, daemon! Good riddance!
pwe_level_catacombs_ritual_exit_through_: Olesya calls us back. We should go.
Lohner must be told of what has passed here. We need to enter the portal.
I've had more than enough of this place. Into the portal, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_catacombs_sabotage_ritual_01: (laugh) Their weak scunner magic can't handle us!
pwe_level_catacombs_sabotage_ritual_02: (laugh) If only their spells were are strong as their stench. Our presence disrupts the ritual!
pwe_level_catacombs_sabotage_ritual_03: (laugh) Really? Your ritual can't handle a guest or two?
pwe_level_catacombs_sabotage_ritual_04: Stay in the circle, mayflies. We're sapping their ritual.
pwe_level_catacombs_sewers_01: Yes. This is indeed every bit as fine as I'd imagined.
pwe_level_catacombs_sewers_02: I confess, I see little difference between this sewer and the roads high above.
pwe_level_catacombs_sewers_03: Filthy though this water is, it can't hide the stench of those who came before us.
pwe_level_catacombs_sewers_04: I shall never complain about another swamp, so long as I never again set foot in a sewer!
pwe_level_catacombs_sewers_nurgleficatio: The tainted Garden. I've seen it in my dreams. I'd hope not to see it whilst awake.
This place is steeped in Chaos. It may be that Helmgart is not for saving, lumberfoots.
The Plaguefather's pets have found purchase in these stones. This is not good.
Isha! This is worse than I thought. Dark powers gather in our path.
This is not mortal filth. It is the spoor of true madness, given viscous form.
The Dark Realms intrude upon our world. This is not good, mayflies.
Are you too glaikit to recognise the truth of this? Our foes do the bidding of Nurgle.
pwe_level_catacombs_shield_of_flies_04: Cease fire! We cannot win that way!
pwe_level_catacombs_slime_trail_01: (disgruntled noise) Foul. But I suppose we should see where it leads.
pwe_level_catacombs_slime_trail_02: A disgusting trail, but a trail nonetheless.
pwe_level_catacombs_slime_trail_03: That ooze should be easy enough to follow. The smell alone...
pwe_level_catacombs_slime_trail_04: We have a trail, lumberfoots. A nauseating, slimy trail.
pwe_level_catacombs_spot_ritual_01: No! They wouldn't dare... They seek to summon a daemon!
pwe_level_catacombs_spot_ritual_02: It's a daemon summoning, woven from death and decay!
pwe_level_catacombs_spot_ritual_03: So this is why they stole the dead? To feed their daemon-ritual?
pwe_level_catacombs_spot_ritual_04: The sorcerers must be silenced! They work to summon a greater daemon.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_four_01: So many books. It's almost impressive, is it not, Kruber?
pwe_level_catacombs_story_four_02: What tone? I merely complimented this fine library.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_four_03: (laugh) You really must learn to cultivate some self-esteem, Kruber.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_seven_01: I only repeat what I've seen in dreams. A gilded cage, and a cauldron. She weeps, and her tears fall upon this world like rain.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_ten_01: As do I. They smell revolting.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_two_01: Those without swords seldom do when war reaches their door.
pwe_level_catacombs_story_two_02: And you're telling me you'd stay your blade, simply because your foe was unarmed?
pwe_level_catacombs_switch_instructions_: We need to find the correct switch, mayflies.
One of these should open the door.
pwe_level_catacombs_tunnel_entrance_01: Ugh! Sewers again? I get to see all the finest domains.
pwe_level_catacombs_tunnel_entrance_02: This was their point of entry, and beyond... A sewer. Of course.
pwe_level_catacombs_tunnel_entrance_03: Hurry along, mayflies. The sooner we're through, the sooner the task is done.
pwe_level_catacombs_tunnel_entrance_04: The sleekit wretches have come in from below.
pwe_level_catacombs_two_sorcerer_dead_04: Look at them fall! A fate well-deserved!
pwe_level_catacombs_way_is_clear_01: At last! Can we go now?
pwe_level_catacombs_way_is_clear_02: We've a clear path. Let's use it while we can.
pwe_level_catacombs_way_is_clear_03: It's about time. Even I was dying of old age in here.
pwe_level_catacombs_way_is_clear_04: So... Can we get out of here now?
pwe_level_catacombs_whoa_wrong_switch_01: I'm guessing that was the wrong switch.
pwe_level_catacombs_whoa_wrong_switch_02: I think we'll have to choose again.
pwe_level_catacombs_whoa_wrong_switch_03: Maybe the right switch next time?
pwe_level_catacombs_whoa_wrong_switch_04: So, how do we feel like that went, mayflies? Or is the door open, and I just can't see it?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_arena_01: A circle of death, marked in blood.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_arena_03: Is this an arena? Only a fool seeks worth in a staged battle.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_arena_04: Typical scunner cheers... Of course, this is an arena.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_battering_ram_0: Bring the battering ram. We'll need it.
That battering ram'll help with the gate.
Drag the ram along, lumberfoots. We can break the gate down.
We'll use their own battering ram. (laugh)
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_battering_ram_u: The ram's in position. Let it sing!
What are you waiting for, lumberfoots? Bring the gate down.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_cabin_01: Are mayflies truly equipped to handle solitude?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_cabin_02: Not everyone seeks the embrace of kith and kin.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_cabin_03: Solitude may serve peace of mind, but it is a poor defence against invasion.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_cabin_04: In my society, hermits are honoured. I doubt it is so in yours.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_camp_view_01: There. Our destination, in all its suspect glory.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_camp_view_02: The war camp. Are we ready for this, mayflies?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_camp_view_03: The encampment's larger than I thought.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_camp_view_04: There it is. Squatting in the swamp like a dragon's rotting bones.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_dead_champion_0: Be as loud in life as you wish. In death, silence takes all.
He was certainly persistent, while he lasted.
So much rage, and so little skill to guide it.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_depart_02: They seek to overwhelm us. Fight on!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_depart_03: Too late, scunners! Your leader's chopped offal now!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_depart_04: Seek an exit, before we're overwhelmed.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_fight_themselve: So much for them fighting one another...
They're still too interested in us for my liking...
Our plan has lurched headlong into a nest of thorns.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_01: They lie in wait amongst the ruins.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_02: A ghost village waits to claim more victims.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_03: The Urithairi think I can't hear them lurking within those huts.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_04: That village is far from empty.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ghost_town_stat: The Weave reclaims all in the end, this village included.
There is no victory over the swamp, as this village proves.
Sooner or later, decay always wins. Perhaps that is why these Urithairi worship it so?
Why would anyone build such a village at all? (disgruntled noise)
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_01: We've reached the outer edge, but the heart we seek lies further in.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_02: This is merely the encampment's outer edge. Hovels for outcasts and the desperate.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_03: These tents are practically in the water. It's as if they seek rotten lungs.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_islands_04: We draw closer with every step. These revolting dwellings mark the path.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_keep_fighting_0: Don't let them trap you, mayflies! We need to find the champion!
Deeper into the camp! Go! Go! Find the champion!
Getting tired, lumberfoots? We've a champion to kill yet!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_live_in_swamp_0: Marshland is seldom the Weave's most attractive face.
A rotten domain - perfect for rotten-hearted Urithairi.
I don't mind the mud. It's the stench. It'll be days before I lose it from my nostrils.
Why do these northlanders feel such kinship with the swamp?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_01: For every obstacle bested, another arises. In this case, another wall.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_02: No celebrating, mayflies. There's a second wall, yet.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_03: I see another wall. Knowing our luck, there'll be a third beyond, and a dragon beyond that.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_outer_gate_04: We've another wall to get through yet, mayflies.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_01: A sleekit bit of improvisation, but it saw the task done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_02: Can we please leave this swamp?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_03: Let's leave the Urithairi to their swamp. The two go together nicely.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_portal_04: There's the portal. Get me away from this muck.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ravine_01: More foes approach unseen. Curse this ravine!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_ravine_02: I hear clomping footsteps that are not our own.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_eight_01: Did you see that travesty back there?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_eight_02: I'm not talking about the mayflies.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_eight_03: The tree. Poor thing twisted and gnawed at by dark magic.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_four_01: In my experience, scunners and even you mayflies will worship anything. Even a patch of filthy water.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_four_02: Please. You call upon past wizards as your touchstone. Wizards you know nothing about save their names.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_ten_01: You call this a swamp? You should see the Mires of Modryn, back in Athel Loren.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_two_01: Do you want rid of me, Master Dwarf?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_story_two_02: And what's wrong with my singing?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_01: Our lair remains undiscovered, and our work is done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_02: Lohner can come out from under his table. The danger is done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_03: Dead mayflies can't find hidden bases, and we left that champion dead as dead can be.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_success_04: That wasn't our tidiest solution, but it should keep Lohner happy... and safe.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_01: The tree's cursed, and purposefully so.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_02: Dark magic swirls about this place. Let us hope their ritual is not yet done.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_03: A tree hung with rotting flesh. How... quaint.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_tree_04: See the tree? Sacrifice has ever been the least pleasant way to attract a god's notice.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_01: That wall won't keep us out.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_02: Smearing defences with blood. A primitive's urge, not a warrior's.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_03: Aim true for the gate, lumberfoots!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_wall_04: Straight through that gate, mayflies! Swift and true as an arrow!
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_01: A watchtower is little use in this muck. Patrols and sentries serve better.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_02: The Urithairi keep slack watch, else we'd already be overwhelmed.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_03: Thank Isha there were no watchtowers further out.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_watchtower_04: That watchtower will surely sink before long.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_01: Two paths before us. Which do we follow?
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_02: Do not let the choice of paths tempt you to separation, mayflies.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_03: The path divides. We should not.
pwe_level_chaos_war_camp_which_way_04: The mire calls. Which woeful path do you prefer, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_01: They weren't expecting that. (laugh) Where's the champion?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_02: Well, we're in. Where's the champion?
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_03: Come to me, oh Urithairi champion. Let us dance the Dance of Blades!
pwe_level_chaos_war_surprise_04: I bring vengeance to visit on your champion!
pwe_level_crawl_intro_a_01: You hate me... You all hate me. You're jealous, that's what it is.
pwe_level_crawl_intro_a_02: I feel a bit... (giggle) What was in those bottles?
pwe_level_crawl_intro_b_01: And now all my ale is gone. Gone. Gone. Gone. How sad.
pwe_level_crawl_intro_b_02: Where's my ale? I bet one of you mayflies stole it! Give it back!
pwe_level_crawl_intro_c_01: More ale! I demand more ale!
pwe_level_crawl_intro_c_02: My feet hurt! Can't we just go home?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_big_tree_01: Well met, grandfather red-oak. You still stand watch, I see?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_big_tree_02: There is more wisdom in one branch of that mighty tree than in all your bodies combined, mayflies.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_big_tree_03: Well, if they paid reverence to this mighty one, perhaps the Ulthuani of this place were not so foolish after all.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_big_tree_04: Can you not hear? The tree mourns lost kin as much as you or I.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_broken_waystone_01: Blessed Isha, more souls gone to the thirsting one...
pwe_level_elven_ruins_broken_waystone_02: May Loec guide you, fallen cousins...
pwe_level_elven_ruins_broken_waystone_03: Things are very wrong if a waystone has fallen.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_broken_waystone_04: My cousins would guard the world, but how can they reach so far when even their own dead are beyond their aegis?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_clearing_01: What use is your pride now, cousins? Sooner or later, fortresses and accomplishments fade like dreams.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_clearing_02: The style is familiar enough to provoke a pang, but only a brief one.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_clearing_03: The stones themselves are infused with memories. They speak of loss, and of dying days.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_clearing_04: Even in decay, this place reeks of arrogance. How easily forgotten are once-necessary duties.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_cliff_edge_01: If anyone's after some broken bones, now's the time.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_cliff_edge_02: Stop gawping at the view, mayflies.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_cliff_edge_03: Must I really drag you past every adequate vista, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_cliff_edge_04: A long way down. A harder climb back up.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_entering_ruins_01: With nothing to anchor them, the leylines will have grown wild.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_entering_ruins_02: The ruins pulse with magic. And magic is at the heart of our woes.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_entering_ruins_03: My cousins build readily enough, but tend their works with less enthusiasm.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_entering_ruins_04: Everything falls in time. Even the work of elves.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_exit_02: Through that passage, unless you want to die here!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_exit_04: Where's our exit? Perhaps that passage?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_first_aligned_plea: The air... Isha, it's like sunshine in King's Glade...
Feel that, mayflies? The magic is calming.
Would that I could bask in this feeling forever!
That feels good. Do you sense the tumult fading?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_great_glade_01: This land is tainted, but it fights to be free of the corruption.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_great_glade_02: Can you not hear the voices of the trees? They cry for our help.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_great_glade_03: There is nothing wrong with this glade that slaughter could not cure.
