pwe_level_elven_ruins_great_glade_04: There is an age of wisdom in this place. It is hoarded amidst the roots, and speaks only to those worthy of its secrets.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_approach_01: These trees have been corrupted by wild magic. It is mercy to shatter their boughs.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_approach_02: No clear way through. Very well, we'll forge our own path.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_approach_03: Kind words and good intentions will not part these boughs. Steel will have to serve.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_approach_04: If we are to pass, this maze must be parted.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_interior_02: A clear head and a keen eye will find us a way through.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_interior_03: Surely this maze does not confuse you, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_maze_interior_04: Keep at it! We can find a way through.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_noisy_puzzle_02: Hush your noise, misused core. This will soon be over.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_01: Back, creatures! I shall not abide your presence here a moment longer!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_02: The temple is... aware? As if it knows the depths of its failure.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_03: We cannot cleanse this place, the enemy is too strong. But we can perhaps undo their works.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_proper_04: Isha! I feel a resonance here. So many memories, fighting their way to the surface.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_ravine_approach_01: Eyes sharp, mayflies! This ravine's a bottleneck.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_ravine_approach_02: Hurry, lumberfoots! Don't let a little water slow you down!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_ravine_approach_03: Perfect spot for an ambush, what say we turn the tables?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_ravine_approach_04: There's a foul stench in the air. Keep a sharp eye.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_second_aligned_02: The temple is coming to life! Keep going!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_second_aligned_03: That's it, mayflies! Just one more!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_second_aligned_04: One more, mayflies. The magic is receding!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_seeing_puzzle_01: See the core? It's lost alignment.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_seeing_puzzle_02: The core has been disrupted. No wonder the leylines are so fractious.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_seeing_puzzle_03: If we can realign the core, there's a chance to put things right.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_seeing_puzzle_04: We must reach the core, and put it right, if we can.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_seeing_puzzle_crys: The crystals, mayflies. Must I do everything?
Look for the control crystals. They should respond to touch.
Find the crystals mayflies. The configuration suggests three in total.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_shattered_temple_0: This will be the world's fate before long, mayflies. Torn apart by uncontrolled magic.
We've found the source of our woes, lumberfoots. Arrogance and sabotage spawned it.
We must enter that maelstrom. Gird yourselves.
The temple may be beyond saving. Nevertheless, we must try.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_skaven_banners_02: The foul banners of Clan Fester. They have become our shadow.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_skaven_banners_03: The Skaven dare come so close to the temple? Teach them their folly!
pwe_level_elven_ruins_skaven_banners_04: The rats have grown comfortable here.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_eleven_01: Those who remain would as gladly skewer a dwarf as a Skaven.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_eleven_02: And how would your vaunted Grimnir look upon my kind?
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_four_01: There's nothing more beautiful than nature unbound, sergeant. You should learn to appreciate it.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_one_01: My people? These were not my people. They exiled us, cast us out. So certain of their path, with so little cause.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_six_01: And, unless you show a little more respect it will be a long time again.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_three_01: You're one to talk, Dwarf. One little earthquake, and your kind took to hiding amongst the rocks, instead of ruling from atop them.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_three_02: Then take my advice: do not bide too long, lest the world also reclaim your lands as it has this place.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_two_01: Only that it was raised by fools, who sought control over everything else.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_story_two_02: (bitter laugh) They are not my people, wizard. Not any more. Ulthuan is tomb, only no one there knows that they are already dead.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_task_complete_01: We are finished with this place. Let it be forgotten once more.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_task_complete_02: Farewell, haunt of my distant kin.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_task_complete_03: Olesya calls the Bridge of Shadows. That's our cue to leave.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_task_complete_04: The temple is whole again, in all ways that matter. Let us depart.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_untouched_01: At last, a bit of real wilderness. It almost reminds me of home.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_untouched_02: Would that the whole world regained this splendour.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_untouched_03: Far from axes and greed, the natural world blossoms and breathes a sigh of relief.
pwe_level_elven_ruins_untouched_04: This place is a wonder. There should be more of its kind.
pwe_level_farmlands_cart_02: Lumberfoots? That cart's in the way!
pwe_level_farmlands_cart_03: The cart is blocking the gate. Maybe we should move it?
pwe_level_farmlands_cart_04: That cart needs moving. (disgruntled noise) Must I do it myself?
pwe_level_farmlands_deserted_01: We're too late this time, mayflies.
pwe_level_farmlands_deserted_02: On this occasion, we have no salvation to bring.
pwe_level_farmlands_deserted_03: There's no one to save, lumberfoots. Make your peace with that.
pwe_level_farmlands_deserted_04: The farm has fallen. We cannot save its folk.
pwe_level_farmlands_end_level_01: No more cages, and no more folk to save. We should move on.
pwe_level_farmlands_end_level_02: Normally I loathe playing the mayfly hero, but today...?
pwe_level_farmlands_end_level_03: The captives are free. We can take our leave.
pwe_level_farmlands_end_level_04: No more cages to break, and no more captives to save. Time we were gone.
pwe_level_farmlands_fence_01: Can you not climb that fence, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_farmlands_fence_02: Oh, does that lofty little fence intimidate you, mayflies? Climb over before you die of old age.
pwe_level_farmlands_fence_03: Blessed Gods, climb over the fence.
pwe_level_farmlands_fence_04: We need to climb the fence, mayflies.
pwe_level_farmlands_investigate_farm_01: Well, that's the first farm. Let's get it over with.
pwe_level_farmlands_investigate_farm_03: There's a farm coming up. Or what's left of one.
pwe_level_farmlands_investigate_farm_04: That place was overrun. It'll be blood and ruin in there.
pwe_level_farmlands_kill_the_brute_02: Another monster falls. It has paid for its brutality.
pwe_level_farmlands_kill_the_brute_03: (laugh) All of a sudden, my spirits are lifted!
pwe_level_farmlands_kill_the_brute_04: Does its blood satisfy you, mayflies?
pwe_level_farmlands_last_farm_01: Morgensloft isn't far. Steel yourselves for the worst, mayflies.
pwe_level_farmlands_last_farm_02: Personally I wouldn't object to finding a few mayflies yet alive at Morgensloft.
pwe_level_farmlands_last_farm_03: Morgensloft draws close, and our rescue mission begins.
pwe_level_farmlands_last_farm_04: Do any captives yet live at Morgensloft? We'll soon find out.
pwe_level_farmlands_locked_gate_01: No way through that gate, lumberfoots. Not without a key.
pwe_level_farmlands_locked_gate_02: Is there another way in? No... find the key.
pwe_level_farmlands_locked_gate_04: Unless you've a better idea mayflies, I suggest we look for a key.
pwe_level_farmlands_monster_in_barn_01: ...is there something in the barn? Open the door!
pwe_level_farmlands_monster_in_barn_02: ...what's that sound? Something in the barn?
pwe_level_farmlands_monster_in_barn_03: ...there's something brutal in the barn. Open it up and be ready!
pwe_level_farmlands_monster_in_barn_04: The barn. There's something within. Something... hungry.
pwe_level_farmlands_move_on_01: We cannot help the dead. Our efforts are better spent on the living.
pwe_level_farmlands_move_on_02: We can't waste time. Morgensloft needs us.
pwe_level_farmlands_move_on_03: We can do little more here, except slake our blades.
pwe_level_farmlands_next_farm_01: There's no time to avenge the dead - not if we would save the living.
pwe_level_farmlands_next_farm_02: No cages. At least, not here.
pwe_level_farmlands_next_farm_03: We ought to press on, while we can.
pwe_level_farmlands_next_farm_04: There is nothing left for us at this farm.
pwe_level_farmlands_no_prisoners_01: No one to free. Just bodies.
pwe_level_farmlands_no_prisoners_03: No prisoners here, not that we expected any.
pwe_level_farmlands_no_prisoners_04: Gods! There's been a slaughter here.
pwe_level_farmlands_orchard_01: These trees are tamed. They're all but dead.
pwe_level_farmlands_orchard_02: A cruel way to treat them. The poor trees are screaming. Can you not hear it?
pwe_level_farmlands_orchard_03: It makes me shudder to see what you mayflies do to the trees.
pwe_level_farmlands_orchard_04: See what your farmers have done to these trees, mayflies? Bound, mutilated and twisted.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_01: Make for the portal, but I've a feeling we'll be back this way.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_03: Make for the Bridge of Shadows. We'll need Lohner's aid if we're to help the town.
pwe_level_farmlands_portal_04: The portal opens. Perhaps Olesya can deliver us into the benighted town. Wouldn't that be fun, mayflies?
pwe_level_farmlands_prisoners_01: No more cages. Not while I draw breath.
pwe_level_farmlands_prisoners_02: Free your fellows, mayflies. This much, at least, we can do.
pwe_level_farmlands_prisoners_03: You found your kin, mayflies. Kept alive for a reason.
pwe_level_farmlands_prisoners_04: We could free the captives quietly, without blood spilled, but where would be the fun in that?
pwe_level_farmlands_smoke_plume_01: That smoke! The scunners have turned their attention to a town.
pwe_level_farmlands_smoke_plume_02: The town is beset. That's a great many souls beneath the slaver's lash.
pwe_level_farmlands_smoke_plume_04: Smoke on the horizon brings more than a breath of bitterness.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_nine_01: I was warned that certainty would lead me astray. Now see what my actions have wrought.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_nine_02: Indeed, but firm action slithers a brood all of its own. Only a fool could claim to know their ambitions.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_nine_03: Then ignore me. It's better for us both.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_one_01: A fine upbringing. Close to the land is close to the Weave. Who knows, Kruber. Perhaps you're marked by it?
pwe_level_farmlands_story_six_01: Hah! The scourge of heretics lectures me on compassion?
pwe_level_farmlands_story_six_02: You mean to say you'd fight for my kind, if they needed you?
pwe_level_farmlands_story_six_03: Then it's well they shall never have need of you, is it not?
pwe_level_farmlands_story_three_01: If you don't mind me saying so Sienna, you're taking this all rather personally.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_twelve_01: Worse than you thought, perhaps. I have no such illusions.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_twelve_02: What's the point? The Dark Gods have come. Hope is a poor shield against such ill fortune.
pwe_level_farmlands_story_two_01: Let me guess, they raised you as one of their own? (laugh)
pwe_level_farmlands_story_two_03: Why of course your bovine majesty!
pwe_level_farmlands_through_the_barn_01: Can we take a shortcut through the barn?
pwe_level_farmlands_through_the_barn_02: Does our path not lead through the barn?
pwe_level_farmlands_through_the_barn_03: Through the barn, lumberfoots. Time's a-wasting.
pwe_level_farmlands_through_the_barn_04: We could just go through the barn.
pwe_level_farmlands_unlocking_the_cage_0: Keep watch! I'll free the prisoner.
Stand guard. I don't want a blade in the back.
Foolish mayfly, to be caught and caged...
pwe_level_farmland_stick_to_the_road_01: No one should endure a cage, not even a mayfly.
pwe_level_farmland_stick_to_the_road_03: You can be sure that if the Northlanders are taking slaves, there's a reason why.
pwe_level_farmland_stick_to_the_road_04: So we might yet save a few slaves. But it's a drop of water in a surging river.
pwe_level_fort_and_again_02: A good beginning, but a beginning only.
pwe_level_fort_and_again_03: That's a fine start. But we must follow with another.
pwe_level_fort_and_again_04: One more hit. That should bring it down.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_01: The brutish machine has fired its last. Use the other.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_02: The barrel is clogged. Use the other cannon.
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_03: This cannon will fire no more. What of the other?
pwe_level_fort_barrel_fouled_04: This cannon has fired its last. Is the other still hale?
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_01: No more cannonballs. Seek them out!
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_02: Without shot, this lump's of little use to us.
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_03: You want to shoot again? We'll need a cannonball.
pwe_level_fort_cannonballs_04: You want to shoot again? We'll need a cannonball.
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_01: No more blackfire belching from the fort, mayflies. It'll soon be over.
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_02: You do notice the sudden lack of cannon-fire, mayflies?
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_03: The cannons are silent. Screams will follow, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_cannons_silenced_04: The cannons are silent. Screams will follow, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_carriage_01: Really, lumberfoots? Can't climb over a carriage?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_02: Come along, mayflies. Can't you climb?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_03: Lileath! Surely you can climb over that?
pwe_level_fort_carriage_04: Surely that carriage can't block your way, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_01: Don't grow complacent. We've still northlanders to slaughter.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_02: The northlanders fight on. Teach them their folly.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_03: The northlanders fight on. Teach them their folly.
pwe_level_fort_clear_courtyard_04: Come, lumberfoots. We'll end the northlanders' feeble struggles.
pwe_level_fort_complete_01: The Fort is saved. What else can we achieve?
pwe_level_fort_complete_02: We have done as bidden. Let the garrison clean up the mess.
pwe_level_fort_complete_03: The Fort is saved. What else can we achieve?
pwe_level_fort_complete_04: We have done as bidden. Let the garrison clean up the mess.
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_01: And I suppose you're too busy to help?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_02: What does he think we are, his servants?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_03: Keeping the easy job for yourself, are you?
pwe_level_fort_confirmation_04: Idle sapling. I bet there aren't even any rats in there.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_01: Step lightly lumberfoots, or I'll not see you again.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_02: Unsafe? This? I'm used to logs that are still moving.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_03: As good as a road to an elf... and perhaps to a lumberfoot.
pwe_level_fort_cross_here_04: A broad bridge... for the stout-hearted...
pwe_level_fort_fire_02: What are you waiting for, mayflies? Fire!
pwe_level_fort_fire_04: Now let the filthy thing sing.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_fire_03: See, there? We can hit it, if our aim is true.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_01: Hah! That'll see the matter ended!
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_02: A final lesson for you, ratmen!
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_03: Do you need another lesson, ratmen, or will that serve?
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_final_hit_04: Do you need another lesson, ratmen, or will that serve?
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_01: Bring the ugly cannon to bear.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_02: Aim with care, mayflies. We may not get another shot.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_03: Let's hope this vile thing fires true.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_04: A crude tool, but it should serve.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_01: Gods of heaven! It actually worked!
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_02: Well I never. It actually hit.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_03: Well I never. It actually hit.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_first_hit_04: Catapult's down. Through luck, more than skill.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_fuse_is_lit_0: Now let the filthy thing sing.
Now let the filthy thing sing.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_01: Oh look, they're bringing us another.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_02: Seems we get to do it all again, mayflies. There's a second catapult.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_03: Oh look, they're bringing us another.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_04: Seems we get to do it all again, mayflies. There's a second catapult.
pwe_level_fort_fire_cannon_second_hit_02: Another acceptable shot. Another felled machine.
pwe_level_fort_gate_fallen_01: Heard that? It means our troubles are only beginning.
pwe_level_fort_gate_fallen_02: That was the gate. There won't be a lack of rats and scunners ahead.
pwe_level_fort_gate_fallen_03: The gate has fallen. We may be too late.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_01: Let us hope this secret path was not merely Lohner's fancy.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_02: Let us hope this secret path exists. It's a long climb.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_03: Let us hope this secret path exists. It's a long climb.
pwe_level_fort_getting_closer_04: We can only hope there is a secret path.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_01: I suppose we can return to the road now, if we must.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_02: The road beckons us again, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_03: Is there a route back to the road? The obstruction is long behind.
pwe_level_fort_get_back_on_road_04: Mayflies? Do we wish to re-join the road?
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_01: And now we leave the road behind. Hah!
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_02: It'll be quicker to find a way around than through, mayflies.
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_03: Off the road, mayflies. We'll yet find another path.
pwe_level_fort_jump_down_04: The road will attend to itself. We'll find another way around.
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_destroyed_02: Splinters and bones, nothing else remains!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_01: That gas. (cough) The catapult's still firing!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_03: We cannot prevail while the catapult still fires!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_04: The plague claw will be the death of us!
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_aler: Bombardment! Stay out of the sludge!
Stay out of the filth. Or don't, if you care nothing for agony.
Stay out of the filth. Or don't, if you care nothing for agony.
pwe_level_fort_plague_claw_shelling_move: Must we linger? I've no wish to dissolve.
Lurking beneath a poison rain is no way to die.
Must we tarry in this poisonous deluge?
Lurking beneath a poison rain is no way to die.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_01: What does the cursed thing need? Powder, yes? And shot?
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_02: The clumsy thing needs powder and shot.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_03: The limber's empty. We need powder and shot.
pwe_level_fort_powder_and_shot_04: Search for ammunition. There must be some.
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_01: Either we take the Outer Courtyard, mayflies, or we might as well go home.
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_02: To the Outer Courtyard. Do you want this fort saved or not, mayflies?
pwe_level_fort_push_them_back_03: The Outer Courtyard, lumberfoots! Either we take it, or we lose. Your choice.
pwe_level_fort_river_01: We'll search upriver.. unless you'd rather go home?
pwe_level_fort_river_03: There might be another crossing point downriver.
pwe_level_fort_river_04: We'll head upstream. With luck, we'll find a fording point.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_01: I bring greetings from Athel Loren!
pwe_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_02: Tired of mayflies, pact-sworn? Try me.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_everywhere_04: A good many foes. Enough for us all.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_run_01: Rats. Faster in retreat than ever in advance.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_run_02: And the rats shall scamper away like the cowards they are.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_run_03: See the vermin flee! That sight'll never get old.
pwe_level_fort_skaven_run_04: Faster in retreat than ever in advance, eh vermin?
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_01: And there's the portal. Homeward bound, we are.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_02: At last, the portal. I'm weary of this place.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_03: Next time we'll do this, Olesya can open a portal, and I'll shoot arrows through it from the comfort of home.
pwe_level_fort_spotting_portal_04: Through the portal, mayflies. Even my life's too short for dawdling.
pwe_level_fort_story_eight_01: Not as you'd understand them. The living world is our fortress, and we shape it to our need.
pwe_level_fort_story_eight_02: Not only trees, but rivers, mountains and the wings of the storms. Nothing forged by men can compare.
pwe_level_fort_story_five_02: (laugh) Not only trees, but rivers, mountains and the wings of the storms. Nothing forged by men compares.\n
pwe_level_fort_story_nine_01: Why are we off to some lumberfoot bastion? Shouldn't we focus on the pact-sworn gate?
pwe_level_fort_story_nine_02: Make haste to the fort mayflies! By the gods of star and shadow, it must hold!
pwe_level_fort_story_on_the_way_five_01: Once again, Lohner sends us off on a fool's errand, while he stays safe.
pwe_level_fort_story_on_the_way_five_02: I'd still like to drag him out into the real world. Preferably by that ridiculous moustache.
pwe_level_fort_story_on_the_way_three_01: Hmph. The ratmen will have sniffed it out by now.
pwe_level_fort_story_on_the_way_three_02: 'For once'? (laugh) Oh, One-Eye, you child-ape, sometimes you actually amuse me.
pwe_level_fort_story_on_the_way_two_01: I do not care for sieges. Too much like a cage, once you're within the walls.
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_01: I believe we have our secret path... or not so secret, if that gate is any guide.
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_02: So it does exist. And our foes are here before us...
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_03: I believe we have our secret path... or not so secret, if that gate is any guide.
pwe_level_fort_this_is_it_04: Is this our secret path? Not so secret. Or was that gate always broken?
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_01: The Fort looks doomed. Then again, who doesn't?
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_02: The final moments of the siege approach. The mayfly blackfire won't last.
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_03: The final moments of the siege approaches. The mayfly blackfire won't last.
pwe_level_fort_under_attack_04: The ratmen have all but won. We should hurry - the assault will be soon.
pwe_level_fort_use_cannons_01: Use one filthy machine to destroy another, perhaps?
pwe_level_fort_use_cannons_02: It seems we've little choice but to use the cannons.
pwe_level_fort_use_cannons_03: We could... Ach, I hate myself for saying this... We could use the cannons?
pwe_level_fort_use_cannons_04: What about the cannons? Might they be of use?
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_01: Keep on, lumberfoots. We'll hit something vital eventually.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_02: Sleepy, mayflies? No? Then keep fighting.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_mid_fight_03: He'll go down, mayflies. Just a little more.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_spotted_01: Such a revolting welcome! You'll have our reply most promptly.
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_spotted_02: Fine words do not make the man, scunner. Even less so delivered like that
pwe_level_ground_zero_boss_taunt_reply_0: So many words. So little action.
Gods, does he not shut up?
Ignore him. He's not saying anything worth heeding.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canals_02: That canal's current doesn't bode well for where the water's ending up.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canals_03: Don't jump in, lumberfoots. You'll be swept away.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canals_04: The canal's moving faster than it should. I doubt that's good.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canal_crossing_01: I'll not swim in that. Look for a way across the canal.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canal_crossing_02: Is there no way across? Look harder, mayflies. Maybe start with that building.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canal_crossing_03: Well, we've no hope of a crossing point behind us. It must be ahead, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_canal_crossing_04: Has anyone searched that building, mayflies? Maybe it hides the crossing point we need.
pwe_level_ground_zero_cargo_elevator_01: There's the lifting platform. At last, a way down.
pwe_level_ground_zero_cargo_elevator_02: There's the lifting platform, mayflies. Time to descend.
pwe_level_ground_zero_cargo_elevator_03: That lifting platform is our route down, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_01: A foul day's work, but a good one.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_02: I'd rather we never do that again, mayflies. Disgusting.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_03: The natural world will reclaim this place, in time.
pwe_level_ground_zero_complete_04: The tree dies, and a blow is struck against Plaguefather Nurgle.
pwe_level_ground_zero_corruption_everywh: The Garden of Nurgle seeks purchase. It must be denied.
The realm of the Dark Gods intrudes on the Weave...
This foulness is but a taste of what is planned for the world.
Daemon-blooms. Don't go picking them for posies, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_01: Is this... shifting under my feet?
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_02: This isn't stable. We should hurry.
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_03: Can you not feel the ground moving, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_ground_zero_crumbling_04: Linger not, mayflies. Helmgart longs to slide further into the pit.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_01: Move, lumberfoots! You don't want to get splashed!
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_02: We should be a long way off, and quickly.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_03: Get clear of the blast, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_get_clear_04: I'd take a step back, were I you,
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_01: There. That is what we seek.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_02: That tree is the source of these ills.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_03: A vile corruption, in mimicry of nature.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_04: A twisted imitation of the Weave. It'll be a pleasure to end its existence.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_01: Find a weakness. It must have one.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_02: We must be clever, if you can manage as much, mayflies?
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_03: Cleverness will serve us better than steel.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_destroy_04: It is no easy task to vanquish such an abomination.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_feed_explos: Perhaps... black powder? Use one vileness to vanquish another?
We need to feed it something unpleasant... or explosive.
The tree has a maw. Let us feed it something... indigestible.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_its_working: Isha! But this might just work.
It feeds. Eat your fill, daemon!
Foolish daemon. All gullet. No sense.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_01: Find a way to end that abomination!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_02: The Weave screams as its roots spread. It must be destroyed!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_03: We must end its existence, mayflies.
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_response_04: We cannot tarry. The daemon-tree must die!
pwe_level_ground_zero_growth_sever_the_v: You'll not bar my path, daemon-frond!
If the vines are in your way, slice through!
Cut your way through, don't delay!
pwe_level_ground_zero_looking_for_elevat: What was it we needed? A guildsmen's lift?
So, where's this lifting platform Lohner mentioned?
Has no one seen this guildsmen's lift?
pwe_level_ground_zero_precarious_02: You might want to take this slow, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_ground_zero_precarious_04: It's a long way down. Careful you don't fall.
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_01: A vile smell. The Dark Gods are at work here.
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_02: Like fermented flesh, steeped in dung,
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_03: Can we please not linger. That stench...
pwe_level_ground_zero_smell_04: That's daemon-stench. We must be close.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_eight_02: The Weave transcends the divine. Your 'Sigmar' serves it. As do we all.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_five_01: Ruin, Master Hold-seeker, and at a swift gallop.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_five_02: Neither you or I have grounds to speak of 'good sense' dwarf. Our actions have made that quite clear.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_nine_01: And when the stone crumbles, dwarf? When the metal rots? When there is no timber to fuel the forge?
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_nine_02: But will it be a world worth fighting for?
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_seven_01: It is the heart and soul of the world. Its suffering is ours also.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_seven_02: Or perhaps you merely missed the significance? Make no mistake, you are bound to its fate.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_01: Well, Sienna, you'll have to set it boiling, will you not?
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_02: Well I'm certainly looking forward to it.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_02_x: Have a care. There are fires fiercer than yours.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_six_x: Don't tell me you're looking forward to the experience.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_ten_01: Every moment the blighted garden has purchase on our world, is a moment in which the Weave trembles.
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_ten_02: It does, Sienna. What purpose do you think I serve?
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_two_01: Tell me, Kruber - do you even know how these lifting platforms work?
pwe_level_ground_zero_story_two_02: Well, I'm sure it's not a long list.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_02: Such damage to the Weave! The town is a gnat-bite by comparison.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_03: So perhaps Helmgart is sorer harmed than I thought.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_04: Senseless destruction. Slaughter should always serve purpose.
pwe_level_ground_zero_the_hole_second_vi: What a bleedin' righteous mess. As I said, we owe payback for this, mates.
Poor bloody Helmgart. And I thought we had it bad in Ubersreik.
Just gets worse the more I see. What have they done?
More dead down there than I can count, I promise you that.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_01: Well, the town could look worse.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_02: All that fuss about this place. Look at it - hardly scratched.
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_03: I thought Helmgart was in ruins. Has Lohner been at his own ale?
pwe_level_ground_zero_town_04: Seems reports of Helmgart's devastation were... premature.
pwe_level_ground_zero_welcoming_committe: Hah! Hear that? They've sent us a welcome!
Not much of an ambush, is it? I can hear them from up here.
Hark at that. They're ready for us, mayflies.
They've come to greet us. I hear them squalling below.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_armoury_01: The ratmen have taken most things of value.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_armoury_02: If you see anything of value, take it.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_armoury_03: The supplies are all but spent.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_arriving_tem: At last. Took you long enough, mayflies.
Well, we're here. What about this bell Lohner wants ringing?
This is the place, I assume. I'd hate to think we came this way all for nothing.
So we're at the temple. What now?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_axebite_pass: Axe Bite Pass. I do walk the very prettiest of roads.
Is that Axe Bite Pass? A tiny crack in a wall of grey.
Axe Bite Pass. Beyond it, Bretonnia. Beyond that, Athel Loren. It has been too long.
I hope Axe Bite Pass does not feature in our future. Greenskins are so... unseemly.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_courtyard_ev: (laugh) More fodder for the daughter of Athel Loren!
They're coming for us! The fools!
Found your courage, have you? You'd have done better to flee!
pwe_level_helmgart_military_door_opens_0: We have a door, and a chance to leave.
Am I to be impressed by a blown out door? Such waste of energy.
The door opens, and the future with it.
Well, one less door means a handy way out.
Was that door part of Lohner's plan?
So the temple provides an exit? It's the least it can do to thank us.
A door. Shall we go now?
That door is no more. I guess the mayfly god decided to lift a finger. Shall we remove ourselves?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_empty_town_0: Pity not the dead, mayflies. Pity the prisoners instead.
The swarm has fed well on this town.
Pact-sworn everywhere. This is the fate of the world, preordained.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fire_cannon_: Light the fuse. Let's get this over with.
Gods, I cannot believe I'm condoning a cannon's use.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_elevato: Mayflies! The lifting platform will carry us upward.
Perhaps we should use the lifting platform.
Mayflies and lifting platforms. What's wrong with a good rope?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_entranc: This place is no haven, mayflies. Not any longer.
The pact-sworn found victory here. All others found death.
An unbarred fortress is of use to neither man nor beast.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_help_01: A mayfly town in ruins, and here I am, chancing my own skin.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_help_02: Would be better if we had help, but we'll find none here.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_help_03: Like the rest of the town, the fort is surely overwhelmed.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_help_04: If there are mayflies in that fort, they're dead, just like everyone else.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_fort_massacr: Dead and done for. No helping them now, lumberfoots.
Nothing we can do for these mayflies. We should press on.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_halfway_thro: Come, ratmen! By the thousand, for all I care!
The tide flows. I hope Lohner's satisfied.
Just once, I'd like to see Lohner stand in a place like this.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_helmgart_vis: The pact-sworn have taken Helmgart for their own.
A bleak fate for Helmgart. There is suffering wherever the ratmen cast their beady eyes.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_locked_portc: Gods! That gate is jammed tight!
We cannot proceed. We need another path, mayflies.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_oops_01: Good shot, mayflies. At least you hit the same bastion.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_oops_02: Such precision. Such style. Was the gate too small a target?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_oops_03: So much for destroying the gate.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_oops_04: The gate still stands, but the wall has fallen. A metaphor for my life since I met you lumberfoots.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_pilgrim_path: Did no one think to finish this path?
They know we're here. I don't want to die on this ridge.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_portcullis_0: We can't climb that gate, mayflies. We need the capstan freed.
Ach, the gate is closed. Does that capstan open it?
Gods! The gate is closed. Let's hope the capstan opens it.
Kick that capstan into motion! It's our best hope with the gate.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_prepare_02: No time to tarry. Gather what wits you have, and what supplies you can find.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_prepare_03: Make ready. We'll be busy soon.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_ring_bell_01: Right, ring the bell. Let us get this done.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_ring_bell_02: Can we please ring the bell? I grow tired of this hovel.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_ring_bell_03: Strike the bell, and let's begin.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_ring_bell_04: I don't hear chimes, mayflies. Can one of you please ring the bell?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_spooky_templ: I sense a wizard's hand in this temple.
Is the temple alive, or are these mere parlour tricks?
Takes more than a few lights to frighten me.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_spotting_por: The portal blooms for us, mayflies.
The portal awakens. Maybe you should take heed, lumberfoots?
There's the old mother's bridge. Come.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_five_0: So this... town... is a vital part of the Empire's defences?
Bretonnians? Superstitious greenleaves, every last one. They're endearing, and hardly frightening.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_one_01: You've been around Goreksson for too long.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_01: Why think on matters you'll never witness? Why invite that sorrow?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_ten_02: Hah! This from a dwarf. Do you think on your home?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_twelve: How can you say that? The Skaven have overrun everything.
So the only thing between Helmgart and success is exchanging one set of mayflies for other, shorter mayflies?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_story_two_01: I thought Sigmar was a presence 'ever at your shoulder'?
pwe_level_helmgart_military_temple_ahead: That's the temple? It's somehow gaudy and plain, all at once.
What pitiful god would accept such a temple?
Even your temples lack charm, mayflies.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_they_are_com: Try not to leave all the work to me, this time.
Stand firm, mayflies. They're only rats.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_time_to_leav: I don't know about the pact-sworn, but I'm thoroughly distracted. Can we go?
We ought to go, mayflies. Before others arrive.
Stay and fight if you wish, but I've more sense.
pwe_level_helmgart_military_turn_cannon_: I hate to suggest this... but can we not turn that crane? That cannon might serve.
Ugh... Can we make use of that cannon? Turn the crane.
Set the crane moving. Perhaps that squat, ugly cannon will serve us?
Does the crane move? Perhaps we can try the cannon. It has to serve some purpose.
pwe_level_mine_bell_ringing_01: And now, we ring the bell.
pwe_level_mine_bell_ringing_02: Time to ring the bell, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_mine_bell_ringing_03: Seems only fair to let the trolls know it's feeding time. Ring the bell!
pwe_level_mine_bell_ringing_04: Ring the bell, mayflies. It'll be worth it.
pwe_level_mine_big_troll_cave_01: So, here we are. Don't you wish we hadn't lost our blackfire?
pwe_level_mine_big_troll_cave_02: This would seem to be the place. That altar's a giveaway.
pwe_level_mine_big_troll_cave_03: So this is our troll-warpers' lair. It could use a good scrubbing.
pwe_level_mine_big_troll_cave_04: What a foul little abode. It'll be a pleasure to wipe it away.
pwe_level_mine_darkness_03: If we die here, we'll be in good company.
pwe_level_mine_darkness_04: I don't want to die in the dark. But I certainly won't die alone.
pwe_level_mine_find_explosives_01: Blackfire. Let us gather it while we can.
pwe_level_mine_find_explosives_02: I smell blackfire. We should claim it, and put it to use.
pwe_level_mine_find_explosives_03: The sour reek of blackfire. But if it's the plan, it's the plan.
pwe_level_mine_find_explosives_04: Is that blackfire I smell? (laugh) Lohner was right. Again.
pwe_level_mine_follow_tracks_02: We'd do well to follow the rails.
pwe_level_mine_follow_tracks_03: Those rails have to lead somewhere.
pwe_level_mine_follow_tracks_04: Where now? We could always follow the rails.
pwe_level_mine_found_cart_first_04: There's our cart. Looks intact, thank the Gods.
pwe_level_mine_found_cart_troll_cave_02: I'm starting to think the cart's wiser than any of you lot.
pwe_level_mine_found_cart_troll_cave_03: So the cart found its way here without us?
pwe_level_mine_found_cart_troll_cave_04: Is that the cart? Well, isn't that nice?
pwe_level_mine_gloat_01: (laugh) Not so threatening now, are they?
pwe_level_mine_gloat_02: (laugh) Well, they won't regenerate that mess, will they?
pwe_level_mine_gloat_03: (disgusted noise) Even more disgusting now. But at least they're dead.
pwe_level_mine_impressive_cave_01: There's a rare beauty to this cavern.
pwe_level_mine_impressive_cave_02: A cavern this majestic should not suffer the touch of Chaos.
pwe_level_mine_impressive_cave_03: This cavern should have been a wonder. Instead, it's been abused.
pwe_level_mine_impressive_cave_04: Not bad, for a hole in the ground.
pwe_level_mine_ladder_01: Quite a drop. Hold tight, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_mine_ladder_02: If you do fall, try to land on your heads.
pwe_level_mine_ladder_04: One day, the world'll swallow us up, and that'll be the end of it.
pwe_level_mine_lost_cart_01: Keep going. Hopefully the cart hasn't gotten far.
pwe_level_mine_lost_cart_03: Surely we're not about to abandon that blackfire?
pwe_level_mine_lost_cart_04: Where has that cart got to?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_01: Should we take that cart along?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_02: I suspect that cart might prove useful.
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_03: Sure, we can take the cart, but I'm not pushing you in it, mayflies.
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_drops_away_02: Oh, well done, mayflies. There goes our blackfire.
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_drops_away_03: Well, I hope we didn't need that cart...
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_drops_away_04: There! Are you happy now? It's gone.
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_push_upwards_03: Push harder, mayflies! It's slowing down!
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_push_upwards_04: The cart's struggling on the slope!
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_remind_01: Are we bringing that cart or no?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_remind_02: Make up your mind. Do we need that cart, or not?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_remind_03: Vengeful Drakira! Is no-one pushing the cart?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_remind_04: Won't someone push that damn cart?
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_roll_down_back_: Aye, well done! Now we can do it all over again.
pwe_level_mine_mine_cart_roll_down_forwa: Run away mine cart! Fly free!
Should we not have held on to that cart, mayflies?
Well, looks like the cart's had enough of your company. Can't say I blame it.
pwe_level_mine_portal_01: I'd like to see them try to regenerate that, but alas, the portal's here.
pwe_level_mine_portal_02: The portal is here. Let's go, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_mine_portal_03: Olesya wishes us to return. And so we shall.
pwe_level_mine_portal_04: Let's head to the portal. No more trolls to slay.
pwe_level_mine_story_eleven_a_01: It's true. Not just the blind, but the pox-addled as well.
pwe_level_mine_story_five_01: Very little is impossible once the Dark Gods are involved.
pwe_level_mine_story_five_02: Bad dreams? You don't know what you're talking about.
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_01: Did I see you eating one of Olesya's candles earlier, Goreksson?
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_03: I don't just eat... (exasperated noise) Never mind. Can you think of a good reason I shouldn't tell Olesya?
pwe_level_mine_story_nine_04: (laugh) A good argument. Well played, dwarf.
pwe_level_mine_story_seven_a_01: And you thought dwarfs were better? He'd sell his mother for a workable seam, wouldn't you, Hold-seeker?
pwe_level_mine_story_three_01: And yet I sense a quickening to your stride. Are you certain you seek no pleasure here?
pwe_level_mine_story_twelve_01: Do you believe I am everything I seem, or even you, for that matter?
pwe_level_mine_troll_doors_02: You'd have to be deaf not to hear those trolls. No offence to Sienna.
pwe_level_mine_troll_doors_03: Noisy beasts. They'll be settled soon enough.
pwe_level_mine_troll_doors_04: Trolls behind those doors, mayflies. Leave them shut, yes?
pwe_level_mine_troll_food_storage_01: The stench! I can hardly breathe.
pwe_level_mine_troll_food_storage_02: Feeding plague rats to trolls? That explains much.
pwe_level_mine_troll_food_storage_03: See? They've been feeding plague monks to the trolls. And I thought the Red Moon offered a bad dinner.
pwe_level_mine_troll_food_storage_04: Well, that's a sight and smell I shan't quickly forget...
pwe_level_mine_warren_01: Tunnels everywhere. Don't get lost, mayflies.
pwe_level_mine_warren_02: I don't like this. Too many lines of approach.
pwe_level_mine_warren_03: This place is a labyrinth. Should have brought a length of twine. Or some shiny pebbles.
pwe_level_mine_warren_04: Is it really beyond mayflies to tunnel with any semblance of order?
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_01: The remnant of some ritual, perhaps interrupted.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_02: A soul sacrificed, and the body discarded.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_03: No altar was ever used for anything wholesome.
pwe_level_nurgle_altar_corpse_04: This wretch is damned. Have a care, lest we share his fate.
pwe_level_nurgle_barrier_03: We cannot let that bar our path.
pwe_level_nurgle_barrier_04: Break through. You've strength enough for that, surely?
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_01: We have a plan and should probably stick to it mayflies. Go for the clusters.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_02: Right, let's get to burying this thing, lumberfoots. Smash the buboes.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_03: We have unpleasant work to do mayflies. Break the buboes. It'll feel better afterwards.
pwe_level_nurgle_bury_objective_04: Let's find us these weak spots Lohner spoke of. Buboes. Ugh.
pwe_level_nurgle_cluster_one_destroyed_0: That's enough of that. Move on, there's more foul growth to kill.
This cave's done, mayflies. Seek more clusters, and yes, smash more clusters.
No more scunner filth to bust open here, mayflies. Move on.
We're out of scunner clusters to break. There should be more.
pwe_level_nurgle_cluster_two_destroyed_0: More weave-pain alleviated, mayflies. Seek more.
We won't find any more to break here, mayflies. Push on.
Aye, that's another cave rid of scunner filth. The filth that matters.
Oh, we've slashed enough clusters here. Hear the old scunner soul writhe!
pwe_level_nurgle_coming_down_01: There it goes! Mind your heads! And head for the portal.
pwe_level_nurgle_coming_down_02: Look at that! We've done it! Run, mayflies, don't let falling rocks ruin your day.
pwe_level_nurgle_coming_down_03: Hah! Let's hope that monolith shan't be seen again. To the surface, mayflies! Go!
pwe_level_nurgle_coming_down_04: Gods! That should bury it! Now move, mayflies. To the surface.
pwe_level_nurgle_digsite_01: We draw near. The weave tells me so.
pwe_level_nurgle_digsite_03: We're approaching the root of this, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_01: Why do we always end up going down?
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_02: Down I go. Can you keep up, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_nurgle_drop_down_04: Here's our path, mayflies. Down we go.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_01: Old workings. This is not the place.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_02: We must keep on. This is old work.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_03: These mines are old. We seek newer toil.
pwe_level_nurgle_mine_tunnel_04: These mines were hewn long ago. We seek fresher toil.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_01: Who's to say how long the rest will hold up? We should find the portal.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_02: Look for the bridge. The whole cavern might yet collapse.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_03: Where is the portal? I long to be away.
pwe_level_nurgle_mission_accomplished_04: Our retreat is cut. We must find the portal.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_02: Abhorrent growths. Have care not to touch them
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_03: Corruption. We must be getting close.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_04: Have a care, lumberfoots. A foul mind guides this growth.
pwe_level_nurgle_nurglification_increase: Isha! The grandfather of all plagues does his work here.
This is the fate of the world, if we fail.
Such foulness. The Weave.. it screams in agony.
This is the world's fate, save for our striving.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_01: Bandits. Hah. Mayflies ever prey upon their own kind.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_02: Brigands and thieves once bedded down in this place.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_03: This was a hideout, but the pact-sworn see further that mayfly reeves.
pwe_level_nurgle_outcast_lair_04: This lair is emptied of purpose, its occupants long dead.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_01: A watercourse. As Lohner said there'd be.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_02: This river shows we haven't strayed.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_03: A river? So we've not meandered far from our course.
pwe_level_nurgle_river_04: A pitiful river, but it marks our path.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_01: Mayfly settlements come. Mayfly settlements go. The trick is not to care.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_02: Been many a year since these were home to anyone.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_03: No one left to call these home, mayflies.
pwe_level_nurgle_ruins_04: Abandoned out of fear, or did the occupants perish to the last?
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_01: Let the raki kill each other. It matters little to me. There will never be a shortage.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_02: The pace of skaven tunnelling does not go without cost.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_03: As always, slain by carelessness, and reckless haste.
pwe_level_nurgle_skaven_collapse_04: A slave is a slave, in skaven eyes, and disposable, regardless of race.
pwe_level_nurgle_spotting_objective_02: Oh that's one foul abhorrence, I give it that.
pwe_level_nurgle_spotting_objective_03: Over there, mayflies. That cannot be anything else!
pwe_level_nurgle_spotting_objective_04: That scunner monolith should never see the light of day.
pwe_level_nurgle_swift_river_01: Have a care, lumberfoots. That river is a ferocious beast.
pwe_level_nurgle_swift_river_02: Even that water wants nothing to do with this place.
pwe_level_nurgle_swift_river_03: At least the river seems joyful. Would that I felt the same.
pwe_level_nurgle_swift_river_04: The river is of good cheer. Perhaps because it's leaving.
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_01: Out in the open, at last!
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_03: How much further? We shouldn't push our luck.
pwe_level_prologue_almost_there_04: Fresh air! Or as near I'm fortunate enough to get.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_01: Northlanders? Here? Did you not think to mention this, Kruber?
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_02: Northlanders and Skaven? This gets better by the moment.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_03: There are northlanders too? I don't like this.
pwe_level_prologue_chaos_04: Sleekit Skaven were bad enough, but glaikit northlanders?
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_01: Typical dwarf. Me, me, me. Show some backbone.
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_02: What's the matter? Dizzy from being so high up?
pwe_level_prologue_dwarf_down_03: Not used to being so high off the ground, Bardin?
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_02: I think I see our exit.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_ride_01: And the eternal shame of being fooled and caught by a rat.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_ride_02: The remains of Helmgart. The weave is in agony, twisted and torn asunder by corruption.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_01: It seems our hosts don't want us to leave.
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_02: Can this platform not go any faster?
pwe_level_prologue_elevator_rising_04: We're leaving you, ratmen, but I'll wager we'll be back!
pwe_level_prologue_fight_01: So you want to fight, vermin? I warn you fair, I'm in no mood.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_02: Fight me? The mood I'm in? Oh, my poor little ratmen.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_03: I'm glad they still want to fight. So do I.
pwe_level_prologue_fight_04: You lock me up, then think I'll be merciful?
pwe_level_prologue_reached_surface_01: I trust Olesya. The Old Mother has talent, for a mayfly.
pwe_level_prologue_seeing_crater_01: No wonder the weave is shredded to threads, howling with pain. This is an atrocity. It must be avenged.
pwe_level_prologue_seeing_crater_01b: Aye, no wonder the weave is in tatters, howling in pain. This is an atrocity. It must be avenged.
pwe_level_prologue_sienna_up_01: Aye. Then we're ready. There's a lifting platform ahead. Make for it, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_prologue_skittergate_afar_01: The Skittergate, but we need less talk and more lifting platform, mayflies.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_01: Well, don't just stare at it. Take what you need.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_02: If we don't use it, the ratmen will.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_03: Better we put it to use than they do.
pwe_level_prologue_stock_up_04: Come on, lumberfoots. Take whatever you can.
pwe_level_prologue_supply_02: These rats steal anything that isn't nailed down.
pwe_level_prologue_supply_04: The packrats have been at work again.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_01: You're free? Not bad for a lumberfoot.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_02: It's been a long time coming, but I suppose I now owe you one.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_03: Rescued by you, Kruber? Had to happen sometime.
pwe_level_prologue_thanks_04: Get your hands off me Kruber. I can manage.
pwe_level_prologue_what_are_they_up_to_0: Such wicked industry. But to what purpose?
The ratmen are up to something. I can feel it.
I don't know about you, but I've a burning desire to disjoint their plans.
Lileath! Whatever this vermin intend, it can't be good.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_barrier_01: They think such a barrier will keep us out?
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_barrier_02: All their ingenuity, and this is how the ratmen seal a lair?
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_barrier_03: Easy enough to get in, but will it be so easy to get out?
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_barrier_04: Sweep the barricade aside, and our work can truly begin.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_city_afire_0: See below? That is why the ratmen only ever know fleeting victories.
Distrust bears bitter fruit, and we have sown its seeds well.
As Lohner hoped, the ratmen turn inwards. But this is a reprieve, no more.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_city_on_fire: The flames spread. I am pleased.
Hah! That blaze makes my heart sing.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_dead_warlord: Dead and gone, just as Lohner requested.
Another warlord falls. A shame there are thousands ready to take his place.
Gods, but he put up a fight.
You fought well, for a rat.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_destroy_bann: One last drop of mischief - strike the colours!
Wouldn't hurt us to cut down the flag, whilst we're here.
Would one of you mayflies cut down the flag?
If we desire more unrest, severing the flag's moorings should give us all we want.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_downtown_01: This place is infested. Better to burn every last stone.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_downtown_02: Ratmen everywhere. Proceed carefully or we risk waking the nest.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_downtown_03: The ratmen are a plague. One that knows no end.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_downtown_04: There are more rats in the world than men, elves and dwarfs combined. But this is just a fraction of their numbers.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_01: This will take us to the surface... I hope.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_02: This will save the climb... Or plummet into darkness.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_03: This will take us to the surface... I hope.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_elevator_04: This will save the climb... Or plummet into darkness.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_exit_01: Our killing is not done. Let us see what Lohner plans for us next.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_exit_02: The old mother's portal won't be far.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_exit_03: Find the Bridge. We should be away from this place.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_exit_04: A small victory, but that's what wins wars.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_find_another: Rat trash blocks our path. We'll have to scout for another way to the forge.
Dead end of rat garbage. No way through to the forge here.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_follow_track: Keep to the tracks and we'll find that forge, mayflies.
Follow the tracks, mayflies. They should lead us to the forge.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_foundry_ente: Ugh, the stench of this place... the worst of dwarf and vermin combined. Do not linger, the Main Warren is close.
Can you not smell that? Dwarf stink and skaven stink all mingled. And the Main Warren should not be far away.
Ah, so much for a majestic forge. But we're on the right path, next should be the Main Warren.
You see industry. I see a mistake, yearning to be unmade. Seems the skaven achieved that their usual way...
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_hearing_pens: Tread with care, lumberfoots. I hear rat ogres.
Mayflies? Do you not hear the rat ogres?
There are rat ogres close by. Tread lightly, or run swiftly.
Rat ogres are close. We should hurry on by.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_lifting_devi: By Isha, that paid off beautifully!
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_light_brazie: It still works? After all this time?
I'll be honest, I thought this had long since fallen into ruin.
Flame from darkness, at the simplest of triggers. It has a rough charm.
If this device still functions, we can expect others to do so too.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_long_way_dow: I wonder how long it would take a lumberfoot to hit the bottom from here.
(sigh) Dwarfs and their 'deep and steep' approach. So tiresome.
Don't go lumberfooting off the edge. Unless you have to.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_mission_comp: We should go. Away from this stink of rat and molten metal.
We've done what Lohner has asked. I see no reason to dally.
Another notch on my bow. Many more yet to come.
Olesya will be happy. Insofar as she ever becomes so.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_move_lifting: That contraption's blocking our path. mayflies.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_patrol_lanes: Hush! We don't want the patrols alerted.
Try to tread softly, lumberfoots. There are patrols about.
Hush! We don't need the patrols alerted.
Are you glaikit? Make less noise. There are patrols ahead.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_so_much_for_: So much for stealth, lumberfoots! Can you not manage a simple task without making a blessed racket?
Gods, spare me from mayflies with leaden feet and cloth ears.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_four_0: Are there many Skaven scholars in your Empire?
(laugh) How can that be? The ratmen have brought your realm to ruin more than once.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_nine_0: Hah, lumberfoots and your flames? I had an inkling too.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_story_seven_: How long's this hold been in Skaven hands? One century? Two? Three?
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_taunt_warlor: Are you ready to die, ratman?
Won't you offer your throat to my blade? I'm bored of you already, ratman.
The world will not remember your name, ratman.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_viaduct_01: The viaduct, mayflies. Head for it.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_vista_01: Aye, it's a big cave, with the corpse of a dwarfen hold, chewed on by rats. Nothing to see.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_vista_02: This cave could have been quite impressive... with less dwarf and rat influence, of course.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_vista_03: By Isha, there's still some sunlight peeking through. That's a lot more than I hoped for.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_vista_04: Well, we clearly have some ground to cover, so no gawking at the scenery, mayflies.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_warlord_nest: And so we reach the warlord nest.
Are we ready for the warlord, mayflies?
The warlord awaits, just a short distance ahead.
One more death, and we can return to the open air.
See that squalor? A warlord's nest.
We'll find our quarry in that nest, or close by.
A warlord's lair looks little different to me than Bardin's room.
The warlord seeks height, to compensate for lacking stature elsewhere.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_waterwheel_c: Looks like we have our way through.
We seem to have opened a path. Let us hope it is the one we need.
The contraption has done its work. Now, let us do ours.
pwe_level_skaven_stronghold_waterwheel_m: I saw something like this, long ago. The wheels need to be set right.
To proceed, we need to make some adjustments.
Those big unsightly wheels... wouldn't it help if they were properly aligned?
Well, I guess we have to deal with that bloated wheel contraption, or turn back.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_01: The gate is silent. This lever should remedy that.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_01a: Mayflies, use the gate control Keystaff.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_02: Look for the lever. We need that gate open, and you know it.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_02a: Mayflies? We're here. Finally it's time to use the Keystaff.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_03: The lever, mayflies. If I had the patience to listen to Lohner's long winded plan, so should you.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_03a: The Keystaff goes in the panel, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_04: Pull the lever, mayflies. Let's be on our way.
pwe_level_skittergate_activate_gate_04a: What are we waiting for? Wake the gate!
pwe_level_skittergate_arrive_02: Ouf. Seems like the Gods are with us. For now.
pwe_level_skittergate_arrive_03: Like a thousand cold claws, picking at my thoughts... then this.
pwe_level_skittergate_arrive_04: Ugh.. that was unsettling... like the thought of puff pastry.
pwe_level_skittergate_back_home_01: Ugh. Even worse this time... I felt my soul seeping away.
pwe_level_skittergate_back_home_02: I am never - never - doing that again.
pwe_level_skittergate_back_home_03: Gods. Fortune favours the fools, indeed.
pwe_level_skittergate_back_home_04: A piece of me... It's gone... Lost in the void.
pwe_level_skittergate_BOOM_01: More merry thunder, mayflies. The gate is down for good. And I am unstoppable.
pwe_level_skittergate_BOOM_02: Hah! The good news keeps coming. That gate was what everything was about, wasn't it, mayflies?
pwe_level_skittergate_BOOM_03: Oh, how sad! It seems the gate lost its will to live with its master plastered across the cave. What have you done, mayflies?
pwe_level_skittergate_BOOM_04: Well, I think the northlanders will find their invasion a touch more difficult now.
pwe_level_skittergate_cave_entrance_01: Hah, seems like they killed each other in such frenzy, they cannot even afford to guard this place?
pwe_level_skittergate_cave_entrance_02: I suppose the Warlord's demise bled their strength away. So now there are few in sight.
pwe_level_skittergate_cave_entrance_03: Without our daily routine of rat slaughter this place would seethe with foes.
pwe_level_skittergate_cave_entrance_04: So, where are you, rat-army? Oh, yes, you rats slaughtered each other just cause we killed your Warlord.
pwe_level_skittergate_contol_panel_01: There's the gate controls for this side. We'll be back here soon.
pwe_level_skittergate_contol_panel_02: Control panel, mayflies. Remember its position.
pwe_level_skittergate_contol_panel_03: That's the skittergate's controls. We'll be back here, with Keystaff in hand.
pwe_level_skittergate_contol_panel_04: That's the gate controls. We have a gatekeeper to put down and a Keystaff to claim.
pwe_level_skittergate_crater_01: Such devastation. Fit to challenge Hukon himself.
pwe_level_skittergate_crater_02: When the Skaven unleash their sickness on the world, the Weave always suffers.
pwe_level_skittergate_crater_03: A broken town. Perhaps it will rebuild, aye, but it will never be the same again.
pwe_level_skittergate_crater_04: This may one day be the fate of the world. The Skaven will multiply, and we will fade.
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_01: We should investigate those crates, perhaps?
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_02: Maybe the northlanders have been shipping warpstone from the Chaos Wastes?
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_03: We should search the dockside. Those crates may house what we need.
pwe_level_skittergate_crates_04: We can't afford delay. Make for the docks. We'll search the crates.
pwe_level_skittergate_dead_seer_01: Oooh! By the gods of star and shadow, that was... satisfying. Aye, I said it mayflies, I thoroughly enjoyed that. Hah!
pwe_level_skittergate_dead_seer_02: Oh by the Oak... Mayflies, I can't deny it... this was worth it. The look on his mangy face!
pwe_level_skittergate_dead_seer_04: And the seer's dead. About time.
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_01: I think we needed more of a plan. How do we destroy that?
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_02: So we're here. How do we destroy it? I'm waiting.
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_03: We're to destroy that? And how might we do so, exactly?
pwe_level_skittergate_destroy_04: No obvious way to destroy it. We should have brought Olesya - used her cutting wit.
pwe_level_skittergate_docks_gate_01: Feeling sleepy, lumberfoots? We should get inside.
pwe_level_skittergate_docks_gate_02: I guess this gate could use a gatekeeper of its own. I'd gladly relieve him of his duties.
pwe_level_skittergate_docks_gate_03: Mayflies? Are you waiting for an invitation? Get inside.
pwe_level_skittergate_docks_gate_04: Push on. We have business inside, mayflies. Murder business.
pwe_level_skittergate_elevator_01: I suppose you're too tired to walk all the way down, lumberfoots?
pwe_level_skittergate_elevator_02: Are we using the lifting platform, mayflies?
pwe_level_skittergate_elevator_03: The lifting platform looks like it still functions.
pwe_level_skittergate_elevator_04: It's too steep to climb, the lifting platform it is.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_01: There's an encampment in our path. Try to keep up, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_02: We cannot afford to be slowed. We'll pass through the camp like a steel wind.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_03: Stay close, lumberfoots. It'll be hard fighting ahead.
pwe_level_skittergate_encampment_04: Northlander encampment ahead. Win or lose, let's give them a legend to remember us by.
pwe_level_skittergate_enter_gate_01: This is beyond stupid. Gods save me.
pwe_level_skittergate_enter_gate_02: Even for you, mayflies, this is unprecedented foolishness.
pwe_level_skittergate_enter_gate_03: Suicidal tendencies, mayflies. You have them, and apparently, so do I.
pwe_level_skittergate_enter_gate_04: Aye, let's just gamble away our lives, skaven technology's always a safe bet, isn't it?
pwe_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_de: Has it finally ceased its thrashing?
Stay down, scunner. Settle with two deaths today.
If only all triumphs were so complete.
pwe_level_skittergate_fire_gatekkeper_tr: Seems his god is none too pleased. Fight on, mayflies!
The body writhes to match a corrupt soul. It'll die, all the same.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_01: We'll have to go through the skittergate.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_02: Lileath help me, but we'll have to go through the gate.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_03: And where's he off to? We'd better follow.
pwe_level_skittergate_follow_04: The ratman flees! What a surprise. But we'll catch him yet, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_02: One hawkship from Ulthuan, and those northlanders would learn a valuable lesson.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_03: Look at those hulks. Northlanders are as clumsy on the waves as they are on dry land.
pwe_level_skittergate_frozen_lake_04: See those ships? The first of many, if we fail.
pwe_level_skittergate_gatekeeper_appear_: Just another braggart scunner, stampeding towards certain death.
Kill him quick, lumberfoots. This one bores me worse than Kruber and Bardin debating the finer points of billygoat-wrestling.
Does he think he's the first scunner whose tedium we've had to endure?
I'm sorry, did he say something worth heeding?
pwe_level_skittergate_gatekeeper_death_0: No challenge at all. Where's the Keystaff?
He's down. Grab the Keystaff. We've more to do.
He's dead, mayflies. We should take the Keystaff and go.
Ignore that pile of putrid flesh. Take the Keystaff.
pwe_level_skittergate_gate_activated_01: It's alive. May we not regret that.
pwe_level_skittergate_gate_activated_03: Aye, it's waking up. A good sign, or no?
pwe_level_skittergate_gate_activated_04: It's alive. How fortunate... for Lohner.
pwe_level_skittergate_get_back_to_gate_0: We have what we need. Back to the gate controls. And with haste, lumberfoots.
It's time to go mayflies. To the gate controls.
Well, Olesya's delivered so far. To the gate controls, mayflies.
That key staff's nothing but dead weight until we reach the gate controls. Hurry mayflies
pwe_level_skittergate_get_down_to_the_co: Right. Now we just need to upset the warp regulators...
Now, let's convince this disgusting contraption to overheat.
As Olesya uncovered, this machine gets hot. Time to encourage it, mayflies.
The warp regulators, mayflies. They need vandalising... oh, just like Olesya needs Kruber! Haha!
pwe_level_skittergate_leave_01: Time to move, lumberfoots. I'm not keen on falling rocks.
pwe_level_skittergate_leave_02: We're done and I need some fresh air. Not rocks falling on my head.
pwe_level_skittergate_leave_03: Time to go, mayflies. before a cave-in dampens the mood.
pwe_level_skittergate_leave_04: Right. That's it, I'm leaving, with or without you. Have a nice cave-in!
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_01: Can we get that gate open?
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_02: A wooden barricade shouldn't hold us back.
pwe_level_skittergate_open_the_gate_04: You may like it on this side of the gate, mayflies. I do not.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_death_rat: Don't target the Seer! Aim for the Stormfiend!
Remember the Seer's shield? He still has it, lumberfoots.
Concentrate your efforts on the Stormfiend, mayflies.
He's hiding behind his magic! Focus on his mount!
Don't waste your efforts on the Seer when his shield is up! Soften up the Stormfiend!
Fight the Stormfiend, not Rasknitt! When his shield is down, I'm melting eyeballs!
The seer's shield is up! We have the big juicy target of the Stormfiend to focus on!
Let the Stormfiend have it! No use engaging the shielded bastard riding it.
It's a bit too much of everything to live, darlings! Bring down the Stormfiend!
The Stormfiend, darlings. Show it how much we love it.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_dismounte: Yes! The Seer's open for attack! Go get him! Get him good!
Seer's not in the saddle, lumberfoots. Make the most of it!
Down went Rasknitt, foulest of the foul! Make him pay for everything, mayflies!
The Seer's unprotected! Shoot him in the snout!
Shield is down, darlings. The Seer's ripe for plucking. One stab for every person he's killed.
Seer's defence dropped, darlings! Who's with me ganging up on him?
No shield on the Seer! We all want payback, darlings! This is the time!
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_gate_big_: This might be interesting. Even you mayflies can't miss that lumbering.
I sounds like the Grey Seer has... Over compensated.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_gate_repl: Is he finished with that ear-sore rant? It's been a long day.
Now this is convenient. I feared we would have to track down this craven lice-rat after all this.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_interrupt: The seer-rat won't like it if we hit him when he's casting, mayflies! Do it!
If you want less dark magic coming your way, hit him hard as he casts!
Make the seer-rat think about pain instead of magic! Interrupt his casting!
Watch out for his magic! If we hit him enough, he won't have the time to cast!
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_a_0: Interfering? This is just a game to me, seer.
Talk, talk, talk. When do we get to the killing?
I'm an elf. Interference is like breathing to us.
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_reply_b_0: You mistake me for someone who cares what you think.
I'm sorry, were you talking to me?
Go on, puff out your chest. Maybe that'll be more convincing.
Words are easy, seer. Have you actions to back them up?
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_stormfien: Aye, so big, so armoured, so armed, and so dead! Hah!
See that, seer-rat? No pets allowed!
pwe_level_skittergate_rasknitt_teleport_: Move, lumberfoots! If the rat gets away again, someone's paying for it!
Don't lose the seer-rat, lumberfoots! Move!
Move, lumberfoots! Don't let him escape!
Keep up with him, mayflies! Don't let him get away again!
pwe_level_skittergate_replace_power_02: Set that cursed rock in position.
pwe_level_skittergate_replace_power_04: Lileath! What's the delay? Activate the gate.
pwe_level_skittergate_run_for_the_gate_0: Quickly! To the gate! This is not the time to be a lumberfoot, lumberfoots!
Go! Through the skittergate! Keep up or be left for dead, lumberfoots!
Fight your way to the gate! Go!
Make for the gate! Let nothing stand in your way!
pwe_level_skittergate_sabotage_cooling_0: Hah! Wreck, smash and break to your hearts desire, mayflies.
Come on lumberfoots, are the regulators too agile for you?
Aye, these look fragile enough. A few good blows ought to destroy them.
Shatter the regulators, lumberfoots, and then be ready to run!
pwe_level_skittergate_searching_gatekeep: Gatekeeper! Show yourself! We'll make it a quick and painful death.
Where's this scunner hiding? See any holes large enough for this bog-brained oaf?
Search the camp, mayflies. We need the gatekeeper's treasure.
Oh, we humbly seek your audience, Gatekeeper. We bring lavish gifts and a very generous offer.
pwe_level_skittergate_ships_02: One hawkship from Ulthuan, and those northlanders would learn a valuable lesson.
pwe_level_skittergate_ships_03: Look at those hulks. Northlanders are as clumsy on the waves as they are on dry land.
pwe_level_skittergate_ships_04: See those ships? The first of many, if we fail.
pwe_level_skittergate_skittergate_found_: That repulsive contraption, mayflies, that is our target.
pwe_level_skittergate_spotting_docks_01: Olesya's done well. There's the docks and the back door, just as promised.
pwe_level_skittergate_spotting_docks_02: The Docks. That's where we find the entrance. Just as well. My waning patience won't tolerate anything else.
pwe_level_skittergate_spotting_docks_03: There's our path in, lumberfoots. Hurry along now.
pwe_level_skittergate_spotting_docks_04: No inescapable death-traps yet. Seems like Olesya's still coherent and able.
pwe_level_skittergate_start_up_gate_01: The Gatekeeper has the Keystaff. We won't find either whilst loitering here, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_start_up_gate_02: There was talk of a gatekeeper, and to pique my interest, talk of killing said gatekeeper. I approve.
pwe_level_skittergate_start_up_gate_03: We'll need to find the gatekeeper if we want his Keystaff. See? I do listen to Lohner. Sometimes.
pwe_level_skittergate_start_up_gate_04: We need the Keystaff, mayflies, so find the gatekeeper, or lay down and die. Your choice.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_eight_01: That seems a bit, capricious, even for you.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_eight_02: I suppose not. We are all true to our natures... and our addictions.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_one_01: Are we ready for this, mayflies? The whole of the Reikland teeters on our actions.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_one_02: I can't help what you hear, sergeant. But I do take pride in a job well done.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_six_01: Did you see that seer, mocking us again?
pwe_level_skittergate_story_six_02: He locked me up. I'll have his pelt for that.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_ten_01: It's only a taste of what's to come.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_ten_02: Know? I don't 'know' anything. But I fear for the future.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_twelve_01: Many have said the same, One-Eye. Few have succeeded.
pwe_level_skittergate_story_twelve_02: Was that... a joke? From you? Truly, this is the End Times come upon us.
pwe_level_skittergate_through_the_gate_0: Aye! Yes, let's show them how the most puerile of idiots do it, not once, but twice in a day.
This had better be the only way. If parts of me go missing, Lohner will pay with parts of his own.
Oh, I'm sure it'll be even more pleasant this time. mayflies. And still a genius plan.
So, fortune favours the fool. I'd say you first, mayfly, but I've no time for lumberfooting.
pwe_level_skittergate_tunnel_collapses_0: Hah, and just like skaven dreams, the pit collapses.
Aye, the weave reclaims that which was sundered.
The Weave reclaims that which was sundered.
Perhaps Hukon the Sunderer grew jealous, and reached out his mighty hand?
pwe_level_skittergate_vacated_area_01: Olesya's scouted well. No sign of the seer, for good or ill.
pwe_level_skittergate_vacated_area_02: We could have killed two rats with one stone. Too bad the Seer's busy being a filthy rat somewhere else.
pwe_level_skittergate_vacated_area_03: How kind of the seer to let us run loose in his lair. Or do I mistake 'kindness' for cowardice?
pwe_level_skittergate_vacated_area_04: If we didn't know Rasknitt was away, I'd thought the cowardly vermin fled in panic when he caught our scent.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_01: A numerous as leaves in a forest...
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_02: It seems we've interrupted their plans just in time.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_03: That is a great many northlanders.
pwe_level_skittergate_vast_camp_04: Even I can't fight that many, mayflies.
pwe_level_skittergate_vista_01: No mayflies, we can't fight an army that size head on. We should use the path Lohner mentioned.
pwe_level_skittergate_vista_02: Avoid that endless scunner camp for now, lumberfoots. Use the back door.
pwe_level_skittergate_vista_03: Stay close, lumberfoots. We'll enter through the back door, and be gone before they know it.
pwe_level_skittergate_vista_04: Mayflies, even I can't fight that many. We have to trust Olesya's scouting. Seek the back door.
pwe_level_skittergate_welcome_to_norsca_: Norsca has a grim beauty. At first glance.
What a beautiful vista. A shame about all the ratmen and barbarians.
Are you ready for Norsca, mayflies? I've no doubt Norsca is ready for you,
A cold clime. Just the place for long-overdue vengeance.
pwe_level_skittergate_winchway_follow_02: Try to keep up, lumberfoots. We've only one chance at this.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_01: That winch-way will save us the effort of carrying the stone ourselves.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_02: I'm not touching that tainted rock. Set the winch moving.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_03: If you think I'm touching that rock... Use the winch-way instead.
pwe_level_skittergate_winch_04: Look like the winch-way runs all the way back to the gate.
pwe_level_ussingen_at_last_end_01: One town avenged, and a scunner horde humiliated. A good day.
pwe_level_ussingen_at_last_end_02: There's the portal. Just as well. I think there's an army on our heels.
pwe_level_ussingen_at_last_end_03: Can you imagine running from this lot in the back of Olesya's wagon? I much prefer the portal.
pwe_level_ussingen_at_last_end_04: The portal awaits, mayflies. I wonder what mess Lohner has planned for us next?
pwe_level_ussingen_caravan_01: Mayfly caravan didn't get very far, did it?
pwe_level_ussingen_caravan_03: This is but a taste of what awaits us inside...
pwe_level_ussingen_caravan_04: This caravan's journey is done. Now they walk where we cannot follow.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_full_01: That's it, mayflies. Push the cart down the hill!
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_full_02: That'll do, mayflies. Time to send the cart crashing.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_full_03: That's enough blackfire, mayflies. Release the cart, and pray for a spectacle.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_full_04: Cart's full to bursting. Give it a good push, lumberfoots.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_idea_01: So... About that manor. Fill this cart with blackfire, and let it roll.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_idea_02: Find some of that nasty blackfire - we'll fill the cart, and bring the building down!
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_idea_03: Well, there's a cart. All we need now is something to fill it with.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_idea_04: Quick! Find me some blackfire. That cart. We can use it.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_02: We need fire. Is there a torch to hand?
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_03: A flame will bring this to noisy life.
pwe_level_ussingen_cart_torch_04: Just a flicker of flame, and we're ready.
pwe_level_ussingen_cellar_01: What about that cellar? Seems like the only way.
pwe_level_ussingen_cellar_02: The streets are too difficult, we should try the cellar.
pwe_level_ussingen_cellar_04: We should jump down into that cellar! Just don't go breaking your bones, mayflies.
